story:
Try the first chapter for free!

 

In-game screenshots:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goals:

15,000$ - Make the second chapter.

20,000$ - Release the game on the Android too.

50,000$ - Make the third chapter.

70,000$ - Hire one extra teammate (designer or developer) to speed up the process of finishing the game or increase its quality.

 

Disclaimers:

Sibling rivalry:

Subject to approval of the game creator.

 

T-shirt perk:

A limit will be given to the contributors to change the size of the T-Shirt.

 

The people have spoken perk:

The comment shouldn’t contain any inappropriate words or language.

 

A Tragic Past perk:

*the picture should be a yours not for someone else and it shouldn't contain nudity or porngraghy.

 

Kojima - esque perk:

Subject to approval.

The event development cycle should be less than 22 working days.

 

Your logo in the house perk:

Send us your logo, poster, or YouTube channel icon and we will add it inside the game and if the users click on it, the link will send them to your channel.

*the picture,logo should be a yours not for someone else and it shouldn't contain nudity or pornography.

 

Who needs real life? perk:

Send us a pictures of you from four directions to become a 3D character in the game.

Your name will be in the thank you list in.

Plus you can download the finished  first chapter on iOS.

*the picture should be a yours not for someone else and it shouldn't contain nudity or pornography also please note that we will try to make as you as possible BUT don't expect it to be 100% the same looking as you.

 

King perk:

This perk is subjected to the approval of the creators of the game.

Profit of King perk chapter is only limited to In App Purchases of that extra chapter. Incase the chapter is for free then the contributor will not receive profits.

The price of this chapter should be in the range of the available prices of the In App Purchases in the Apple store or any store the game will be published on.

If you take this package we will make a whole new chapter just for you, and in this chapter you can add pictures* of you or your friends.

You can also write whatever story for that chapter.

Our main conditions is that the development of this chapter doesn’t take more than 5 months and developing it should only be using the already available assets in the game. The work on it will start only after all the core chapters have been published.

You can choose to make this chapter for free or paid, if you choose to make it paid you will get 100% of any revenue this chapter generates after Apple and Google take their cuts from the profits. Those cuts normally amount to ~ 30-33% of each sale but could go over that amount in case of a deal between us and them (As an example Apple may increase their share if they are going to add the game to the "Featured" list).

story:
1. Evolution Race is a great and thoughtful game that takes inspiration in science and delivers excellent graphics and interesting mechanics. It needs a little push to be finished and be able to get out to the world!
  2. We are a big family here in wim, and we´ll love that you get to be part of it. We are committed and skillful, and we have the capacity to deliver an amazing game.
  3. Let´s help us support a game that is both entertaining and full of interest information and knowledge. Here in wim we´re convinced that videogames games can be an amazing place to learn.

Evolution Race is a mobile device game where players are challenged to win the race of evolution and restore the path of history. In these adventures they will be guided and helped by Darwin, the biggest authority in terms of evolution history, and will discover enemies and environments as they evolve through multiple eras.

Game mechanics are easy to follow and yet challenging, which allows for a fluid flow of the game.

 

As the game advances the player will be able to explore and play in different eras. Actually they had been developed 4 eras of about 3 levels each. The plan is to build 8 eras in total, taking into account that each era has it´s own particular environment and inhabitants.

In these adventures they will be guided and helped by Darwin, the biggest authority in terms of evolution history, and will discover enemies and environments as they evolve through multiple eras.Game mechanics are easy to follow and yet challenging, which allows for a fluid flow of the game.

 
As the game advances the player will be able to explore and play in different eras. Actually they had been developed 4 eras of about 3 levels each. The plan is to build 8 eras in total, taking into account that each era has it´s own particular environment and inhabitants.

story:
Introducing a gaming platform that finally brings games to real life. Stop looking at the world through a screen and get ready to unlock your Superpowers. It comes with a number of pre-loaded games and lets you download more. Play solo or go multiplayer.

 


SuperSuit’s advanced gesture engine translates your hand gestures into incredible SuperPowers, to unleash shock waves, generate force fields and much more.

 

SuperGlove is capable of producing reflective Zaps over a smooth surface. Next time you have an obstruction blocking a clear shot, try reflecting your Zap. Strategize to build a stronger offense.

 

With SuperSuit you can start playing anywhere, right out of the box. You dont need a phone, computer, Wi-FI or Bluetooth connection - take your suits to a park, beach or even a desert and they will connect to each other.

 

A lot of work went in to achieve a Unibody design for the SuperSuit, which can fit kids and adults of all shapes and sizes!

 

Download & play unlimited games and receive powerful upgrades over the air for free!

 

SuperSuit is very easy to store and simple to charge. Hang in behind your door or in your closet.

 

The rechargeable lithium ion battery ensures you have long hours of uninterrupted playtime. You only need twice-a-week charging for an entire week’s play. Charging is done via a standard micro-USB port and chargers are included with the packaging!

 

Maintain multiple profiles, keep scores, check leaderboard, download more games, track fitness and a lot more.

 

Just as every superhero has his or her "super suit", we want to make your SuperSuit truly yours. Choose from custom colors, skins, and panels to personalize your signature SuperSuit your way.

 


 

Player Reactions

Parent Reactions


 


SuperSuit is not from Earth. It's forged from technology light years away, from the planet Xelotor. Xelotor has a much advanced life form than humans. Primitive life on Xelotor resembled the humans, but soon the wise ones unlocked the secret to the Universe. They realized many eons ago that the Universe was created through a spontaneous Play between the atoms and that Play was the highest form of creative energy. Hence they used Play to preserve their wisdom and pass it on through generations. Everything on Xelotor is done through Play and instead of conquest, they seek balance & harmony.

However 9.34 billion years ago before the Earth was formed, a catastrophe tore Xelotor apart and threatened this very Balance!!! Most of the planets of its planetary system were destroyed. But Xelotor magically stayed suspended in the split state. You see the core of the planet is where the wise ones had hidden the mystical crystal Krato, source of the creation energy. The planet hung in this delicate balance. It got solar locked with Imba, which means one side always gets light and one side is always dark. Hence very different life forms evolved on either side and also made one side richer in resources. Hence started the great conflict which remains till date and threatens the delicate balance of Krato’s energy. At the edge of the Solar side & the Dark side, various Zoro clans thrive. Zoros are extremely notorious creatures, who change loyalty depending on which side is prospering!

SuperSuit is a living entity. The center of the SuperSuit, the soul gem, is made of parts from the Krato. It is powered by your life energy. By playing SuperSuit, you keep this energy alive. The fate of Xelotor now rests in your hands.


 



 

 

SuperSuit introduces a new genre of strategy games based on ‘Balance’, called the Xelotor Games, and upgrades the outdoor classics with technology, called the Earth Games. Enjoy 15 pre-loaded games and download more from the SuperSuit App.


 



 


 

Vision for a unifying networking standard for Gen Z toys.

 

SuperSuit uses new Zi-Fi™ technology to communicate suit to suit, so they work anywhere. Zi-Fi™ had to be created to make SuperSuit truly screenless. SuperSuit doesn't need a phone or PC or a WiFi / Bluetooth connection to be around. With Zi-Fi™ you can take these suits to a park / beach or even a desert and they'll start talking to each other right out of the box. We have been asked time and again why we have not just relied on existing protocols. We wrote a blog here. In short, WiFi is just too power hungry, ZigBee has a single point of failure, Bluetooth is connection oriented and ANT is geared towards periodic sensor reading transmissions. Zi-Fi™ emits permissible levels of radiation which is safe for use by children & adults. It is similar to that of Wi-Fi.

 

Natural Gesture Processing Technology for Embedded Gaming.

ENGaGE™ is the gesture engine that unleashes the magic behind all the "superpowers", from activating Force Fields to unleashing Shock Waves with a swish of your hands in superhero style! It is the first natural gesture processing technology for embedded gaming. It recognizes macro gestures done by players while moving across a 3D space, to trigger actions in a game environment and to control bots. ENGaGE’s Machine Learning subsystem learns complex new gestures, allowing SuperSuit game developers to program their own custom gestures.


Here’s a blog detailing the super tech behind SuperSuit.

 

 

A SuperSuit contains:

 



SuperVest is the power core of SuperSuit. It's designed in the form of a lightweight chest unit. It lights up, makes sound and has haptic feedback letting you Feeeel when you get Zapped! It slides perfectly over your shoulders and comes with adjustable straps and buckle, making it easy to wear and ensuring a perfect fit. As you keep playing, it’s machine learning engine adapts to your playing style. It communicates with the other suits, and its own SuperGlove & SuperBot using the proprietary Zi-Fi™ radio technology. As you put it on, don’t be surprised if your inner superhero comes out!

 



SuperGlove is the hand unit that goes over the forearm and closes over the fist. The triggers on it let you Zap and Zip other players. So you can Zap other players (take resources from them) as well as Zip (give resources to them). It has an inbuilt, advanced gesture engine powered by proprietary ENGaGE™ technology, that converts complex natural gestures into power-ups for your game. It is used to choose the game you want to play and displays vital scoring information on its screen during the game. Its IR blaster along with ambient light sensor works together to increase accuracy and Zapping range.

 



SuperBot is the sidekick to your superhero. It’s a detachable smart bot that fits into the SuperVest. It can act as an ally by sensing other players and Zapping at them, or it can be used to boost your defense or be the goal of the game. You can connect as many bots in a game as you want. It can also be used to practise and perfect your own game.

 


 







 



 



 


Various Play Sessions

 

 



 


We are a fiercely passionate team of 16, working relentlessly on making SuperSuit a reality for the last two years. Why did we take so long to launch on crowdfunding? We wanted to do ALL the testing that was needed and be sure this was going to be a reality before putting it in your hands. That is more than a thousand testing sessions, speaking & showcasing to experts at leading conferences like CES (Vegas), Mobile World Congress (Barcelona), INK (Goa), TechCrunch Disrupt (SF) and much more.

We are a diverse team with varied skills and backgrounds with an open culture. We just have two requirements that someone on the team must share -

1. Best at what you do in the World – This is Non-negotiable. You have to be absolutely world class at what you do. We don’t mean in terms of track record – you may have come from the best universities or unknown ones, but can you deliver? It's not easy to match pace with us.

2. Total belief in the Vision – You will be working slightly more than 24 hrs in a day, everyday, because that’s what it takes to make a dent in the universe. And unless you have complete faith in the vision for an active lifestyle, you won't be able to.

 

 

 

SuperSuit SDK is in the works and the developer community is going to be a big part of SuperSuit's future. However, it would be premature to give details about it now, till we have the product out. We will publish a blog on it soon, sharing the tools we have been building to create & test various games and interactions on SuperSuit.

 


 
 

 

About Purchase & Shipping

Can I change my shipping address after the campaign is funded?

Yes. You can send us an email at hello@supersuit.io with your transaction ID.

Which countries do you ship to?

We work with major Courier Services and therefore we’ll ship anywhere they deliver.

When will I receive my SuperSuit?

We want you to have your SuperSuit as soon as possible. Please refer to the project timelines, additionally, we’ll also keep you posted during and after the campaign.

Will you ship to multiple addresses?

Yes. You can send us an email at hello@supersuit.io with your transaction ID.

Will you accept returns after I receive SuperSuit?

Yes. Please initiate a return and arrange for shipping within the first 30 days. No questions asked.

 

 

About SuperSuit

 

Can you see the laser beams shown in the video? Won't people be disappointed when they find out you can't?

Far from being disappointed, people are wowed even more when they try out SuperSuit in person. It's such an experiential product that the video cannot do justice to the haptics you'll feel when getting zapped, the rush of doing the shock wave gesture & seeing all surrounding suits shut down and truly getting to experience what it'd be like to play a video game in real life! We've tested with thousands of people and put together a showreel capturing these emotions.

Although you can't physically see the laser beams, there is a laser pointer which shows you the target and you see the rest in your mind. In fact, you see much more when doing the gesture superpowers - it's not uncommon to see people imagining themselves unleashing a force ripple through their surroundings when doing the shock wave. We have merely tried to capture that in the video.

How many people can play SuperSuit at a time?

It depends on the game. SuperSuit does not have any limitations to that but we recommend up to 15 people for an optimal play experience.

What is SuperSuit’s range / How far can players Zap each other from?

The range depends on the environment and would range from 100-200 ft. (30-60m) depending on obstacles in the path. Zi-Fi also “hops” from player to player, so the range ends up extending to be much higher.

What if a player goes out of range while playing the game?

SuperSuit is powered by Zi-Fi™ which allows players to go in and out of play range without affecting the game. A suit is notified as soon as it is about to step out of range, and is put in an inactive state. The player may then move closer to the play area and is notified once he is back in range and is activated for play.

Whom do I contact, if SuperSuit has a problem/glitch/damage?

Just email hello@supersuit.io .

Is Zi-Fi safe in terms of radiation?

Yes. Zi-Fi emits permissible levels of radiation which are proven to be safe for use by children & adults. It is in the same range as Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.

How do I choose my suit color?

You will get a form to personalize your suit shortly after the campaign.

Will SuperSuit fit me / What sizes does SuperSuit come in?

SuperSuit comes in a uni-body size and fits everyone from 7-year-olds to adults.

Does SuperSuit need a phone to play?

No, it does not need a phone to play. In fact, it works right out of the box without needing a phone, computer, Wi-Fi or Bluetooth around. A small display on the SuperGlove helps you choose the games and gives all the necessary information related to the game.

Do we need to install any batteries in SuperSuit?

No. SuperSuit comes with rechargeable Lithium ion batteries like your smartphones. They are good for more than 4 hours of active play. That means charging just twice a week even with daily use.

Does SuperSuit need a special charger?

SuperSuit uses standard USB connector (type micro-B) and ships with chargers so you don’t have to look around.

 

About Games & Gameplay

How do I add my friends to my game?

All your friends need to gather up together in your play area; when you select and start a game their suits get a notification to accept and join your game. They hit accept, and that’s it! A Game is setup by your SuperSuit and countdown starts.

Can I setup my profile on SuperSuit?

Yes. SuperSuit remembers you. Each time you play it updates your scores, gives you experience points and unlocks any superpowers as a result of it. It remembers your activity levels and games played. You can sync this data with your phone and compare scores with friends & use many more features.

How many games can I play on SuperSuit?

There is no limit to the number of games you can play. It comes with 15 pre-loaded games and allows you to download more games.

 

About the SuperSuit App

Is the information stored on the SuperSuit App secure?

The app uses Google Identity platform or Facebook login, allowing you complete control of your privacy.

I have an iPhone / Android. Do you have an app for it?

Yes for both.

What are the specs required for a phone to connect to SuperSuit using your app?

Any smartphone (Android and iOS) with BLE4.0 or upwards would be able to connect to SuperSuit using our app.

How do I download games?

Download the SuperSuit App on your phone and connect your suit with it (more than one suit can be connected & setup). You can choose the games you like in the App’s games section and click "Install on SuperSuit"! Just make sure your SuperSuit is switched on.

Can I manage multiple suits with one phone?

Yes. You can setup profiles of multiple suits on one phone. Whenever you try to put new upgrades or download games on the suit, it will let you choose the suit (or choose all at once).

Does it sync with my fitness devices?

SuperSuit is meant to make you active and is a great companion to your existing fitness devices such as Fitbit. Integration with various such devices is in the works and you will be notified when such an upgrade is available.

If I have a question whom do I contact?

Just email us at hello@supersuit.io and we promise a response within 24 hours, but usually get back within minutes. You can also reach out to us at Facebook and Twitter

Whom do I contact, if SuperSuit has a problem/glitch/damage?
Just email hello@supersuit.io .
Is Zi-Fi safe in terms of radiation?
Yes. Zi-Fi emits permissible levels of radiation which are proven to be safe for use by children & adults. It is in the same range as Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.
How do I choose my suit color?
You will get a form to personalize your suit shortly after the campaign.
Will SuperSuit fit me / What sizes does SuperSuit come in?
SuperSuit comes in a uni-body size and fits everyone from 7-year-olds to adults.
Does SuperSuit need a phone to play?
No, it does not need a phone to play. In fact, it works right out of the box without needing a phone, computer, Wi-Fi or Bluetooth around. A small display on the SuperGlove helps you choose the games and gives all the necessary information related to the game.
Do we need to install any batteries in SuperSuit?
No. SuperSuit comes with rechargeable Lithium ion batteries like your smartphones. They are good for more than 4 hours of active play. That means charging just twice a week even with daily use.
Does SuperSuit need a special charger?
SuperSuit uses standard USB connector (type micro-B) and ships with chargers so you don’t have to look around.
 
About Games & Gameplay
How do I add my friends to my game?
All your friends need to gather up together in your play area; when you select and start a game their suits get a notification to accept and join your game. They hit accept, and that’s it! A Game is setup by your SuperSuit and countdown starts.
Can I setup my profile on SuperSuit?
Yes. SuperSuit remembers you. Each time you play it updates your scores, gives you experience points and unlocks any superpowers as a result of it. It remembers your activity levels and games played. You can sync this data with your phone and compare scores with friends & use many more features.
How many games can I play on SuperSuit?
There is no limit to the number of games you can play. It comes with 15 pre-loaded games and allows you to download more games.
 
About the SuperSuit App
Is the information stored on the SuperSuit App secure?
The app uses Google Identity platform or Facebook login, allowing you complete control of your privacy.
I have an iPhone / Android. Do you have an app for it?
Yes for both.
What are the specs required for a phone to connect to SuperSuit using your app?
Any smartphone (Android and iOS) with BLE4.0 or upwards would be able to connect to SuperSuit using our app.
How do I download games?
Download the SuperSuit App on your phone and connect your suit with it (more than one suit can be connected & setup). You can choose the games you like in the App’s games section and click "Install on SuperSuit"! Just make sure your SuperSuit is switched on.
Can I manage multiple suits with one phone?
Yes. You can setup profiles of multiple suits on one phone. Whenever you try to put new upgrades or download games on the suit, it will let you choose the suit (or choose all at once).
Does it sync with my fitness devices?
SuperSuit is meant to make you active and is a great companion to your existing fitness devices such as Fitbit. Integration with various such devices is in the works and you will be notified when such an upgrade is available.
If I have a question whom do I contact?
Just email us at hello@supersuit.io and we promise a response within 24 hours, but usually get back within minutes. You can also reach out to us at Facebook and Twitter

story:
Riftforge: Thank you for your support!

A personal message from the team:

We appreciate your support. Even though we couldn't reach the lofty goal we set, we've got 49 supporters we didn't have before!

We'll be improving the campaign based on your feedback. Stay tuned for re-launch pretty soon!

The good news? Riftforge is now live. Join us using this link for your Indiegogo bonus!

Most perks are still available. Join Riftforge and go to Unlock!

Riftforge is a modern game soul trapped in a pixel art body

Riftforge is NOT a retro game. Let not the art style fool you! We had to simplify graphics to make it past corporate firewalls, Flash plugins, Java, you name it. 

The gameplay mechanics are fully modern. For example, character skills match of those of League of Legends rather than Legend of Zelda. 

You cannot relive the past, you can only learn from it.

And learn from it we did! We took the openness and depth from RPG's like Baldur's Gate and Ultima and combined them with the tactical battles from Final Fantasy Tactics and XCom.

See if you spot our "influences":

  • Arrive magically from another world to Riftforge, a mysterious construct
    that creates temporary Rifts in space.
  • The High Council hires you as a mercenary commander.
  • Combine over 40+ classes to create the perfect party of six.
  • Customize troops and equipment before each individual battle.
  • Fight battles on a tactical map with an isometric view.
  • Defeat dozens of enemy types using over 70 tactical and action skills.
  • Master the six types of battle and beat a hundred handcrafted missions.
  • Fail and your world is lost.
  • Succeed and you will be hailed as hailed as Supreme Warlord.

Anything original about Riftforge at all?

It sounds like we've mixed some great broccoli ice cream, doesn't it?

We did start with broccoli ice cream two years ago. After 20+ months of playtesting, we've distilled it into something almost pure: 60% proof brandy with a slight greenish tint.

The point is most games ship with serious bugs and virtually no beta. Blizzard is one of the few that takes the time to PLAYTEST for months. 50,000 playtesters have playtested Riftforge, playing hundreds of thousands of battles. Some are on the team advising us right now!

We've addressed dozens of issues plaguing the genre. Listing them all will take too much time but here's a few:

  • ridiculous misses - from D&D to XCom, you can miss from point-blank range
  • (unpredictably) long missions - you can't save and the mission lasts an hour?
  • low-level rewards - Diablo is the king of loot that's always below your level
  • single protagonist - replay the game if you want a different character
  • pay-to-win - true for ALL browser games; little or no singleplayer content either

Why don't you check out our free version and figure if you like the taste. See below: 

So Riftforge is free?

Yes and no. There are two separate modes on two servers:

Free server

You can start playing Riftforge on our free server. You start with your first 20 story missions for FREE. You can also freely engage in patrols, skirmishes, and multiplayer Arena as well.

There's no pay-to-win but you can purchase extra singleplayer missions with real money. You can also get them by playing the game (rewards), paying in game currency (gold) or by inviting and playing with friends. There are no overpowered items or boosters for sale. The shop only offers missions. Some of Riftforge players prefer paying to save time but most of our top players don't pay a cent.

Current status: Riftforge's free server is in LIVE BETA, after a playtest that lasted 20 months.

Campaign server

We are hard at work preparing a campaign server, so you can play Riftforge the way you play Guild Wars or Diablo. You purchase the complete game and ALL content is available to you to enjoy forever with no extra charges.

This server offers a perfectly level playing field. There are NO microtransactions or premium purchases. The only way to gain advantage over other players is 100% old school: improve your skills and progress your characters.

Current status: Campaign server is 80% complete. 

How much is 80%? We've already done 100+ handcrafted missions in a dozen campaigns. There are 40+ classes that can either be recruited directly or can be received as rewards for completing campaigns. We would like to add three end-game campaigns that culminate in an awesome BOSS battle and this is...

Why we need you

We have been working fulltime on Riftforge for the last four years, paying for everything ourselves. We have pitched it to both investors and publishers. However, as Brian Fargo pointed out in Torment: Tides of Numenera: investors and publishers are only interested in games that are "accessible" and addictive, i.e. Clash of Clans, Candy Crush, or Farmville.

We are turning to YOU and Indiegogo instead. We would like to keep Riftforge a game where skill and dedication matter, an RPG where you have real choices and your characters reflect your specific game style, in short, old school!

We would like to offer you a choice when it comes to payments: get the complete game for a set amount (i.e. campaign mode), or start playing for free and pay when you want to save time (i.e. fremium mode). 

  • Riftforge is an isometric role-playing game with turn-based tactics
  • You start with Commander and 5 customizable troopers (i.e. a "party"). 
  • You complete single-player missions, each with a specific set of challenges.
  • You can also climb the ranks by playing in the multiplayer Arena (optional)
  • Extra content comes as in the form of mission packs. On the free server, they cost gold or cash. On the campaign server, they cost (a lot less) gold.  
  • The game client is HTML5, which means it can be played on any modern browser (computers and tablets recommended, most phones are too small).
  • Campaign edition will be available as a free APPLICATION, downloaded and installed from Google's Web Store. Note: you will be able to play in other browsers but we recommend the application for best gameplay experience.

Here's four things about Riftforge that you are going to love:

  • Deep, tactical combat
    In addition to normal attacks and various passive abilities (e.g. Dodge or Block), Riftforge has over 70 unique skills: direct damage, damage over time, buffs, debuffs, control, relocation, terrain skills (e.g. mines or traps). These are implemented as skill effects, so we can combine effects to create new skills.

    For example, you can pull an enemy close (RELOCATE), poison him (DOT) and blind him (DEBUFF). You can then drink his blood (LIFESTEAL) to get everyone enraged (MASS BUFF), all as one skill. Most skills, however, are kept very straight-forward.

  • Fun, balanced classes
    We've been fine-tuning archetypes for almost 2 years, so you can have a balanced match at the multiplayer Arena.

    Balance doesn't mean weak or bland! You'll still be able to collect over 40 classes. Some are capable of decimating Riftforge’s external enemies almost single-handedly.
    (Yeah, Plaguerats, you just might live up to your name.)

  • New fantasy world
    A huge continent awaits exploration and conquest. Icecrest Bay alone is home to over a dozen hostile species. We are staying away from cliches like pointy ears or hairy feet. Yet, we love the concept of uplifted and hybrid species, so don’t be surprised to see uplifted apes or hybrid spiderfolk.

  • Military style
    We don't like bullshit, so we keep "lore" on the light side. When you meet a vicious Caldarian Secutor, you will care about killing him before he kills your entire troop. Maybe he missed a few hugs as a kid, maybe not. It’s a war! No one has time to stay a while and listen to the Secutor's tragic story of unhappy childhood.

We would like to expand Riftforge combat with three campaigns (a.k.a. quest chains). Each will focus on a certain style of combat. In addition to TWENTY handcrafted missions, these campaigns will include the corresponding rewards: elite troops and rare equipment.

These campaigns will give you a chance to participate actively in Riftforge's development. You will have an active role in developing the story line. You will also be able to choose your preferred opponent in each campaign. Hate spoilers? No worries, we do have a few ideas for surprise endings up our sleeves!

Light campaign

The light campaign stands for agile warriors, most of them female in appearance. They will act as skirmishers, harassers, and stealthy assassins. Your challenge will be to pin down these light attackers and find a way to deal with their swarming tactics. Terrain will also play a part: exploring hidden temples and destroying sacrificial altars.

We would like you to indicate which race you would prefer to serve as common enemy for the campaign. On the left, you have the Syrrans, an amphibian hybrid race. On the right, you have the Aradins, another hybrid race, that's highly mobile.

Heavy campaign

In contrast to the light campaign, the heavy one will focus on strong individual fighters: brutes of incredible strength and battle prowess. The main challenge will be surviving lethal hits, or rather, dancing around them. Capturing mines and looting camp sites will add variety in terms of objectives.

Again, we'd like your call on which will make the best brute! On your left, it's the uplifted race known as Quddar. Their champion is a super-heavy infantryman, almost twice the size of a human. On the right, it's the Vhanar, an uplifted race famous for their tempestuous charges.

Boss campaign

Finally, the campaigns will culminate in a really EPIC confrontation with a monstrous creature of almost godlike power and cunning. The path to the final battle will be terrifying but conquering your fear will be your easiest task. Defeating this monster will be an impressive accomplishment, worthy of a very, very special reward.

Just like with the other campaigns, we would like to get your input on the type of NEMESIS you would love (or hate) to face. Maybe you are partial to Lovecraft's ancient horrors, or maybe you would prefer a comicbook-style villain with super powers.

Expand the game world

Below is a visual representation of what we plan to accomplish with your help. Icecrest Bay consists of nine (3x3) warzones. Riftforge is currently engaged in a vicious campaign in Caldaria (bottom right warzone).

With your help, we'd like to venture beyond Caldaria and explore the neighboring warzones. If you are generous enough for us to go an extra mile, there are 5 additional warzones that we would love to give life to!

Most perks are still available at our site. Join Riftforge and go to Unlock!


Steve Jobs said once that the journey is the reward. Be that as it may...

Help us complete Riftforge and enjoy some amazing rewards. First, there's the game rewards that would come with these epic campaigns: unique troops with new skills, tons of loot, and riches beyond imagining.

Then, there are the goodie bags, i.e. physical rewards like posters and special maps. Finally, you can contribute to the game individually and leave your name in Riftforge history, in the form of a epic weapon, new heroic class, or even a whole new campaign.

Here's a break-down of the stuff you'll find at the various perk levels.

Complete game (campaign editions)

First, there is the no-frills base edition: you download and install the application and play every campaign on our campaign server for as long as you want. This base edition is priced at $29.95 but you can get it for a limited time at a whopping 40% discount.
See our featured perk: campaign edition for just $18.

There are several DELUXE editions that you can choose from as well. There are NO gameplay advantages to purchasing a deluxe edition. They offer the same great content and same level playing field. The difference is that deluxe editions include a number of future updates (expansions) as well as deluxe goodie bags.

Mission packs

A Riftforge mission can come in three different levels: basic, special, and rare. A mission pack contains 7 missions, selected at random from the pool of all available missions. Standard mission packs contain 4 basic, 2 special, and one rare missions. You can purchase them with gold or you can get a set number for free by picking one of the perks.

Note: Since our free server is already live, when you get a perk that contains mission packs, you get them IMMEDIATELY. Just let us know and we'll transfer them to you!

Starter kits

Starter kits are collections of equipment that help you up to about level 15 (level 30 is the maximum). They do not affect game balance in the PvP arena, only your early encounters with the enemies of Riftforge. Overall, you will feel like a friendly veteran gave you his old, battle-tested equipment. Again, these are available IMMEDIATELY.

Unique map

It's inspired by Thorin's treasure map, sold by WETA for $199. The difference is that Thorin's map is drawn by a calligrapher, while Riftforge is hand-drawn by a Master cartographer: Robert Altbauer, a.k.a. Sapiento. 

The map is printed on the same premium 100% cotton archival paper. The distressing and aging is done with inks and pigments, entirely by hand.

The first 50 maps will also feature an exclusive *spoiler* location, unique to your map!

Posters and character artworks

We are including limited edition posters, along with character art done by exceptional fantasy artists, including the extremely talented Stefan Valkanov "Rotorblade" and world-famous Kerem Beyit, currently working for Wizards of the Coast and Blizzard.

Riftforge's hyper-realistic character art really makes for great art prints, on par with anything seen by the great fantasy masters.

Each poster will be signed, with a personal thank you note added.

Ideally, we would like to give you TWO pieces of character art.

That way, you can give as a gift to a friend and keep the one you REALLY like!

Miniatures and terrain trophies

We have contracted an artist with multiple Crystal Brush awards to paint our miniatures.

While the miniatures are pro-painted, terrain... is hand-made right here in the studio. In fact, you'll be able to check your trophy's progress.

Keep in mind, that unlike the miniature (right), your trophy is a significant piece and you will probably need a display stand or a mantelpiece.

That's right! Regardless of your contribution level, there's room for you to go UP.

Use "Share This Campaign" link at the top. It has your personal ID so when you post it, your friends can see Riftforge and get involved too. You get credit for each referral! The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your special prizes!

If you are one of the top referrers, you will be upgraded UP. Not just once but twice. Say you ordered the early Killer pack, you will be upgraded to Monster pack, or if you are real active, all the way to Avatar pack!

Note: with the $1 Founder pack, you can only get upgraded to Six pack, however, with the Six pack, you can get upgraded to Killer pack. Keep those referrers coming! 

Don't forget to check out Riftforge's free server!

Use "Share This Campaign" link at the top. It has your personal ID so when you post it, your friends can see Riftforge and get involved too. You get credit for each referral! The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your special prizes!
If you are one of the top referrers, you will be upgraded UP. Not just once but twice. Say you ordered the early Killer pack, you will be upgraded to Monster pack, or if you are real active, all the way to Avatar pack!Note: with the $1 Founder pack, you can only get upgraded to Six pack, however, with the Six pack, you can get upgraded to Killer pack. Keep those referrers coming! 
Don't forget to check out Riftforge's free server!

story:
The Dream

Ever since Commander Riker found Data in the Holodek, whistling "Pop Goes The Weasle" in the first episode of TNG, a little ten year old boy has dreamt of participating in the birth of Virtual Reality.  You can make that little ten year old boy's dream come true - granted, he's now 37, but that doesn't mean he no longer exists.

What I Need

500 bucks gets me an Oculus Rift DK2, and a little extra to go towards buying a new CPU that will allow me to run things in the Rift at a decent frame rate.  You, in addition to the perks, get a sense of satisfaction knowing that you helped out a swell guy who wouldn't normally have the disposable income neccessary to make his dream come true.

 

No Worries if you can't help out

I've waited over twenty five years for this opportunity.  If I must wait a little longer, so be it.  Hey, theres always the GameFace, right?  :(

story:
What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency that can be used to buy stuff or to trade for physical currency. If you are new to Bitcoin, check out Bitcoin.org. You can also explore the Bitcoin Wiki.

How can I play?

Bitrunner is an app that can help you to find and unearth hidden Bitcoins around the world. You will be able to play using your iPhone, Android phone, Google Glass or a drone.

What is the game play like?

  • The Short Story: You are walking down the street on your way to work when your phone starts buzzing. It’s a message from the Bitrunner App; it says that it found a Bitcoin just a block down from your current location. You make a slight detour and head over there to claim your coin using the Bitrunner app. Now that you’ve got the Bitcoin in your in-game wallet you consult the Bitrunner app again and find the nearest Bitrunner Bank which happens to be located inside coffee shop on the next corner. Your phone alerts you that you have entered the safe zone and can calmly proceed to the bank where you drop most of your loot for safe keeping. It’s been a good day, you’ve earned a venti-sugar-free-non-fat-vanilla-soy-double-shot-decaf-no-foam-extra-hot-peppermint-white-chocolate-mocha-with-light-whip-and-extra-syrup and sip it unhurriedly on your way home.

  • The Longer Story: You’re buddy has been watching a popular hiking trail in the nearby hills, and convinces you that it’s ripe for the picking. The prey is pretty clever so you have to choose the perfect location to build the perfect trap. You find a valley with only 2 exits in the nearby park. You place a hidden remote mine in the middle of the valley in a picnic area and pour some Bitcoin of your own around it as bait... Read more

Is it free to play?

Yes! The game will always be free to download and play, which means you can actually make money by exploring your city and finding the hidden treasure. But, it's a competitive world out there and you'll do much better if you have an edge. You can team up with others and/or buy tools in the game that will give you a leg up on the competition. We will use the majority of these funds to put back into the eco system to make the game more profitable and fun for everyone.

Where can I play?

Just about anywhere on Earth - and once smart devices support IPPS (Inter Planetary Positioning System), the Moon, Mars and other planets. :) In the closed beta version we are likely to start small and focus on a handful of cities. 

What kinds of tools are available?

There are lots of tools that will help you get a leg up on the competition. The tools that will be present in the first version of the game are:

  • Shovel: Normally, without any tools, you're trying to 'dig up' Bitcoins with your 'bare hands'. This can take a while. If you want to get at the treasure faster, and before your competitors do, you'll want a shovel. Shovels come in a variety of sizes and the bigger your shovel, the fast you can dig. Shovels, like most of the tools in the game, have a lifespan and will wear out over time.

  • Telescopes: Telescopes help you see further around you. You'll get an edge by being able to see fields of Bitcoins farther away than your opponents and even see the opponents around you. Telescopes come in various powers, the greater the power the further you'll be able to see. Telescopes too have a lifetime and will stop working optimally after some time.

  • Explosives: For those of you who like a little more aggressive strategy, you can plant mines that explode when an opponent gets within a certain range, or bombs that go off at a certain time of day or can even be detonated remotely by you. Explosives come with different blast radiuses, the larger the blast radius, the more coins from more opponents you'll get to pillage. With mines that are proximity detonated, you'll get an alert on your phone when your mine has been detonated so you can swoop in and collect the booty. There are certain areas where bombs and mines are not allowed to be placed, for example in the immediate vicinity of a Bitrunner Bank. Explosives, if not used for a long time will eventually start rusting and stop working.

  • Armor: Weather you are playing dirty or not, you'll want to be protected from your opponents' aggressions. Buying armor is the best way to do that. Armor comes in various gauges, the stronger the armor, the less loss you'll sustain from a blast. Armor can be used until it encounters a blast stronger than it's current protection strength.

Where can I buy tools?  

To buy tools, you'll visit a Bitrunner store. A Bitrunner store is a virtual store located in a physical space. Depending on how convenient the store is, you may be able to get better or worse bargains on tools. Like banks, stores are a safe zone where no one can plant bombs so have no fear when you go to by your armor to protect you form the cruel world.

Where can I keep my Bitcoins safe while I go out exploring?

One of the risks of collecting lots of coins and carrying them with you, is that if you encounter an opponent's explosive device, some or all or the coins you are carrying may be scattered about the blast area and you, because you're 'dead' won't be able to pick them up for some time. Armor can protect you from loss depending on the size of, and your proximity to the blast. One strategy you can use to keep your coins safe, is to deposit them into a Bitrunner Bank. Bitrunner Banks are virtual banks located in a physical space. You must physically go to the bank location to make a deposit or withdrawal. Zones around banks are a safe from bombs so that no one can perform ATM style holdups with clients carrying lots of treasure to deposit, or having just made a withdrawal. At Bitrunner banks, you can also change your Bitcoins for cash that will be deposited into your real-life bank account in dollars (or whatever the local currency is).  

What are some of the strategies I can use to win?

Bitrunner is social a game that only gets more fun when more people play. The addition of your friends (and maybe enemies) to the game opens some interesting possibilities. Now, you can form alliances, partnerships, wars and truces. How you decide to play is up to you. Whether you are a loner , just a little bit bad, or prefer to play with your friends and split the spoils, there's a strategy for you. Here are some examples that we came up with:

  • Lone Miner: You prefer to go it alone and live and let live. You find fields of Bitcoins, and harvest them. You might even find a field that only you know about and can go back to over and over to reap the benefits.

  • Miner Collective: You’re a social creature and prefer working with people hand in hand to help the collective. You harvest zones in teams and everyone wins. You decide with whom you want to cooperate and how to divide up the fruits of your labor.

  • Cunning Plunderer: You're just a little bit of a bad boy and don't mind using a little force where necessary. You map out your territory and protect it with explosive devices, then swoop in to collect the spoils.

  • The Wolf Pack: You believe in safety in numbers and that the best hunting is done as a team. Like a pack of wolves you and your friends spread out over a territory to discover the most populous and profitable areas. You form plans of attack that take advantage of your numbers. If some of your friends have invested in special tools, like a telescope, they can share their knowledge with the whole team sharing with everyone the benefit of their investment. One for all and all for one!

Of course, these are just examples and we encourage you to find your own strategy!

Where do the Bitcoins come from?

Bitcoins are found forming all over the earth’s surface at random locations, densities, age and value. Bitcoins are placed and managed by our app. Some areas have denser concentrations and other have less. Dense areas can be used for continuous “mining”, where you dig up, collect and go back for more some time later. The funds for them come from the in app purchases and location based partners, which include small businesses, franchises and government tourism agencies.

Can I play with my drone?

What a strange question you ask! Why yes! In Bitrunner, Bitcoins may be hidden at altitude so your drone, jetpack or personal helicopter are the perfect tools to collect them all from the sky. We imagine this feature will be developed in a later iteration.

Why Bitcoin?

As Bitcoin enthusiasts, we believe that virtual decentralized currencies are the future. One of our motivations is to help introduce this concept to young gamers and others who may not have had the opportunity to hear about this wave of the future. We chose Bitcoin of all the virtual currencies as it is the most well known and most mature of all of its peers.

Why we need your support?

We need your support to bring this innovative game to the world. We want to be able to focus our full attention on Bitrunner and develop and perfect the first version. We will use any funds that we gather to develop the software needed to deliver a superb gaming experience and to bootstrap the Bitcoins that will initially be distributed. We estimate that should we be fully funded, our team could develop the first version in about 6 months.

Why Use Indiegogo?

We chose to run a Indiegogo campaign because it offers the ability to go beyond traditional bootstrapping efforts to reach exciting stretch goals so we can implement some of the most exciting features even earlier! In short, the more funding we receive, the more we can offer in the first version launch! Beyond giving us the ability to help fund this effort, Indiegogo lets us connect with you! We wanted to give the community a voice in our product’s creation, and Indiegogo seemed like the perfect way to do that. 

Who is on our team?

Our core team members are Nathan and Simon, both entrepreneurs at heart but with different specialities. Nathan is a software architect with decades of development expertise and Simon is an expert in User Interface and User Experience design. We also have a board of advisers who are experts in bitcoin, psychology and game theory who are at our disposal.

Nathan Pahucki Co-Founder
Software engineer, Entrepreneur 
Linkedin: http://cl.linkedin.com/in/nathanpahucki

  • 20 years of experience in software architecture and development

  • 10 years of experience of team and technical lead Co-Founder of startup with successful acquisition

  • Proud part of the Maker Movement

  • Open Source advocate and contributor

  • Entrepreneur at heart

Simon Forgacs Co-Founder
Ui Ux Designer, Entrepreneur
Linkedin: http://hu.linkedin.com/in/simonforgacs 

  • 8 years of experience in User Interface Design

  • 3 years of experience in User Experience Design

  • 6 years of experience in Project Management

  • Co-Founder of startup and winner of the Start-Up Chile Program

  • Winner of the Bridge Budapest Fellowship

  • Winner of the Website of the Year Award in Hungary

  • Granted researcher at Kitchen Budapest New Media Lab


Advisors

Nicolas Cary CEO at Blockchain.info
Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/ncary

Csongor Baranyai Game Designer, Lecturer
Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/csongorb

Balint Forgacs Cognitive neuroscientist
Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/balintforgacs


Risks and challenges

The risks to the project may come in the from technical hurdles such as accuracy of GPS on some devices, preventing location spoofing and availability of certain features on some wireless carriers. We also realize that it is no small feat to create something that will keep players engaged and excited to play and offer real value to them. While the team has decades of software development and UX experience under their belt, this will be the first massively multiplayer mobile game that we develop. To help mitigate some of the challenges that we will inevitably face, we have assembled an expert advisory panel with education and experience in game theory, finance and psychology. We feel that the usual risks and challenges that normally come with creating and managing a software project are already well addressed by our extensive collective experience in this field.

As Bitcoin enthusiasts, we believe that virtual decentralized currencies are the future. One of our motivations is to help introduce this concept to young gamers and others who may not have had the opportunity to hear about this wave of the future. We chose Bitcoin of all the virtual currencies as it is the most well known and most mature of all of its peers. We recognize that, as with anything this revolutionary, there are inherent risks. There are risks around adoption, infrastructure and fluctuations in value. While the game is premised on the belief that Bitcoin, in the end, will become the de facto virtual currency, there is nothing in the game which requires its use. We can just as easily use any other virtual or real currency, and are agile enough in our thinking that we will adapt as the environment evolves. In fact, to provide the lowest friction experience, tools will initially be purchased in-app, which necessarily involves traditional currencies which we will convert to virtual currency to fund the game eco-system.

Contact

Have any questions or ideas regarding the project? You can contact us at hello@bitrunner.io

story:
The Game!

Erodaxia. A game with untold potential. I don't guarantee the untold potential, but it is a pretty fun game.

The premise of the game is simple: you have a castle you're trying to protect. During the day, enemies come and try to storm the castle. How can you stop these invaders? Simply tap to gun them down! When you survive a wave, the day passes and the night comes. The night is when you have the ability to buy different weapons, upgrade your fortress, buy helpers, and more.

A bare-bones Alpha is available by clicking here!

The campaign! It brings you on a journey through barren wastelands, decimated by the monsters who once did your bidding. You must defend your last fortifications against these terrible creatures.

On a more serious note, this type of game has yet to make its way onto the app store. I saw a niche, and I chose to take it. I assembled a team, I got everything together, and now the only thing I'm waiting on is the funding. And that's where you come in!

We guarantee, if we get funding, we will produce a game. It's not "Might happen". It's "Will happen".

 

The Developers!

 

We are two indie developers trying to make this awesome game a reality, CaptainLepidus (Capt) and SirGuy (Sir). We are very excited about it, as it's the first commercial game we've pushed out. I, Sir, am based in Florida, and it's always sunny around here. Seriously, have you ever been here? No? You should. It's nice. :) Capt' lives somewhere else in the U.S., I dunno. He's not next door, and I see no reason to ask.

 

The Idea!

We discovered that there weren't any enjoyable defense games on the Apple Appstore - and set out to make one. We felt we could make an awesome game, and with your help, we can!

The Money!

 

Alright, well, this is a very sticky topic, right? No one likes talking about money. So let me break this down for you.

We're asking for 1,500 dollars. I have no doubt you guys can make that happen.

Where's the money going?

  • 200 dollars is going towards software.
  • 100 dollars is going towards an Apple License.
  • 450 is going towards Art.
  • The remainging money will be used on a variety of things - extra art (so you can have a bigger, better game), promotion, and future game endeavors.

So, as you can see, it's not like I'm asking for a whole lot.

 

The Risks!

Well, with this service, IndieGoGo, you can ask to keep the money even if you don't get everything you need. I'm not asking for that. If we don't earn the money, I'm dropping the whole project. That's why I need you! If we don't reach the funding that we need, the whole project gets dropped. Just wanted to repeat myself, there.

If we don't raise the money, then the art that's already created gets put on OpenGameArt, the code may or may not get released, and the programmers and artist go separate ways. I would prefer this not happen! To make sure it doesn't, I have some awesome rewards for you guys.

 

The Rewards!

 

You guys get to be part of the creation process! We, the Dev's, are willing to work with you guys to make this game. If you buy anything over 15 bucks, you get to be a part of the team! Not literally, but you do get to work with the Dev's to make something that will be in the final game. So, you get to leave your mark on this game. Want a dinosaur in the game? Buy the 50$ package and request a dinosaur! Want a massive, uber powerful pistol? Buy the 30$ package and request a pistol! We're legit, we want you to work with us.


But, along with these awesome rewards that we're offering, I'd like to do something a little different. See, there's this thing on KickStarter called "Stretch Goals". I would like to add these to our campaign. So, here they are!

 

The Stretch Goals!

1,250$
New enemy group, the Darkness is added.

1,500$
5 new maps are added to the campaign.

1,750$
Secret reward!

2,000$
A second campain is added.

2,250$
Ported to HTML5!

2,500$
A new weapon group, futuristics, is added.

2,750$
Ported to Steam and the Chrome store!

3,000$
Ported to Windows and Macs!

4,000$
Play the enemy! A new campaign where, instead of defending, you attack! It's like a whole new game!

5,000$
Pixel pack! Now, instead of the sprites being 32x32, we upgrade them to 64x64 to add a whole lot more detail! More detail means more AWESOME!

10,000$
Pixel pack! Along with the 64x64 sprites, we add in 128x128 sprites! These allow for HUGE amounts of detail, which will blow your mind!
story_txt:
The Game!
Erodaxia. A game with untold potential. I don't guarantee the untold potential, but it is a pretty fun game.

The premise of the game is simple: you have a castle you're trying to protect. During the day, enemies come and try to storm the castle. How can you stop these invaders? Simply tap to gun them down! When you survive a wave, the day passes and the night comes. The night is when you have the ability to buy different weapons, upgrade your fortress, buy helpers, and more.
A bare-bones Alpha is available by clicking here!
The campaign! It brings you on a journey through barren wastelands, decimated by the monsters who once did your bidding. You must defend your last fortifications against these terrible creatures.
On a more serious note, this type of game has yet to make its way onto the app store. I saw a niche, and I chose to take it. I assembled a team, I got everything together, and now the only thing I'm waiting on is the funding. And that's where you come in!
We guarantee, if we get funding, we will produce a game. It's not "Might happen". It's "Will happen".
 
The Developers!
 
We are two indie developers trying to make this awesome game a reality, CaptainLepidus (Capt) and SirGuy (Sir). We are very excited about it, as it's the first commercial game we've pushed out. I, Sir, am based in Florida, and it's always sunny around here. Seriously, have you ever been here? No? You should. It's nice. :) Capt' lives somewhere else in the U.S., I dunno. He's not next door, and I see no reason to ask.
 
The Idea!
We discovered that there weren't any enjoyable defense games on the Apple Appstore - and set out to make one. We felt we could make an awesome game, and with your help, we can!
The Money!
 
Alright, well, this is a very sticky topic, right? No one likes talking about money. So let me break this down for you.
We're asking for 1,500 dollars. I have no doubt you guys can make that happen.
Where's the money going?

200 dollars is going towards software.
100 dollars is going towards an Apple License.
450 is going towards Art.
The remainging money will be used on a variety of things - extra art (so you can have a bigger, better game), promotion, and future game endeavors.
So, as you can see, it's not like I'm asking for a whole lot.
 
The Risks!
Well, with this service, IndieGoGo, you can ask to keep the money even if you don't get everything you need. I'm not asking for that. If we don't earn the money, I'm dropping the whole project. That's why I need you! If we don't reach the funding that we need, the whole project gets dropped. Just wanted to repeat myself, there.
If we don't raise the money, then the art that's already created gets put on OpenGameArt, the code may or may not get released, and the programmers and artist go separate ways. I would prefer this not happen! To make sure it doesn't, I have some awesome rewards for you guys.
 
The Rewards!
 
You guys get to be part of the creation process! We, the Dev's, are willing to work with you guys to make this game. If you buy anything over 15 bucks, you get to be a part of the team! Not literally, but you do get to work with the Dev's to make something that will be in the final game. So, you get to leave your mark on this game. Want a dinosaur in the game? Buy the 50$ package and request a dinosaur! Want a massive, uber powerful pistol? Buy the 30$ package and request a pistol! We're legit, we want you to work with us.
But, along with these awesome rewards that we're offering, I'd like to do something a little different. See, there's this thing on KickStarter called "Stretch Goals". I would like to add these to our campaign. So, here they are!
 
The Stretch Goals!

1,250$New enemy group, the Darkness is added.1,500$5 new maps are added to the campaign.1,750$Secret reward!
2,000$A second campain is added.2,250$Ported to HTML5!2,500$A new weapon group, futuristics, is added.2,750$Ported to Steam and the Chrome store!3,000$Ported to Windows and Macs!4,000$Play the enemy! A new campaign where, instead of defending, you attack! It's like a whole new game!5,000$Pixel pack! Now, instead of the sprites being 32x32, we upgrade them to 64x64 to add a whole lot more detail! More detail means more AWESOME!10,000$Pixel pack! Along with the 64x64 sprites, we add in 128x128 sprites! These allow for HUGE amounts of detail, which will blow your mind!

story:
• One main story with up to three different endings based on YOUR decisions throughout the game.

  • Seven unique characters to befriend, each with 10 different scenes with multiple endings each!

  • Visit 12 unique locations with several different activities ranging from place to place.  

  • Keep tabs on your friends using the FriendUp app!

  • Balance work, school, and friends all while trying to solve the thefts before your graduate!

Balance everyday life as Tom, a senior at Vulpesden High School. Manage your time carefully between your classes, friends, and your new responsibility of providing for yourself and your sister.

After moving from a large city to a small town, 17-year-old Tom and his sister Angie move to the small town of Shorewood out of necessity. After their parent's death, Tom and Angie's aunt took care of them from another country by sending them checks that she received from the government for being their legal guardian. With Tom’s 18th birthday coming up, their funding will be cut in half, resulting in the relocation to Shorewood.

Shortly after starting school, thefts begin to take place around town. With Shorewood being such a small town and everyone knowing everyone, the suspicion of the “newcomers”  being the culprit of the thefts is unavoidable.

Can you catch the real thief before you're labeled as a criminal and trialed as an adult right after graduation? Or, will you be able to identify the thief, and return what was stolen?


In addition to the digital rewards like the Artbook and Soundtrack, we thought it would be cool to offer a couple other physical rewards. These rewards should only take 2-3 months to be produced and shipped once the IndieGoGo Campaign is over.

Patch

Get this Vulpesden patch to show your school spirit. Put this patch on your jacket and show your Vulpesden spirit while looking snazzy. 

Posters

We are offering two different posters to choose from on select packs.

Option 1 - A poster that shows of the school emblem with your fellow classmates and homeroom teacher.

Options 2 - A poster that includes every character within the game, along with the title/logo of the De-Thieved.

Mystery Poster - A poster that we have yet to design yet and are waiting for our Artist to show us something amazing to offer you. Once the campaign is completed, we will offer you three different versions to pick from.

Additional Rewards

Name within the Credits - No matter how much you support this campaign, we appreciate it and want everyone to see that you helped make this game possible.

Main Character Design Session - Believe it or not, we have yet to design Tom, our Protagonist. That’s where this perk comes into play, well schedule a time that works for you and you can give us your comments on what Tom should look like. You will also get your own section in our Xpresso Games company website.

 

The main production cost of De-Thieved will be going to our Artists to get the best visuals we possibly can for De-Thieved. To finish the game at a product we are willing to ship, we need at least $18,000USD. The actual budget for De-Thieved is $20,000USD, so the closer we have to that, the better!

Base Goal - $18,000USD - Once this goal is met, we will be able to start work on the background art, and build on the foundations of what we have now. Expected to take 1 - 1.5 years of development time.

 

 

Check out the Xpresso Game's company website to learn more about us!

And for extra updates about De-Thieved, take a look at the Dev Blog.

story:
Edemion was an ordinary Indian teenager of 14 years, living in his tribe "Giniu". He was studying military craft and helping with the house. Once upon a time village was attacked by invaders from other tribe - Avahi. Avahi often were raided other tribes in order to rob and capture people. The Giniu tribe was not ready for an attack, so all men of the village were killed, including Edemion’s father. Little Edemion was able to hide, but his mother and brother were captured and taken away. Boy was very sad and angry on himself, but eventually decided to find strength and release the captives from his tribe. From this very moment begins the story of a little warrior and his hard way.

 

 

          It is a Puzzle-Platformer game with elements of survival. Main character - little boy named "Edemion", needs to overcome all obstacles and save his tribe. The whole world in Edemion is filled with mysticism and terrors, so you’d better keep your weapons ready.

 

 

          Player has 3 lives per each episode. Each life gives ability to reborn from last savepoint. Each episode has 4-6 savepoints. If you lose all 3 lives, then have to restart episode from the beginning.

 

For the first release main character will be able to:

  • run in any direction
  • jump and climb over obstacles
  • strike with a weapon, tomahawk by default
  • use ult

          Game story is divided into 15 episodes. Each episode has different location, obstacles, enemies. Initially, all episodes(besides first one) will be closed and to proceed to the next one you need to pass at least 60% of previous one. In the “Episode Selection” screen you will be able to see current progress for each episode

 

Main Screen.

 

“Episode Selection” screen.

 

Screenshots.

 

 

 

 

          40% of game is already done, right now our goal is $10,000, this amount will help us to finish all arts/designs and implement it in nearest future. So if you like the game we will highly appreciate your support, launch game as soon as possible and share gaming experience with the indiegogo world. Care to share?

          Below is detailed chart on what will be spent bakers money.
