story:
Boundless Vengeance


                     


Most unique game fighting experience ever created! 

  • Ergonomic controller that brings Robots to life
  • Portable size 
  • Exciting tournaments
  • Game interface as a multi-feature mobile app 
  • Extra card game placed in the game universe

Our goal is to build a prototype that will serve as a solid basis to build a fully developed product ready to enter the market and astonish you with its uniqueness and real-life experiences. We have technical concept, financial plan, human resources, rich game universe and vast, long-term prospects for development. The only thing we are missing is funds to build it. Let's merge together into the entirely new quality of entertainment!


News section: 

We have a team of great engineers which will bring our robots to life! Check out  "Meet our team engineers" section to find out more!

How it works:

 Boundless Vengeance is an interactive fighting game featuring robots, which brings the world of fighting onto a whole new level. It enables you to control the robot movements by the motion of your body. 

“Boundless Vengeance” set consists of three elements:

        1. Controller       2. Robot       3. Interface

 

Elements cooperation




During fight, all the elements cooperate with each other to create a consistent and complete system, realistic as never before. When a player performs a move, controller continuously reads sensorical indications, recognizes players activity and wirelessly sends according information to the robot. Interpretation algorithm classifies a movement as one of the possible movements (see Robot section) and corresponding servos make the Robot reproduce the movement. Second robot, if not protected, receives a blow and a signal on corresponding sensor is triggered. Information about robot being hit is sent to player’s smartphone and life count on the life bar decreases.


Take the game anywhere!

Controller:


Controllers are elements that enable to reproduce player’s movements by fighting robots and move them around the game area. They are in a form of ergonomic handles as shown below:

Each player is equipped with two controllers (one per hand) and initiate robots movements by moving their hands. To make it possible, controllers perform a periodic 3-axis acceleration measurements in order to recognize your hand's motion and wirelessly send a proper information to Your robots. Thanks to machine learning algorithms, controller adjusts itself to best recognize YOUR OWN manner of performing punches! Additionally one of the controllers (left or right – optionally) has a small joystick on the top to steer the robot around the designated fighting arena. 


Robot:


During gameplay, two robots, controlled by two opponents, fight each other reproducing player’s movements in real time. They are humanoid robots with great resemblance of human both in appearance and dynamics of movements. 

17 servos and the suitable control algorythm will be responsible for rapid and fluent hits and movements. Tactile sensors placed on their body are responsible for detecting the damage inflicted by the opponent in a specific part of body. If hit – a proper signal is sent to a dedicated mobile app (read more in Interface subsection). If a robot falls on the ground it stands up independently in a very effective way. Robots interpret signals sent from controllers and classify them as one of the following movements: 

           a) straight 

           b) hook 

           c) uppercut 

           d) block 

Each of them can be performed on three heights – head, torso and stomach. Every character has also their specific combos realized as unique combinations of the movements presented above. Some movements can be also performed simultaneously (eg. high left punch and low right block etc.)


Interface:


User interface is realized in a form of smartphone application downloadable from our website for every registered user. In the app the player can observe his and his opponents current HP (health points) count, number of fights won and the time left till the end of a round as shown below:




In a final version, sound effects will provide an additional liveliness and dynamics of a gameplay. If a robot gets hit, his HP gets substracted accordingly to the kind of attack performed by a player. A round is won when the opponent loses all of his HP or the time is up. A specific order and gameplay rules give us a fantastic possibility to organize tournaments in which contestants could compete with each other and check both their skills and strategy. Every registered player will have his ranking position which will also be seen on the app.

Meet our heroes:


Ruk, the Eskimo Hunter


Donna Vendetta, the Italian Rebel

Baron  the Aviator, Man Smuggler 

Hektor the Sailor, Cargo Smuggler


Innovative pledge system:

You all must know that we are really grateful for your support. We would like to express this gratitude by providing you some cool gadgets. In our innovative pledge system each tier of prizes can evolve. The more backers pledge for each type of reward, the more every backer gets from the prizes available for specific section. Whenever the new tier is unlocked, prize boost includes not only those who will buy the pledge in the future, but also those who have already paid for the reward! That means it's very likely you will get more than what you paid for! (especially if you pledge us in the early days of the project...)

BOUNDLESS VENGEANCE: THE CARD GAME PLEDGE

Considering that we are gathering money for the construction of a prototype, we know that you will impatiently wait for the launch of commercial production. In the meanwhile we would like you to get acquaintanced with the BV Universe by introducing a BATTLE CARD GAME! Learn more in „Boundless Vengeance: The Card Game” section. 



Notice: This section doesn’t expand after reaching the peak of the tier.

Pledge description:


 1. ARTBOOK 1$:  This pledge gives you the opportunity to complete full digital artbook! Right now every backer will receive one page with graphical visualisation of a hero and a short description. Check the tier status to see how much we need to unlock another character!

2. DIGITAL FAN: Our digital fan pledge will contain every type of goods that can be delivered by e-mail! For now you have guaranteed complete digital art book. Another rewards will be revealed after reaching the peak of the current pledge. 

3. PRINTING FAN: Are you crazy about 3d printing? We would be glad to provide you with a possibilty to print yourself our controller and the characters! Support this pledge to receive more and more files prepared for 3d printing!

[ATTENTION: We kindly remind you that all .stl files are under copyrights of Cy-Tech Motion Team. They can be printed only for a private use. Any commercial use is not allowed.]

4. REAL STEEL: Digital prizes are cool, but those that come in a big box straight to your house are even better! Get yourself a pack of cool gadgets. On the bottom of our pledge section you will find a code to to the objects that are placed inside the chest. Reaching the peak of a pledge, unlocks a new gadget for the real steel fans. 

5. KINGS OF VENGEANCE This is the section, where you will find EVERYTHING that Real Steel pledge has to offer and even more! It is the place where the premium backers meet. We won’t tell you what is the peak of this pledge, but we can reveal that you can evolve it through up to 17 sections…. 

WHAT’S CURRENTLY IN THE POOL?

1. WATER BOTTLE- High quality gadget useful for all sport lovers and travelers.


2. USB BAND – 32GB of portable memory for our fans in a stylish BV band.


3. POSTCARD & CD – Wait for your personal greeting and a classified cd material from our team!


4. PIN – Take your favorite heroes with you, wherever you go!



5. ARTBOOK – An illustrated guide to all of our heroes

&

   CONNECTION MAP - Watch out to not loose yourself into the bounds of              vengeance!



 7. PHOTO BOOK - Get ready to see all of the postcards that we’ve send to greet our backers

.

8. CARDS – Classic game, pimped with the astonishing graphics from our project.



9. KEY CHAIN– a key feature of our project ;)



10. CONTROLLER STL FILE – Do it yourself kit- print as many controller figurines as you want!

[ATTENTION: We kindly remind you that all .stl files are under copyrights of Cy-Tech Motion Team They can be printed only for a private use. Any commercial use is not allowed.]



 11. T-SHIRT – Feel like one of our crew members in a CTM t-shirt!



12. CONTROLER FIGURINE – Simple figurine perfect for every occasion!



13. MMA GLOVES – If you want to win, you'd better stay in shape! Pratice with our training gloves.



Boundless vengeance card game:


In „Boundless Vengeance: The Card Game”, you take part in the martial arts tournament. you become a couch, who has to train and arm his warriors to prepare them for the countless bloody battles. While confronting your opponents you will have to pay attention not only to the health points and energy level of your fighters but also to the connections and bonds between them. As a team leader you should use different tactics to beat up your enemies. You will have to decide either to strengthen up and arm one of your heroes, to make him fight one of your opponents, perform character changes and let your warriors regenerate their forces. Ultimately, number of glory points is what counts. For there can be only one winner...

Boundless Vengeance The Card Game - complete set (view from above)


Types of cards: equipment, action, hero


Coins: energy (yellow), life (red) and glory points (blue)

Meet our team:


From the left: Igor Maciąg, Jakub Wodnicki, Adam Kowalski

I'm Jacob Wodnicki and I am responsible for the creative part of the project. I study italian philology at the Universty of Warsaw. In my free time I write short stories, articles and scenarios. The idea of Boundless Vengeance project was born in my head some time ago and  I've decided to get Adam (our chief engineer) involved. When he has given me the green light (and contributed himself completely to the project) I've started to construct the main plot and the backgrounds of the characters. From the very begining I’ve worked with our artists to provide the visual effect of the Indiegogo Campagin. My main aim in the field of graphics is to create the most attractive, human-like robots and take are of the animations and artworks presenting the universe. In future I plan to assemble a team of best writers and artists I can find to provide you with a huge doze of world class entertainment. Boundless Vengeance is just the beginning. I strongly believe that  our creative technological entertainment will keep you very busy in the upcoming years.

My name is Adam Kowalski and I'm a Chief Engineer in Cy-Tech Motion. I did my BSc degree in Physics at the Univeristy of Warsaw and Mechatronics at Warsaw University of Technology. Then I gained MSc degree in Electrical Engineering at the same University with half a year in Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich. One sunny spring day I met with my friend Jacob, currently our Creative Manager, who said "I got an idea and I need Your help. If it works, it could be huge!". From that day on I gradually transferred his raw concept into a technically applicable idea which finally led us here, on indiegogo. During all that time I knew the most important fact for me about this project - electronics is about designing real, tangible systems with the elastic and changeable properties. It is pure creation and it's only the imagination of the designer that sets the limits! Soon enough you'll see that led by this approach, me and my team will create absolutely astonishing things - the first edition of Boundless Vengeance will be just a takeoff into a long and exciting journey!

My name is Igor Maciag, I'm responsible for business development of the Boundless Vengance project. I'm Bachelor of Arts with a major in Marketing and now I study Economics at Warsaw School of Economics. I'm experienced in start-up's development, so that is why Jacob and Adam met with me one day and shared with me the whole concept of Boundless Vengeance. I was very impressed! I had no doubts that this project is huge and I was sure that I want to be part of it. Without hesitation I told them: "Guys, I'm in!" and we started to plan how to raise funds to build the prototype. I gave them couple of propositions and we decided that Indiegogo is the best choice. Because we hope that you all will be as excited about this project as we are. Next step we took was team building. We involved into this project graphics, designers,  mechanical and electrical engineers.  All of our team members are motivated to provide our future customers with the highest quality product and to create a completely new standard of entertainment. The biggest part of my job was entrepreneurship. There was a lot of business planing aspects I had to deal with. Legal, financial, marketing. I did my job as good as it was possible. And now… We are fully prepared to bring the Boundless Vengeance project to life!

Meet our team engineeers:

Daniel Krzyżanowski 


Tasks in “Boundless Vengeance”: robot programming, hardware and integration

Individual projects: keyboard tester for Motorola MC9090, Li-On accumulator capacity tester, founder of forbot.pl – one of the biggest polish robotics forums

Łukasz Lizak

Tasks in “Boundless Vengeance”: robot mechanics, construction and integration

Individual projects: BSc thesis „Counter of value of selected goods”, bronze medal of international “Brussels Innova”

Our team, responsible for making our robots as dynamic and fluent as possible, has experience in the robotics branch and have already completed several projects together with Daniel being responsible for software and electronic system design and Łukasz for construction.

  •  Rover, which avoids obstacles based on ultrasonic detectors, took part in the Science Festival in 2014. Check out the obstacle avoiding rover video
  • AVG trucks management. 2nd place on University Science Club Fair. Check out the Article (pl).

Damian Tomaszewski

Tasks in “Boundless Vengeance”: controller motion recognition algorithm, hardware; mobile app

Individual projects: T.E.S.L.A – created a smartphone with applications for reading and recognition of sign language. Sensors contained in the smartphone learn, memorize and send commands to the device that are received by the user as a voice message. 3rd place in polish Imagine Cup. Article (pl).


How it proceeds:


Our indiegogo campaign and prototype development is just a beginning! Hard work awaits us in order to create a playable and attractive product and launch it on the market!


Schedule of work on Boundless Vengeance project. From the scratch to full-developed product.

Risks & Challenges:

As the project is big and technologically advanced there are some risks concerning deadlines both in terms of pledges and product development. The biggest risks we are posed to are in the laboratory phase during which there is a chance our robots will malfunction. The possible difficulties we might face are insufficiently dynamic movement, problems with maintaining balance and lack of compatibility with the established standard moves and combinations. In such an event we must rethink the construction of our robot which may result in sufficient delays. Such situations can be avoided by proper management and control points in every phase of product development and tests (both elementary and systematic, after every accomplished task) .

Another risk is connected with divergence between the material presented above and the final result. We will put forth our biggest efforts to make sure our robots are as human like as possible, but this can result in a higher market price and stand in contrast with technical requirements (for instance proper mass distribution). This means we need to work out a reasonable compromise.

Our challenges are mainly related to keeping our robots human like and maintaining fluid movement, which will be achieved by elaborating high-quality control algorithms and a proper mechanical construction. Another challenge is connected to constant development of our plot and game universe, but our creative team will work on it continuously. Apart from that there is the challenge of building a proper tournament community and a system of promotion that encourages you to play Boundless Vengeance both in your houses and on our official events.


Other ways you can help:


Wanna see Boundless Vengeance enter the market but you lack of funds? No problem! For just 1€ You get something more than just a thankful mail. Don't wanna pay? No problem either! Spread the information on to your friends and family! Are you a youtuber? A bloger? You have many followers on fb/insta/twitter? Subscribe us, write about us! Widest possible reach is equally important as backing our indiegogo project.

FACEBOOK:
https://www.facebook.com/cytechmotion/

INSTAGRAM: 
https://www.instagram.com/cytechmotion/

TWITTER:
https://twitter.com/CyTechMotion

YOUTUBE:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPeQA3u1fXLxXvqhheOXN4A

Stay tuned! In our social media we will update the newest info!

Additionally one of the controllers (left or right – optionally) has a small joystick on the top to steer the robot around the designated fighting arena. 



Sample from controller measurement aggregation systemRobot:

During gameplay, two robots, controlled by two opponents, fight each other reproducing player’s movements in real time. They are humanoid robots with great resemblance of human both in appearance and dynamics of movements. 
 3D concept-model for one of our robots17 servos and the suitable control algorythm will be responsible for rapid and fluent hits and movements. Tactile sensors placed on their body are responsible for detecting the damage inflicted by the opponent in a specific part of body. If hit – a proper signal is sent to a dedicated mobile app (read more in Interface subsection). If a robot falls on the ground it stands up independently in a very effective way. Robots interpret signals sent from controllers and classify them as one of the following movements: 
           a) straight 
           b) hook 
           c) uppercut 
           d) block 
Each of them can be performed on three heights – head, torso and stomach. Every character has also their specific combos realized as unique combinations of the movements presented above. Some movements can be also performed simultaneously (eg. high left punch and low right block etc.)

Interface:

User interface is realized in a form of smartphone application downloadable from our website for every registered user. In the app the player can observe his and his opponents current HP (health points) count, number of fights won and the time left till the end of a round as shown below:


In a final version, sound effects will provide an additional liveliness 
and dynamics of a gameplay. If a robot gets hit, his HP gets substracted
 accordingly to the kind of attack performed by a player. A round is won
 when the opponent loses all of his HP or the time is up. A specific 
order and gameplay rules give us a fantastic possibility to organize tournaments in
 which contestants could compete with each other and check both their 
skills and strategy. Every registered player will have his ranking position which will also be seen on the app. 

Meet our heroes:

 

Ruk, the Eskimo Hunter





Donna Vendetta, the Italian Rebel



Baron  the Aviator, Man Smuggler 

Hektor the Sailor, Cargo Smuggler

Innovative pledge system:






You all must know that we are really grateful for your support. We would like to express this gratitude by providing you some cool gadgets. In our innovative pledge system each tier of prizes can evolve. The more backers pledge for each type of reward, the more every backer gets from the prizes available for specific section. Whenever the new tier is unlocked, prize boost includes not only those who will buy the pledge in the future, but also those who have already paid for the reward! That means it's very likely you will get more than what you paid for! (especially if you pledge us in the early days of the project...)
BOUNDLESS VENGEANCE: THE CARD GAME PLEDGE
Considering that we are gathering money for the construction of a prototype, we know that you will impatiently wait for the launch of commercial production. In the meanwhile we would like you to get acquaintanced with the BV Universe by introducing a BATTLE CARD GAME! Learn more in „Boundless Vengeance: The Card Game” section. 




Notice: This section doesn’t expand after reaching the peak of the tier.
Pledge description:

 1.	ARTBOOK 1$:  This pledge gives you the opportunity to complete full digital artbook! Right now every backer will receive one page with graphical visualisation of a hero and a short description. Check the tier status to see how much we need to unlock another character!


Artbook and the connnections map which in case of 1$ pledge will appear as a miniature
2.	DIGITAL FAN: Our digital fan pledge will contain every type of goods that can be delivered by e-mail! For now you have guaranteed complete digital art book. Another rewards will be revealed after reaching the peak of the current pledge. 
3.	PRINTING FAN: Are you crazy about 3d printing? We would be glad to provide you with a possibilty to print yourself our controller and the characters! Support this pledge to receive more and more files prepared for 3d printing!
[ATTENTION: We kindly remind you that all .stl files are under copyrights of Cy-Tech Motion Team. They can be printed only for a private use. Any commercial use is not allowed.]
4.	REAL STEEL: Digital prizes are cool, but those that come in a big box straight to your house are even better! Get yourself a pack of cool gadgets. On the bottom of our pledge section you will find a code to to the objects that are placed inside the chest. Reaching the peak of a pledge, unlocks a new gadget for the real steel fans. 



Real steel fan pledge
5.	KINGS OF VENGEANCE This is the section, where you will find EVERYTHING that Real Steel pledge has to offer and even more! It is the place where the premium backers meet. We won’t tell you what is the peak of this pledge, but we can reveal that you can evolve it through up to 17 sections…. 
Kings of vengeance pledge6. BOUNDLESS CREATOR 

Here is how it works: You send us the artwork and indications for
your personal fighter and our artist will create a 3D model of a figurine. Then
we shall print it and send you the warrior projected by your design.  In the future it might show up in our shop!
[ATTENTION: We kindly remind you that all projects will have the copyrights of Cy-Tech
Motion Team The unique personal model will be send after the campaign but in
the future we might put the design to commercial use.]

7. ULTIMATE BOUNDLESS
CREATOR


As in the BOUNDLESS
CREATOR perk, after you send us the artwork and and indications for your
personal fighter our artist will create
a 3D model of a figurine which will be send to you after the campaign. The
difference is that we will certainly put it in commercial use in our shop! On
the box there will be a description of the creator (which will be you!) and (if
preferable) his/her photo! So that your great dedication shall be promoted
worldwide!
[ATTENTION: We
kindly remind you that all projects will
have the copyrights of Cy-Tech Motion Team The unique personal model will be
send after the campaign but in the future we might put the design to commercial
use.]


WHAT’S CURRENTLY IN THE POOL?
1.	WATER BOTTLE- High quality gadget useful for all sport lovers and travelers.



2.	USB BAND – 32GB of portable memory for our fans in a stylish BV band.




3.	POSTCARD & CD – Wait for your personal greeting and a classified cd material from our team!




4.	PIN – Take your favorite heroes with you, wherever you go!




5.	ARTBOOK – An illustrated guide to all of our heroes
&
   CONNECTION MAP - Watch out to not loose yourself into the bounds of              vengeance!





 7.	PHOTO BOOK - Get ready to see all of the postcards that we’ve send to greet our backers


.
8.	CARDS – Classic game, pimped with the astonishing graphics from our project.






9.	KEY CHAIN– a key feature of our project ;) 





10.	CONTROLLER STL FILE – Do it yourself kit- print as many controller figurines as you want!
[ATTENTION: We kindly remind you that all .stl files are under copyrights of Cy-Tech Motion Team They can be printed only for a private use. Any commercial use is not allowed.]




 11.	T-SHIRT – Feel like one of our crew members in a CTM t-shirt!




12.	CONTROLER FIGURINE – Simple figurine perfect for every occasion!


13. MMA GLOVES – If you want to win, you'd better stay in shape! Pratice with our training gloves.


Boundless vengeance card game:

In „Boundless Vengeance: The Card Game”, you take part in the martial arts tournament. you become a couch, who has to train and arm his warriors to prepare them for the countless bloody battles. While confronting your opponents you will have to pay attention not only to the health points and energy level of your fighters but also to the connections and bonds between them. As a team leader you should use different tactics to beat up your enemies. You will have to decide either to strengthen up and arm one
 of your heroes, to make him fight one of your opponents, perform 
character changes and let your warriors regenerate their forces. 
Ultimately, number of glory points is what counts. For there can be only one winner...

Boundless Vengeance The Card Game - complete set (view from above)


Boundless Vengeance The Card Game - complete set (side view)

Types of cards: equipment, action, hero

Coins: energy (yellow), life (red) and glory points (blue)
Meet our team:



From the left: Igor Maciąg, Jakub Wodnicki, Adam Kowalski
I'm Jacob
Wodnicki and I am responsible for the creative part of the project. I study
italian philology at the Universty of Warsaw. In my free time I write short
stories, articles and scenarios. The idea of Boundless Vengeance project was
born in my head some time ago and  I've
decided to get Adam (our chief engineer) involved. When he has given me the
green light (and contributed himself completely to the project) I've started to
construct the main plot and the backgrounds of the characters. From the very
begining I’ve worked with our artists to provide the visual effect of the
Indiegogo Campagin. My main aim in the field of graphics is to create the most
attractive, human-like robots and take are of the animations and artworks
presenting the universe. In future I plan to assemble a team of best writers
and artists I can find to provide you with a huge doze of world class entertainment.
Boundless Vengeance is just the beginning. I strongly believe that  our creative technological entertainment will
keep you very busy in the upcoming years.
My name is Adam Kowalski and I'm a Chief
Engineer in Cy-Tech Motion. I did my BSc degree in Physics at the Univeristy of
Warsaw and Mechatronics at Warsaw University of Technology. Then I gained MSc
degree in Electrical Engineering at the same University with half a year in
Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich. One sunny spring day I met
with my friend Jacob, currently our Creative Manager, who said "I got an
idea and I need Your help. If it works, it could be huge!". From that day
on I gradually transferred his raw concept into a technically applicable idea
which finally led us here, on indiegogo. During all that time I knew the most
important fact for me about this project - electronics is about designing real,
tangible systems with the elastic and changeable properties. It is pure
creation and it's only the imagination of the designer that sets the limits!
Soon enough you'll see that led by this approach, me and my team will create
absolutely astonishing things - the first edition of Boundless Vengeance will
be just a takeoff into a long and exciting journey!
My name is
Igor Maciag, I'm responsible for business development of the Boundless Vengance
project. I'm Bachelor of Arts with a major in Marketing and now I study
Economics at Warsaw School of Economics. I'm experienced in start-up's development, so
that is why Jacob and Adam met with me one day and shared with me the whole
concept of Boundless Vengeance. I was very impressed! I had no doubts that this
project is huge and I was sure that I want to be part of it. Without hesitation
I told them: "Guys, I'm in!" and we started to
plan how to raise funds to build the prototype. I gave them couple of
propositions and we decided that Indiegogo is the best choice. Because we hope
that you all will be as excited about this project as we are. Next step we took
was team building. We involved into this project graphics, designers,  mechanical and electrical engineers.  All of our team members are motivated to
provide our future customers with the highest quality product and to create a
completely new standard of entertainment. The biggest part of my job was
entrepreneurship. There was a lot of business planing aspects I had to deal
with. Legal, financial, marketing. I did my job as good as it was possible. And
now… We are fully prepared to bring the Boundless Vengeance project to life!
Meet our team engineeers:

Daniel Krzyżanowski 




Tasks in “Boundless Vengeance”: robot programming, hardware and integration
Individual
projects: keyboard tester for Motorola MC9090, Li-On accumulator capacity
tester, founder of forbot.pl – one of the biggest polish robotics forums 
Łukasz Lizak
Tasks in “Boundless
Vengeance”: robot mechanics, construction and integration
Individual
projects: BSc thesis „Counter of value of selected goods”, bronze medal of
international “Brussels Innova”
Our team,
responsible for making our robots as dynamic and fluent as possible, has
experience in the robotics branch and have already completed several projects
together with Daniel being responsible for software and electronic system
design and Łukasz for construction.



 Rover, which avoids obstacles based
on ultrasonic detectors, took part in the Science Festival in 2014. Check out the obstacle avoiding rover video


AVG trucks management. 2nd place on University
Science Club Fair. Check out the Article (pl).

Damian Tomaszewski


Tasks in “Boundless
Vengeance”: controller motion recognition algorithm, hardware; mobile app

Individual projects: T.E.S.L.A – created a smartphone with applications for
reading and recognition of sign language. Sensors contained in the smartphone
learn, memorize and send commands to the device that are received by the user
as a voice message. 3rd place in polish Imagine Cup. Article (pl).


Ways of development:
What we present you is just a first edition of Boundless Vengeance. 
This project creates huge perspectives of development practically in 
every on its aspects. In a future, we wish to focus on developing the design of a robot to enable it to perform more and more complicated and spectacular movements and to make players use other parts of the body to influence robots movements. On software level we aim to perfect our algorithm to make the movements more fluent and dynamic and even more similar to human ones. We will also work on developing artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms
 to make the robot more aware of their own actions and interaction with 
an environment deepening the marvelous bond shared by a player and a 
robot.

How it proceeds:

Our indiegogo campaign and prototype development is just a beginning! Hard work awaits us in order to create a playable and attractive product and launch it on the market!





Schedule of work on Boundless Vengeance project. From the scratch to full-developed product.

    Risks & Challenges:  
As the project is big and technologically advanced there are some risks concerning deadlines both in terms of pledges and product development. The biggest risks we are posed to are in the laboratory phase during which there is a chance our robots will malfunction. The possible difficulties we might face are insufficiently dynamic movement, problems with maintaining balance and lack of compatibility with the established standard moves and combinations. In such an event we must rethink the construction of our robot which may result in sufficient delays. Such situations can be avoided by proper management and control points in every phase of product development and tests (both elementary and systematic, after every accomplished task) .
Another risk is connected with divergence between the material presented above and the final result. We will put forth our biggest efforts to make sure our robots are as human like as possible, but this can result in a higher market price and stand in contrast with technical requirements (for instance proper mass distribution). This means we need to work out a reasonable compromise.
Our challenges are mainly related to keeping our robots human like and maintaining fluid movement, which will be achieved by elaborating high-quality control algorithms and a proper mechanical construction. Another challenge is connected to constant development of our plot and game universe, but our creative team will work on it continuously. Apart from that there is the challenge of building a proper tournament community and a system of promotion that encourages you to play Boundless Vengeance both in your houses and on our official events.

Other ways you can help:

Wanna see Boundless Vengeance enter the market but you lack of funds? No problem! For just 1€ You get something more than just a thankful mail. Don't wanna pay? No problem either! Spread the information on to your friends and family! Are you a youtuber? A bloger? You have many followers on fb/insta/twitter? Subscribe us, write about us! Widest possible reach is equally important as backing our indiegogo project. FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/cytechmotion/INSTAGRAM:  https://www.instagram.com/cytechmotion/TWITTER: https://twitter.com/CyTechMotionYOUTUBE:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPeQA3u1fXLxXvqhheOXN4AStay tuned! In our social media we will update the newest info!

story:
CREATE YOUR
NETWORK

CHAT FEATURE
END-TO-END
ENCRIPTION

READY FOR
RELEASE
Are you sick of always playing with strangers, noobs, infants? Well now you can build your team based on the gamer's profile. myG allows you to rate gamers, see their gaming history and you choose who you want to play with. All in a very simple and slick, one page format.
Most games allow you to find and schedule matches ingame but what if you play more than one game? You need to build and maintain multiple networks. Sigh! Wouldn't it be great to have a tool that allows you to create/search games based on in-game criteria. Now you do!
Using the Find Gamers feature in myG you can search based on a plethora of fields. Are you looking for someone over 18 with a microphone, who has a KD of at least 1.5 in Warzone? myG allows you to easily filter out the trolls and message/play with like minded gamers.
Build your gaming resume. Connect, share and improve your gaming life. myG's profile page allows you to collate your gaming achievements all in one place. Create posts which your friends and colleagues can see and admire.
We know first hand how hard it is to get paid in this industry. myG allows you to monetise from the traffic you generate. With affiliate links as you start trending so does your bank account. For the initial release we will allow you to create affiliate links in the platform but as we grow we'll focus on a host of other options to help you monetise from your brand.
story_txt:
CREATE YOURNETWORK
CHAT FEATUREEND-TO-ENDENCRIPTION
READY FORRELEASE








Are you sick of always playing with strangers, noobs, infants? Well now you can build your team based on the gamer's profile. myG allows you to rate gamers, see their gaming history and you choose who you want to play with. All in a very simple and slick, one page format.



Most games allow you to find and schedule matches ingame but what if you play more than one game? You need to build and maintain multiple networks. Sigh! Wouldn't it be great to have a tool that allows you to create/search games based on in-game criteria. Now you do!





Using the Find Gamers feature in myG you can search based on a plethora of fields. Are you looking for someone over 18 with a microphone, who has a KD of at least 1.5 in Warzone? myG allows you to easily filter out the trolls and message/play with like minded gamers.



Build your gaming resume. Connect, share and improve your gaming life. myG's profile page allows you to collate your gaming achievements all in one place. Create posts which your friends and colleagues can see and admire.





We know first hand how hard it is to get paid in this industry. myG allows you to monetise from the traffic you generate. With affiliate links as you start trending so does your bank account. For the initial release we will allow you to create affiliate links in the platform but as we grow we'll focus on a host of other options to help you monetise from your brand.

story:
AGE FO BARBARIAN 2

Age of Barbarian II is a game for PC that is different and provocative. It is a game, I wish, would be considered a B-Game, but in a good way. Now, I'll explain why.

I am Christian Fanucci. I am the founder of Crian Soft, a small company that develops software and video games. As Bela Lugosi would say, "It is me who pulls the strings" of Age of Barbarian, "I move them."

I've always been a big fan of the Sword and Sorcery genre, Pulp, B-movies and games of the 80s and 90s.

Inspired precisely by these timeless classics, Age of Barbarian tries to recreate the healthy atmosphere of B-movie that all fans of the genre are aware of. Graphically, the game tries to be as close as possible to an on-screen representation of the various illustrations of the great artists of the genre, such as Frazetta and Buscema.

When Age of Barbarian was proposed to the public in 2011, it had quite an impact, an enthusiastic feedback, some good reviews but also controversy, especially for the contents, especially for the half-naked girls in the game. But talking about a sword and sorcery game, one can not miss such items as the big and muscular barbarians, the succinct girls, the hordes of bloodthirsty monsters, all the splatter and a pretty epic story and the addictive soundtrack! 

In Age of Barbarian II, all these elements will be brought more in evidence than in the first game. Each element of the game will be implemented and citations to the various works of the Sword and Sorcery genre will be numerous.

WHAT DO WE NEED?

$ 12,000 (less the rate of Indiegogo and taxes) is pretty much the base figure. It is the sum necessary for the realization of a game like Age of Barbarian II. The expenses are, in fact, many (to purchase music, sounds, software, hardware, artistic work of others, translations, etc. . ) And the budget is absolutely realistic and aimed at the game development. All the sleepless nights .. I got them !

Help me spread the news too. You can also do that using Indiegogo sharing tools .

With your support, Age of Barbarian II will be developed and you will be able to play in all its bloody , barbaric, naked and raw splendor ! Help me create the perfect B- Game !

AGE OF BARBARIAN 2 - FEATURES

1) SETTING

" In a world where reality blends with dreams, an ancient revolting and unmentionable evil has woken up, bringing with it death and chaos.  Only courage, force and steel can bring back order. "

Age of Barbarian is set in a world that is primordial and sinister but, at the same time, also alive, sensual, raw and full of wonderful mysteries and terrible secrets.

Bejeweled cities rise up on the edge of fiery deserts.  Volcanic mountains frame primordial forests while inside the earth and in the heart of the forests, horrific human sacrifices take place in name of obscene and evil divinities.

1) GRAPHIC

Age of Barbarian II will have much better graphics and will be more polished than its predecessor.
This is not only thanks to the experience I have gained with the first game, but also thanks to the ability I have to dedicate myself full-time to the project, to the prospect of being able to purchase more professional software and hardware and to be able to collaborate with other graphic artists.

3) EXPLORATION & INTERACTION

About the explorative side , you can jump and hang on to ledges on the fly, just like in the game Prince of Persia. You will also be able to use interactive elements such as vines and stairs.
I also thought that in order to facilitate the "platform" parts, that the framing of the game could be moved in order to make it more fun and spectacular for the player to overcome those sessions .

The game will also feature the ability to interact and ride beasts. Imagine Rahaan or Sheyna riding a huge saber-toothed tiger or a Dinosaur. Riding beasts could be useful not only to move quickly , but also to fight and to tear the enemies opposing you.


4) COMBAT

Regarding the combat aspect, in Age of Barbarian II, you will be able to use different weapons like swords , axes or hammers. They will have devastating effects on different enemies. In addition, through the incision of runes on those weapons , you can boost or change how they will act in the game. 

Of course, there will also be death blows with which it will be possible to decapitate or literally cut your adversaries to pieces with graphics that leave little to the imagination.

5) ROLE PLAYING ELEMENTS

Implementation of the role playing elements. Those will also include some dialogue with other characters . You can explore the city, buy and sell items, visit taverns, meet non-player characters and be involved in small quests .


6) HUGE WORLD MAP

It will be possible to freely explore this world, interacting through use of a map that allows you to take any road or direction.  The player will decide the road to follow!

Besides, the game will use a system of random creation of some elements and dungeons, ensuring replayability

story:
Hello to everybody,
;P Black Tongue Games is a private Game-Label
founded by two enthusiast Coders in Vienna Austria.

We started this campaign to become this RETRO Game true for
iOS/Android/Web and PC Desktop Players who want to
have their fun back on shooting up little nasty Space-Ships.

This game is already in a playable Prototype State.
Before we can finalize the remaining Levels we need funds to pay the license fees for the unity engine and the fees for the Artists who are creating the sound and graphic assests.

All arts in the Prototype Video are already payed out by the Developers itselfs.
With a total of additional $5000 we can finish the game and  release it on three platforms at the same time.

Contribute to Tackatakata and get a really nice playable shoot'm up with a classic and modern designed game experience.

We added a lot of new game features like quests and missions, you will face gravitybombs and a bunch of angry bosses.

 

Shoot'em UP!
Blacktongue Games
story_txt:
Hello to everybody,;P Black Tongue Games is a private Game-Labelfounded by two enthusiast Coders in Vienna Austria.We started this campaign to become this RETRO Game true for iOS/Android/Web and PC Desktop Players who want to have their fun back on shooting up little nasty Space-Ships.This game is already in a playable Prototype State.Before we can finalize the remaining Levels we need funds to pay the license fees for the unity engine and the fees for the Artists who are creating the sound and graphic assests.
All arts in the Prototype Video are already payed out by the Developers itselfs.With a total of additional $5000 we can finish the game and  release it on three platforms at the same time.
Contribute to Tackatakata and get a really nice playable shoot'm up with a classic and modern designed game experience.
We added a lot of new game features like quests and missions, you will face gravitybombs and a bunch of angry bosses.
 
Shoot'em UP!Blacktongue Games

story:
Summary

Words in Pictures by Finger Talks

PICTURES, WORDS, MESSAGES, AGENDA: the first app expressly made to give parents, teachers and specialists an effective and portable tool for visual communication to the child or adult suffering from Autistic Spectrum Disorders or intellectually impaired.

People with autism denote troubles understanding concepts that can be solved only with the aid of pictures in support of verbal codes. Words in Pictures use the mobile phone and tablet to allow the users to carry along and to quickly show the child the cards that link the image to the concept, helping autistic kids to live in a world more understandable and predictable and to MAINTAIN A CONTACT with parents and people around them.

>>> The BEST ITALIAN APP for Patients AboutPharma Digital Awards 2013<<<

                             

About Us

Born (with the Italian name Immaginario) from an Italian team of experts in mobile marketing & development (Finger Talks) and speech therapists (Parole Tue) with the collaboration of neuropsychiatrists, educators and parents from all over the world who joined in both the design and the test (network), the app is now available on the App Store in 5 LANGUAGES and with advanced features.

The campaign goal

Give your contribution to the growth of the project and help us to extend the opportunity to use this effective tool to families who have access to ANDROID DEVICES (usually more affordable)

Project description

Researchers and therapists say autistic children, independent of their intelligence, have trouble understanding of verbal concepts. They're not very good at recognizing social cues — or even the spoken words — that most people take for granted when they communicate. This can be overcome only by the use of pictures to support verbal codes.

"I THINK IN PICTURES. Words are like a second language to me. I translate both spoken and written words into full-color movies" this is how Temple Grandin - novelist diagnosed with autism - describes her way of thinking.

Words in Pictures (WP) is a COMPANION, A DAILY HELP: it allows a person to bring with them on their iPhone or iPad the cards that link image and concept to be shown to the child. The cards work as the "words" of  visual communication. One can easily search, build messages and quickly plan their day on the agenda. The app is developed bearing in mind the needs of those who want to interact with the autistic person.

Its GOAL is to enrich the communication with visual supports, in order to aid the autistic person in the understanding. 

Visual communication is widely recognised as an effective way to support understanding. Nevertheless, the autistic child often lacks of  intentional communication.

The PECULIARITY of the app lies in its focus on the practical use by the adult. The app sets a gradual path in the communication exchange which starts from the adult and is oriented to the child. The emphasis is put on the sharing of meaning; then the autistic person is encouraged to an "outgoing" active involvement.

Perfect for use at school, at home, as part of therapy, or on the move, the app is conveniently divided in SECTIONS with rapid access to features for parents and specialists and appealing graphics for the child:

Key Advantages

  • fast and easy communication - search for a picture by word or category; make a message with instant translation into symbols; word-predictor; archive for the most used words, messages and days.
  • comprehensive - understanding, comprehension, visual scheduler, social rules and tasks analysis. 
  • reliable - expert's advice,  thorough beta testing,  high quality pictures (SymbolStix™ library)
  • customizable - card making with symbols, photos, text, audio and user-defined categories.
  • engaging - the child can choose by a tap the favourite activity or snack - possibility to add markers on the performed tasks (the "v" for "done", the "flip card", the "x" for "don't do")
  • practical -  images-on-the-go on your mobile, integrated step-by-step graphic guide.

Testimonials

"In the last years, far from home without velcro, paper, glue and scissors I felt without the means to let P. understand what to do. With Words in Pictures even the simpler messages become clear. I used many cards with photos. It's wondeful! What I wanted to explain has finally become free from ambiguities and misunderstandings. We could understand each other." (A mum)

Other stories: link

Video (Italian with English subtitles)

Your help

The app, launched for iOS in March 2013, has obtained ENTHUSIASTIC FEEDBACKS from the users (5 stars on iTunes) and the medical-scientific community and has won the Italian AboutPharma Digital Awards for the “Best App for Patients” in October 2013 (with the Italian name “Immaginario”).

Since we take in high consideration the customers satisfaction, we collected users needs & comments to develop an enhanced version of the iOS app that will be published in January 2014 and includes translations in 5 languages and new improvements that will increase usability and customisability.

We received many requests for an ANDROID VERSION as well: Android devices are, indeed, usually more affordable for the families.

We decided to ask your contribution to develop, in a shorter time, a further version of Words in Pictures available for the main devices supporting an Android Operating System, extending - to more parents, specialists and educators - the possibility to use this effective app with their kids.

What we offer

The Android app - as already happens for the Apple one - will be available for free download, including 2 weeks of trial. Later, users can buy the most suitable subscription for their needs: 3, 6, 12 months.

EXCLUSIVE OFFER for our Indiegogo contributors: the pre-purchase of a 12 months subscription to the Android app. Subscriptions have no automatic renewal: after 1 year you will decide if you want to keep going to use the app and buy a new subscription with the preferred length or stop using the app. Please, leave your email when you give your contribution.

Contribution options 

(NB: If we do not reach the goal your contribution will be REFUNDED)

20€: SUPPORTER, you are now part of our community!
A sincere thank you + if you are in Milan on MARCH 22 you can take part to PAROLE TUE lecture - EXCLUSIVE FOR OUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTORS - “Il logopedista dal computer al tablet” (in Italian) click here for info and application
50€: YEARLY SUBSCRIPTION, be the first!
Once we will reach the goal and develop the app (expected June 2014) you will receive by email our WP START KIT (available languages: IT, ES, ENG, FR, DE) containing:

  • app link and download instructions
  • brief introduction to the app
  • unique code & instructions to unlock the yearly subscription
  • useful links and contact info
500€: BRONZE SPONSOR, let your generosity be public!
WP START KIT + a big and sincere thank you on our Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn pages and in a dedicated section of the International website
1,000€: SILVER SPONSOR, increase your visibility!
All of the above + special mention as "Silver Sponsor" in a dedicated section of the Android App
3,000€: GOLD SPONSOR, help your promotion!
WP START KIT + Your company/association/club logo promoted as "Gold Sponsor" on our Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn pages, and in a dedicated section of the International website & Android App
5,000€: PLATINUM SPONSOR, let's get personal!
As PERK 4 + 30 min. Skype or phone call (in IT or ENG) with our team: receive a "personal thank you", an introduction to the project and a first explanation of the app usage


*** if you are an EU resident or your company/organisation is based in EU you will receive an email from Finger Talks asking for your fiscal code/VAT number. We will use this information to create and send you the invoice for your purchase***

Other Ways You Can Help

WHAT IF I AM NOT INTERESTED TO USE THE ANDROID APP? 

You can contribute with a SUPPORTER DONATION of 20€

OR you can purchase the Android app subscription as a GIFT for someone else (you can share the code you will receive).

If you use an iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch you can contribute to the cause purchasing the existing iOS version of the app on the App Store: link.

PLUS you can help us in several ways:

  • Share our project page with your friends on social networks (Facebook, Twitter,etc.), by email, in person
  • Write about us on your blog, on forums, mailing lists, groups, etc…
  • If you are a member of an association or a club, suggest to become an official sponsor of this project: your logo will be promoted on our website and app (PERK 4 & 5)
  • Ask your company to be a sponsor: your company logo will be promoted on our website and app (PERK 4 & 5)

Contacts

Send a message to contatti@fingertalks.it to get further information on the methodology and the project. We will be happy to answer all your questions!

Conclusions: the world needs all kinds of minds

Temple Grandin, diagnosed with autism as a child, talks about how her mind works -- sharing her ability to "think in pictures," which helps her solve problems that neurotypical brains might miss.

story:
JTFM Enterprises / Die Waffenkammer 1/56 scale M26 Pershing Tank.

JTFM Enterprises / Die Waffenkammer has been producing finely crafted 1/56 scale resin cast WWII AFV's for the 28mm wargaming and collecting community for over 5 years. 

To enhance our growing line up of vehicles we would like to fund this new master for a 1/56 scale M26 Pershing tank.

In return for your contribution you will receive a copy of the M26 Pershing tank or a vehicle or figure set from our existing line up.

Our intentions.

The funding drive goal is $3000.00 CAD. The raising of this amount will allow us to have a highly detailed master constructed. It will then take us through the process of creating a secondary master, the construction of all production moulds, and then into full production.

Certain contribution amounts will entitle the contributor to receive a copy of the M26 Pershing tank.

With the addition of this vehicle to our catalogue it will allow WWII wargaming enthuiasts to field the M26 Pershing tank in their campaigns. It will also give 28mm collectors a 1/56 scale version of this vehicle to add to their collections.

Spread the word.

This is a first for us. If this initial project works it will give us the ability to launch further projects to increase the variety of vehicles that we can make available to the WWII gaming community.

So if you have the interest and/or know of others who are WWII gamers or collectors help us by spreading the word !

Shipping is included in all of the perk packages.

story:
How often do you check your phone to see that – well – nothing happened and you didn't even check the time? Smartphone users do that approximately 150 times a day. Wouldn't it be cool if you actually had a reason to check your phone every once in a while? We had the same problem and we decided to make a game. A game that takes into an account our constant needs to check our phone and give it a purpose.

Kawboom is a turn-based competitive mobile game, where friends plant bombs to each other. It's an addictive strategy that brings friends together, stimulates the brain and kicks boredom in the ass. In Kawboom you plant bombs on your friends' mobile phones. If they discover your attack in time, they can use your bomb and plant it on theirfriends’ mobile phones totally unexpected. If they fail to catch the attack in time: KAWBOOM!

Competing with friends is the greatest source of fun there is. Remember the unforgettable feeling when you scored the last point in a match against your best friend or when you outmaneuvered your closest family member in an epic board game. But the sad truth is, that enjoying a good competition with your friends is often very expensive, sometimes dangerous and it’s always a nightmare to coordinate the time that is suitable for everyone. Kawboom is a free to play, you have to be really clumsy to actually get hurt by it and best of all, your friends are always available.  




Like many great ideas, the concept of Kawboom has been inspired by real life events. One of our favorite childhood games was to pretend, that a ball was a bomb and who ever could not pass it in 3 seconds to the next person playing, lost that round. It was a very simple concept which kept us occupied for hours. As children, we loved the competitiveness it brought out of us. We wanted to bring the same experience and fun through mobile phones. We kept the original idea of passing on bombs, but made it even more thrilling by expending the original gameplay with power ups, shields, a charming story with funny characters.



This is a story of how a player gets his first bomb after login.

... Once upon a time on the other side of the universe there was a little planet called Kawboom. Darwin was not around to explain evolution, so the inhabitants evolve into little bombs. They found out that is incredibly funny to explode in the middle of the most serious situations. But a little bomb named Gapo was too little to explode. All the other bombs made fun of him and he decided to put an end to it. He jumped into an inter-dimensional wormhole and was transported to Earth where he was able to explode, because of the enriched oxygen environment. He can finally start pranking others. All he needs now is a partner with lots of friends ...




After downloading the game you are asked to sign in with your Facebook account. Kawboom is meant to be played with your friends and we use Facebook so your friends are instantly in the game. Each new player gets one bomb that has a timer with one hour on the clock. Once you select a Facebook friend, the bomb leaves your phone and appears on his. The timer starts running. Now your friend has to open the application and discover the attack in time. If he discovers the attack before the timer runs out, he can plant your bomb to another friend. When the bomb runs out of time it explodes on friends phone and takes him out of the game for 10 minutes. Everybody who passes the bomb forward is rewarded with BoomCoins. The original owner of the bomb and the last friend, that planted the bomb before explosion, get double amount of BoomCoins.

To make it more of a strategy and not just a game about opening the application on time and select another friend, there is a rule, that each player has only 4 attacks. Once you use an attack, you have to wait for 30 minutes to get a new attack. This rule forces you to think about which bombs to keep and which to pass on. Because, if you pass on 4 bombs and use all 4 attacks at once and then you get a bomb whit in just 10 seconds on the clock you have no chance to defend yourself.

But the coolest features are power-ups and shields. Each bomb has a slot, where a power up can be added. You buy power ups with BoomCoins that you earned with successful attacks. Before you plant a bomb to a friend, you get the option to add a power up to the bomb if the slot is still empty. A bomb with an attached power has special abilities. For example: One of the power ups is called “Money Sucker”. This power up steals one BoomCoin for each minute, from the player, where the bomb is planted and gives it to the player that attached the power up. Power ups force players to use different strategies with different bombs. Shields can also be bought with BoomCoins and counter the effects of power-ups.



Do you wonder how Kawboom feels like when you play it on the office? Have a look:





Thank you! Every penny counts! You receive a cute Kawboom Facebook and Twitter cover, a desktop picture for your computer, emails with our news, progress and updates!



You receive 3 different badges with cute Kawboom designs. 



You receive an explosive phone sleeve to protect your phone from scratches.  

You receive a cute Kawboom pillow to rest your head on. Dimensions of the pillow are 25cm X 25cm X 10cm.  



The cutest little plush bomb that you have ever seen! Little Gapo is awesome for little kids and for those, young by hearth, to cuddle and play with. Plush toy height: 20 cm. 

Explosive T-Shirt! You can choose between 3 attractive designs that suit your soul! (female and male sizes). All three designs are available on shirts in all colors and sizes. 



The big plush bomb! Be the first to get our plush toy Gapo! Plush toy height: 35cm. Gapo will also send you a Facebook friend request!


Get it all, plus little more. You receive all the items. We will also include your name in the game as special thanks. And one more thing, when you sign in to the game 1.000 BoomCoins will be waiting for you.We will also add cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom and T-shirt to your deal.



We design a bomb upon your wishes! You name it, we design it! Only you will be able to use it and all your friends will be jealous!

You will also receive:

Your name in game under 'about', cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom Plush Toy, T-shirt and 1000 BoomCoins.




Spend a week with Kawboom team in Slovenia. During the unforgettable week we will take you sightseeing, you will meet the Slovenian start-up community and go partying. You will be able to design and name one game character bomb that everyone will play with! Perk includes an airplane ticket from the nearest and largest airport at your location for one person, accommodations for 6 nights and 7 days for one person and daily trips to the most beautiful places in Slovenia.

You will also receive all products in person:

Your name in game under 'about', cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom Plush Toy, T-shirt, 5000 BoomCoins and a great holiday option.




Klemen Plazar | Front-end developer |

Professional karate competitor and Microsoft technology developer ninja. He is responsible for bringing the game to Windows Phone.

Aljaž Babič | Back-end developer |

Prefers code to cats. He is responsible for the cloud and the back end services that make Kawboom run.  

Manja Potočnik | Designer |

The creative person that inspires everyone. She is responsible for the little cute bombs and all other designs.  

Niko Senekovič | Marketing manager |

It’s his fault you are reading this. He is responsible for developing and executing online and offline marketing strategies

Aljaž Daković | Product manager |

Agile and SCRUM project management specialist. He is responsible for making it all work.

. . .

The Kawboom team is an explosive mixture of developers, entrepreneurs with a designer on top. We loved working with each other on many different projects, so we decided to start a project of our own. Games have always been our passion. We had a simple, but very engaging concept, to work with. In no time Kawboom was born and now we want to take it a step forward.



We know how to make and launch the game, but we feel we can accomplish a lot more with Kawboom. We believe that our cute designs deserve a place in the real world as cute toys, phone covers, pillows.

We partnered up with manufactures and we are happy with the prototypes they sent us. Now it’s time to make orders, but the cost of the first minimum order that we need to launch in our online store is 5000$. We need your support to realize the full poetical of Kawboom. Join the explosive fun! 



The future is near and it’s going to be awesome:

Missions - Bombs are characters in the game. Each bomb has a fun and a charming back-story. Also every bomb you meet in the game will give you missions. Missions will give you a specific goal, such as determining exact player you need to take out. Missions will give players a bigger sense of purpose and a batter way to get experience points witch are essential for player progression. 

Group play  - In Kawboom you play against all of your friends. You probably have closer friends that will make great allies. With group play you will be able to form teams that will share missions. Teams will also take on other teams in epic battles. 

Tournaments - Currently you can play only against your friends, but what if you want to compete against players around the world? We are working on a tournament system that will offer you just that. Scheduled tournaments will be short events that anyone would be able to join. Winners split the entry fee (BoomCoins). Gameplay will be faster and better geared for short events. 



Developing for multiple mobile platforms is the biggest challenge we are facing. It's absolutely massive for a small team like ours. We have the experience to bring the game to Windows Phone and Android, but lack of experience for IOS development. The biggest risk is that we will not be able to simultaneously deploy the game and some users will have to wait a little for the game to come to their mobile operating system. 


................................................................................................................................


If you like Kawboom project and don't have an option to support us financially, that's ok! We still love you! :) You can help us many other ways! Share our Indiegogo video & campaign page, Kawboom Facebook page, all Kawboom photos and videos, tell all your friends about Kawboom! And last, but not least: PLAY KAWBOOM ON YOUR SMARTPHONE! 

. . .

ASK US A QUESTION!
