Competing with friends is the greatest source of fun there is. Remember the unforgettable feeling when you scored the last point in a match against your best friend or when you outmaneuvered your closest family member in an epic board game. But the sad truth is, that enjoying a good competition with your friends is often very expensive, sometimes dangerous and it’s always a nightmare to coordinate the time that is suitable for everyone. Kawboom is a free to play, you have to be really clumsy to actually get hurt by it and best of all, your friends are always available.  

Like many great ideas, the concept of Kawboom has been inspired by real life events. One of our favorite childhood games was to pretend, that a ball was a bomb and who ever could not pass it in 3 seconds to the next person playing, lost that round. It was a very simple concept which kept us occupied for hours. As children, we loved the competitiveness it brought out of us. We wanted to bring the same experience and fun through mobile phones. We kept the original idea of passing on bombs, but made it even more thrilling by expending the original gameplay with power ups, shields, a charming story with funny characters. 

This is a story of how a player gets his first bomb after login.
... Once upon a time on the other side of the universe there was a little planet called Kawboom. Darwin was not around to explain evolution, so the inhabitants evolve into little bombs. They found out that is incredibly funny to explode in the middle of the most serious situations. But a little bomb named Gapo was too little to explode. All the other bombs made fun of him and he decided to put an end to it. He jumped into an inter-dimensional wormhole and was transported to Earth where he was able to explode, because of the enriched oxygen environment. He can finally start pranking others. All he needs now is a partner with lots of friends ...

After downloading the game you are asked to sign in with your Facebook account. Kawboom is meant to be played with your friends and we use Facebook so your friends are instantly in the game. Each new player gets one bomb that has a timer with one hour on the clock. Once you select a Facebook friend, the bomb leaves your phone and appears on
his. The timer starts running. Now your friend has to open the application and discover the attack in time. If he discovers the attack before the timer runs out, he can plant your bomb to another friend. When the bomb runs out of time it explodes on friends phone and takes him out of the game for 10 minutes. Everybody who passes the bomb forward is rewarded with BoomCoins. The original owner of the bomb and the last friend, that planted the bomb before explosion, get double amount of BoomCoins. 
To make it more of a strategy and not just a game about opening the application on time and select another friend, there is a rule, that each player has only 4 attacks. Once you use an attack, you have to wait for 30 minutes to get a new attack. This rule forces you to think about which bombs to keep and which to pass on. Because, if you pass on 4 bombs and use all 4 attacks at once and then you get a bomb whit in just
10 seconds on the clock you have no chance to defend yourself. 
But the coolest features are power-ups and shields. Each bomb has a slot, where a power up can be added. You buy power ups with BoomCoins that you earned with successful attacks. Before you plant a bomb to a friend, you get the option to add a power up to the bomb if the slot is still empty. A bomb with an attached power has special abilities. For example: One of the power ups is called “Money Sucker”. This power up steals one BoomCoin for each minute, from the player, where the bomb is planted and gives it to the player that attached the power up. Power ups force players to use different strategies with different bombs. Shields can also be bought with
BoomCoins and counter the effects of power-ups.
Do you wonder how Kawboom feels like when you play it on the office? Have a look:


Thank you!
Every penny counts! You receive a cute Kawboom Facebook and Twitter cover, a desktop picture for your computer, emails with our news, progress and updates!

You receive 3 different badges with cute Kawboom designs. 


You receive an explosive phone sleeve to protect your phone from scratches.  

You receive a cute Kawboom pillow to rest your head on. Dimensions of the pillow are 25cm X 25cm X 10cm.  


The cutest little plush bomb that you have ever seen! Little Gapo is awesome for little kids and for those, young by hearth, to cuddle and play with. Plush toy height: 20 cm. 

Explosive T-Shirt! You can choose between 3 attractive designs that suit your soul! (female and male sizes). All three designs are available on shirts in all colors and sizes.  
The big plush bomb! Be the first to get our plush toy Gapo! Plush toy height: 35cm. Gapo will also send you a Facebook friend request!
Get it all, plus little more. You receive all the items. We will also include your name in the game as special thanks. And one more thing, when you sign in to the game 1.000 BoomCoins will be waiting for you.We will also add cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom and T-shirt to your deal. 


We design a bomb upon your wishes! You name it, we design it! Only you will be able to use it and all your friends will be jealous! 
You will also receive:
Your name in game under 'about', cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom Plush Toy, T-shirt and 1000 BoomCoins.

Spend a week with Kawboom team in Slovenia. During the unforgettable week we will take you sightseeing, you will meet the Slovenian start-up community and go partying. You will be able to design and name one game character bomb that everyone will play with! Perk includes an airplane ticket from the nearest and largest airport at your location for one person, accommodations for 6 nights and 7 days for one person and daily trips to the most beautiful places in Slovenia. You will also receive all products in person:Your name in game under 'about', cover picture, 3 badges, phone cover, pillow, little and big Gapo Kawboom Plush Toy, T-shirt, 5000 BoomCoins and a great holiday option. 
Klemen Plazar | Front-end developer | Professional karate competitor and Microsoft technology developer ninja. He is responsible for bringing the game to Windows Phone. 
Aljaž Babič | Back-end developer |Prefers code to cats. He is responsible for the cloud and the back end services that make Kawboom run.  
Manja Potočnik | Designer | The creative person that inspires everyone. She is responsible for the little cute bombs and all other designs.  

Niko Senekovič | Marketing manager | It’s his fault you are reading this. He is responsible for developing and executing online and offline marketing strategies
Aljaž Daković | Product manager | Agile and SCRUM project management specialist. He is responsible for making it all work. . . .The Kawboom team is an explosive mixture of developers, entrepreneurs with a designer on top. We loved working with each other on many different projects, so we decided to start a project of our own. Games have always been our passion. We had a simple, but very engaging concept, to work with. In no time Kawboom was born and now we want to take it a step forward. 


We know how to make and launch the game, but we feel we can accomplish a lot more with Kawboom. We believe that our cute designs deserve a place in the real world as cute toys, phone covers, pillows. We partnered up with manufactures and we are happy with the prototypes they sent us. Now it’s time to make orders, but the cost of the first minimum order that we need to launch in our online store is 5000$. We need your support to realize the full poetical of Kawboom. Join the explosive fun!  

The future is near and it’s going to be awesome:
Missions - Bombs are characters in the game. Each bomb has a fun and a charming back-story. Also every bomb you meet in the game will give you missions. Missions will give you a specific goal, such as determining exact player you need to take out. Missions will give players a bigger sense of purpose and a batter way to get experience points witch are essential for player progression.  
Group play  - In Kawboom you play against all of your friends. You probably have closer friends that will make great allies. With group play you will be able to form teams that will share missions. Teams will also take on other teams in epic battles.  
Tournaments - Currently you can play only against your friends, but what if you want to compete against players around the world? We are working on a tournament system that will offer you just that. Scheduled tournaments will be short events that anyone would be able to join. Winners split the entry fee (BoomCoins). Gameplay will be faster and better geared for short events. 

Developing for multiple mobile platforms is the biggest challenge we are facing. It's absolutely massive for a small team like ours. We have the experience to bring the game to Windows Phone and Android, but lack of experience for IOS development. The biggest risk is that we will not be able to simultaneously deploy the game and some users will have to wait a little for the game to come to their mobile operating system. ................................................................................................................................
If you like Kawboom project and don't have an option to support us financially, that's ok! We still love you! :) You can help us many other ways! Share our Indiegogo video & campaign page, Kawboom Facebook page, all Kawboom photos and videos, tell all your friends about Kawboom! And last, but not least: PLAY KAWBOOM ON YOUR SMARTPHONE! . . .
ASK US A QUESTION!

story:
The creative crew from El Kraken Ediciones has released this campaign to make possible the first GLADIATORS ARENA board game edition, along with its expansion: ADVANCED GLADIATORS ARENA.

Both auto-playable, but they’re better if you play them simultaneously. Thereby the game allows up to eight players at the same time.  

El Kraken Ediciones da sus primeros pasos como editor de juegos: lanzamos la campaña crowdfunding con Indiegogo para crear la primera edición de GLADIATORS ARENA, junto con su expansión: ADVANCED GLADIATORS ARENA.

Ambas ediciones del juego son totalmente autojugables e independientes, pero la diversión se multiplica si se juegan simultáneamente. La unión de ambos permitiría la participación de hasta ocho jugadores al mismo tiempo. 

GLADIATORS ARENA has an exciting performance, where every movement and decision is vital. Players will acquire the role of powerful warriors who will fight against each other. Only the strongest survives!

We have designed this game full of details, offering an impeccable visual appearance with striking ilustrations. But our most important achievement has been developing an innovative way to play.  

GLADIATORS ARENA funciona de manera trepidante, donde cada movimiento y decisión son vitales. Los jugadores encarnan a poderosos guerreros que lucharán los unos conlos otros. ¡Sólo el más fuerte sobrevivirá!

 El diseño del juego ha sido cuidado hasta el más mínimo detalle, ofreciendo un acabado visual impecable y rematado con poderosas ilustraciones. Pero el logro más importante del proyecto ha sido desarrollar una mecánica de juego innovadora.

No dices. No cards. Action and strategy only.

Easy to learn, but a challenge to defiance! Players will secretly make their combat movements, defensive tactics and deadly attacks. Afterwards, the players choices resolve themselves at once. That makes an astonishing game’s fluency!

No hacen falta dados. Las cartas no son necesarias. Sólo acción y estrategia.

Fácil de aprender. ¡Un reto para dominar! Los jugadores prepararán en secreto una secuencia de acciones que incluirán movimientos de combate, tácticas defensivas y mortales ataques, resolviéndose más tarde de forma simultánea.

Each warrior will try to guess his opponent’s movements and, at the same time, he will arrange spectacular attacks which make him the only survivor.

GLADIATORS ARENA is a fast and exciting game!  

Dado que los jugadores determinan sus movimientos al mismo tiempo, la fluidez del juego es sorprendente. Cada luchador intentará adivinar los movimientos de sus rivales mientras prepara espectaculares ataques que lo conviertan en el único superviviente. 

¡GLADIATORS ARENA es un juego rápido y emocionante!

These are the GLADIATORS ARENA fighters:


These are the ADVANCED GLADIATORS ARENA fighters:

ADVANCED GLADIATORS ARENA will include deeper rules also.  

GLADIATORS ARENA has already its final layout, and has been tested by a huge community of gamers. This game needs your help to make it possible!

Here you have the perks for the campaign to thank your collaboration:

GLADIATORS ARENA ya cuenta con su diseño definitivo y ha sido testeado por una gran comunidad de jugadores. ¡El juego necesita tu colaboración para ver la luz! Para agradecer tu ayuda, podrás encontrar atractivas recompensas en la campaña:

Only for early backers up to December 8th! Your favourite scutum badge as a free reward with your perk! (Mecenas and Lithos perks not included)

Para los primeros mecenas y sólo hasta el 8 de Diciembre, te obsequiamos con una chapa con tu escudo favorito como añadido en tu perk (excluyendo los perks Mecenas y Lithos)

Free shipping included for Spain. For EU please add 7€ and 15€ for other countries:




El Kraken Ediciones is an independent game developers group under Yaiza Quevedo's direction, owner of the physical games' store named El Kraken (our HQ). Gladiators Arena game designer is Rayco Suárez, with Pedro Suárez illustrations. Promotional video and music by Jonay Armas.


El Kraken Ediciones es un grupo independiente de diseñadores de juegos bajo la dirección de Yaiza Quevedo, propietaria de la tienda física El Kraken (nuestra sede central). El diseño de este juego es un trabajo de Rayco Suárez con las ilustraciones de Pedro Suárez. El vídeo y la banda sonora original de Jonay Armas.


contact us: ediciones@elkraken.es

 www.elkraken.es/ediciones

story:
The Idea

Welcome, thank you for taking the time to come read about my IndieGoGo campaign :)

  • My name is Benji Powers, and I am a big ol' Iron Man fan living in Melbourne, Australia. I love to play video games, help people out, and more than anything I love to see people happy.
  • I have always loved providing help to those in need, and bringing smiles to those who cannot make one for themselves. It gives me hope when I see people who don't have much enjoying whatever life gives them. Some of the most hope I receive is when I see sick/disabled children happy and enjoying their life despite their setbacks. With video games being so important to me in my life, I want to help kids be able to experience fun and learning through this medium. I plan on making and buying parts to make an Iron Man suit, so I can go round to hospitals and charity events to donate video games, consoles, and toys to kids who are struggling. I want to do this with either Child's Play or the Starlight Foundation. Of course, first I will need a suit.
  • By donating, you will help me purchase the suit and everything I'd need to make Iron Man come to life.

What I Need & What You Get

So here's the core of it:

  • I need roughly $1,800 AUD to fund this project. This will go towards the suit itself, electronics to light up the suit, and getting parts shipped to Australia. The mask will move up and down, the hands and chest will have bright LEDs, and the joints near the chest and stomach will be lit up.
  • Two of the super cool perks will be where I come to a place of your choosing and surprise everyone around you by highfiving you as Iron Man, or even giving you a gift!
  • If the entire goal is not reached, I will continue anyway to work tirelessly to get this suit together. It will take time, but I don't want to give up on this goal. If the goal is not reached, your donations will be sent back to you.

The Impact

  • This project will bring smiles to children, and help towards pushing video game charities forward. I will also do my best to get involved with other charities if at all possible, including AGDQ and others.
  • I will be setting up a blog where you can follow any and all updates relating to the Iron Man project. This will include pictures and stories of significance.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help with this idea:

  • Please share this project on Facebook, tumblr or twitter, it would help a lot!
  • Also you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this, watch my video and consider funding. I hope with your help I can get this dream off the ground. Thank you!

story:
PLANK & RANK is a two-player game in which you must build a bridge, plank-by-plank, across the Rhine River while simultaneously moving your army, rank-by-rank, to the opposite side.  But be careful, there may be a few snags and surprises along the way.  So choose your side, Roman Red or Barbarian Blue, and get ready to do battle.  Do you have the Gaul?

PLANK & RANK also has the honor of being one of five finalists in Hasbro's Next Great Game Challenge.  The success of this campaign will go a long way in helping me to win the competition and will further establish PLANK & RANK as game night favorite.

 

 

OBJECTIVE

Be the first to build a bridge across the Rhine River and move all of your soldiers to the opposite side.

SET-UP

Pick a side - Roman Red or Barbarian Blue.  Each player has ten (10) color-coded tokens and a corresponding 10-sided die.  Place your ten tokens in the first ten spots on your designated side of the river.

Shuffle the deck of PLANK CARDS and deal FIVE (5) cards, face-down, to each player.  Place the remaining deck to the side as a DRAW PILE and flip one card face-up for a DISCARD PILE.

Roll your dice – the highest number goes first. 

GAMEPLAY 

Each turn consists of two parts - PLANKING and RANKING.  Planking is the process by which one builds their bridge (using the PLANK CARDS).  Ranking is the process by which one moves their soldiers (tokens) across the bridge using the roll of the dice.

HOW TO PLANK

Pick up a PLANK CARD from the DRAW PILE (or from the DISCARD PILE if one so chooses) and add it to your HAND.  You may then choose to PLACE a plank,  SWAP a plank, or TOSS a plank.

To PLACE a plank, you simply place one card, face-up, in the first available slot on your side of the river.  NOTE:  Each subsequent plank you later place must have a smaller numerical value than the previous, so that the bridge descends in size as it spans the river.  Planks DO NOT, however, have to be in direct sequential order.

If you are unable to PLACE your plank, you may then either SWAP it or TOSS it.

To SWAP a plank, you simply switch a card from your hand with one previously placed on the river (keeping note of the “descending order” rule).  You then place the newly swapped plank into the DISCARD PILE.  NOTE:  You MAY NOT swap out a plank if any of your SOLDIERS (tokens) are currently standing on it.   So plan accordingly.

If you are unable or unwilling to PLACE or SWAP a plank, you can simply…

TOSS a plank into the DISCARD PILE, keeping in mind that your opponent will be free to choose this card at the start of their turn.

HOW TO RANK: 

To RANK, you simply roll your DICE.  You may then choose to either SCOUT or MARCH.

To SCOUT, move ONE (1) token the given (X) number of spaces. 

To MARCH, move MULTIPLE (X) tokens one (1) space, and one space only.

Moves cannot be divided between a SCOUT and a MARCH, and all moves must be completed in the EXACT number of spaces rolled (meaning that there are no extra or leftover moves once a piece or pieces have reached their intended spot(s).) 

Tokens are free to move forward, backward, left or right in any form or fashion. They CANNOT move diagonally, JUMP other tokens, or DOUBLE-BACK over the same space within the same turn.

PLANKS will get smaller as they descend, so a token may have to compensate for this shift in size, moving sideways when needed.

EVENT CARDS and BATTLE CARDS

These cards are mixed in with the normal PLANK CARDS.  Players are free to save them in their HAND and play them at will.  To play one, simply place it on the DISCARD PILE at the start of your turn and follow the given instructions.

EVENT CARDS depict different actions which may help or hinder your progress.  Either you, your opponent, or both of you, will have to follow said instructions.

BATTLE CARDS require both players to ROLL THEIR DICE.  The highest number wins.  The winner can then choose to remove ANY PLANK from their opponent’s bridge.  (Any tokens on that plank are moved back to the START).  The winning player may then SWAP the stolen plank with any of their own (following the above rules for swapping) if they so choose.

The discarded plank card is then placed BENEATH the discarded BATTLE CARD, removing it from availability on the next turn.

If rolling the dice results in a tie, the battle simply ends and regular gameplay continues. 

Once the entire stack of PLANK CARDS has been played through, simply shuffle and flip the DISCARD PILE and start again.

TO WIN 

The first player to build their bridge (and keep it intact) while simultaneously moving all of their tokens safely to the opposite side wins the game

 

 

Any contributions you make to my campaign are pretty much going to the same place, and that's the production and manufacturing of the game itself.  As with most products, the larger the order the cheaper the price.  This is why I have chosen to do a fixed pricing campaign - in order to insure a reasonable price for everyone, I need to guarantee a large enough order.  Basically, if I can sell a little over a hundred games (or, an equivalent number of lesser-priced perks) the order will be placed.

I am working with a great manufacturing company.  They have already produced a few prototypes for me and, I have to say, I am quite pleased - wholeheartedly so - with the outcome.

As the sole creator and designer of this game, I am not seeking any major profits nor do I need to make any large third-party payments.  My goal with this campaign is to simply place as many copies of my game into as many hands and onto as many tables as possible.

 

 

FEATURED PERK

$45 - PLANK & RANK: THE GAME

 

$1   -  Join the "PRanker" Community

 

$10  - Plank & Rank Paper Puppet Theatre

 

$15  - Plank & Rank Party Companion

 

$25  - "Hank & Frank" T-shirt

 

$90 - The Whole Shebang! (including an extra t-shirt)

 

 

I am pleased to say that, as most campaigns go, this one carries very little risk.  It is providing me with an opportunity to share my creativity and, thanks to some past and current coaching, I have taken every possible monetary outcome into consideration. Perhaps the biggest challenge I face with this campaign is the overall coordination and shipping of numerous orders once my goal is reached, as is to be expected.  But rest  assured, each and every one of your orders, no matter how big or small, means the world to me.  The best way I can show my gratitude is to give each order its due attention, so I apologize for any delays that may arise.   

 

 

What started as a simple exercise in storytelling turned into a  passion for game design.  PLANK & RANK started as a small project while I was attending the Rhode Island School of Design and has since snowballed into the campaign you see here today.  I am now competing against four other amazing games in Hasbro's Next Great Game Competition.  Any and every contribution you make, be it funding or simply word-of-mouth, will go a long way in making PLANK & RANK a reality.

Thank You!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/plankandrank/

Visit Paul's website: http://paulpartlowillustration.com/index.html

 

To make a contribution, simply choose a PERK.

For web users, perks are listed to the right of this page.

For mobile users, perks are listed on the "Campaign Overview" page.
story_txt:
PLANK & RANK is a two-player game in which you must build a bridge, plank-by-plank, across the Rhine River while simultaneously moving your army, rank-by-rank, to the opposite side.  But be careful, there may be a few snags and surprises along the way.  So choose your side, Roman Red or Barbarian Blue, and get ready to do battle.  Do you have the Gaul?
PLANK & RANK also has the honor of being one of five finalists in Hasbro's Next Great Game Challenge.  The success of this campaign will go a long way in helping me to win the competition and will further establish PLANK & RANK as game night favorite.
 

 
OBJECTIVE
Be the first to build a bridge across the Rhine River and move all of your soldiers to the opposite side.

SET-UP
Pick a side - Roman Red or Barbarian Blue.  Each player has ten (10) color-coded tokens and a corresponding 10-sided die.  Place your ten tokens in the first ten spots on your designated side of the river.

Shuffle the deck of PLANK CARDS and deal FIVE (5) cards, face-down, to each player.  Place the remaining deck to the side as a DRAW PILE and flip one card face-up for a DISCARD PILE.

Roll your dice – the highest number goes first. 
GAMEPLAY 
Each turn consists of two parts - PLANKING and RANKING.  Planking is the process by which one builds their bridge (using the PLANK CARDS).  Ranking is the process by which one moves their soldiers (tokens) across the bridge using the roll of the dice.
HOW TO PLANK
Pick up a PLANK CARD from the DRAW PILE (or from the DISCARD PILE if one so chooses) and add it to your HAND.  You may then choose to PLACE a plank,  SWAP a plank, or TOSS a plank.

To PLACE a plank, you simply place one card, face-up, in the first available slot on your side of the river.  NOTE:  Each subsequent plank you later place must have a smaller numerical value than the previous, so that the bridge descends in size as it spans the river.  Planks DO NOT, however, have to be in direct sequential order.

If you are unable to PLACE your plank, you may then either SWAP it or TOSS it.
To SWAP a plank, you simply switch a card from your hand with one previously placed on the river (keeping note of the “descending order” rule).  You then place the newly swapped plank into the DISCARD PILE.  NOTE:  You MAY NOT swap out a plank if any of your SOLDIERS (tokens) are currently standing on it.   So plan accordingly.
If you are unable or unwilling to PLACE or SWAP a plank, you can simply…
TOSS a plank into the DISCARD PILE, keeping in mind that your opponent will be free to choose this card at the start of their turn.
HOW TO RANK: 
To RANK, you simply roll your DICE.  You may then choose to either SCOUT or MARCH.
To SCOUT, move ONE (1) token the given (X) number of spaces. 
To MARCH, move MULTIPLE (X) tokens one (1) space, and one space only.

Moves cannot be divided between a SCOUT and a MARCH, and all moves must be completed in the EXACT number of spaces rolled (meaning that there are no extra or leftover moves once a piece or pieces have reached their intended spot(s).) 
Tokens are free to move forward, backward, left or right in any form or fashion. They CANNOT move diagonally, JUMP other tokens, or DOUBLE-BACK over the same space within the same turn.
PLANKS will get smaller as they descend, so a token may have to compensate for this shift in size, moving sideways when needed.
EVENT CARDS and BATTLE CARDS
These cards are mixed in with the normal PLANK CARDS.  Players are free to save them in their HAND and play them at will.  To play one, simply place it on the DISCARD PILE at the start of your turn and follow the given instructions.
EVENT CARDS depict different actions which may help or hinder your progress.  Either you, your opponent, or both of you, will have to follow said instructions.



BATTLE CARDS require both players to ROLL THEIR DICE.  The highest number wins.  The winner can then choose to remove ANY PLANK from their opponent’s bridge.  (Any tokens on that plank are moved back to the START).  The winning player may then SWAP the stolen plank with any of their own (following the above rules for swapping) if they so choose.

The discarded plank card is then placed BENEATH the discarded BATTLE CARD, removing it from availability on the next turn.
If rolling the dice results in a tie, the battle simply ends and regular gameplay continues. 
Once the entire stack of PLANK CARDS has been played through, simply shuffle and flip the DISCARD PILE and start again.
TO WIN 
The first player to build their bridge (and keep it intact) while simultaneously moving all of their tokens safely to the opposite side wins the game
 

 
Any contributions you make to my campaign are pretty much going to the same place, and that's the production and manufacturing of the game itself.  As with most products, the larger the order the cheaper the price.  This is why I have chosen to do a fixed pricing campaign - in order to insure a reasonable price for everyone, I need to guarantee a large enough order.  Basically, if I can sell a little over a hundred games (or, an equivalent number of lesser-priced perks) the order will be placed.
I am working with a great manufacturing company.  They have already produced a few prototypes for me and, I have to say, I am quite pleased - wholeheartedly so - with the outcome.
As the sole creator and designer of this game, I am not seeking any major profits nor do I need to make any large third-party payments.  My goal with this campaign is to simply place as many copies of my game into as many hands and onto as many tables as possible.
 

 
FEATURED PERK
$45 - PLANK & RANK: THE GAME

 
$1   -  Join the "PRanker" Community

 
$10  - Plank & Rank Paper Puppet Theatre

 
$15  - Plank & Rank Party Companion

 
$25  - "Hank & Frank" T-shirt

 

$90 - The Whole Shebang! (including an extra t-shirt)

 

 
I am pleased to say that, as most campaigns go, this one carries very little risk.  It is providing me with an opportunity to share my creativity and, thanks to some past and current coaching, I have taken every possible monetary outcome into consideration. Perhaps the biggest challenge I face with this campaign is the overall coordination and shipping of numerous orders once my goal is reached, as is to be expected.  But rest  assured, each and every one of your orders, no matter how big or small, means the world to me.  The best way I can show my gratitude is to give each order its due attention, so I apologize for any delays that may arise.   
 

 
What started as a simple exercise in storytelling turned into a  passion for game design.  PLANK & RANK started as a small project while I was attending the Rhode Island School of Design and has since snowballed into the campaign you see here today.  I am now competing against four other amazing games in Hasbro's Next Great Game Competition.  Any and every contribution you make, be it funding or simply word-of-mouth, will go a long way in making PLANK & RANK a reality.
Thank You!
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/plankandrank/
Visit Paul's website: http://paulpartlowillustration.com/index.html

 
To make a contribution, simply choose a PERK.
For web users, perks are listed to the right of this page.
For mobile users, perks are listed on the "Campaign Overview" page.

story:
Thank you all voters! Now let's make it happen, so select your perk and get your access to keys for discounted price. Wallpapers will not be available at Steam release, so be sure to get yours before the campaign ends. Also you will get your name in credits.




The Game

The great old ones are awakening, world is turning to madness and creatures from darkest nightmares are lurking in shadows.  Command up to 4 investigators around the World in roaring 1920’s and prevent Apocalypse and end of the humankind Gun and melee weapons should stop most of them, but can the investigators handle horror and instanity they faces? Creatures from other dimensions will easily devour careless investigators or pull them on deepest abyss of madness. Do you have nerves to face unspeakable creatures? Only a thin line of rational thinking and sanity prevents collapse of the humankind.

Explore many dimensions, times and spaces while handling your investigators sanity. Build a team of many unique investigators and send them around the world.

Mythos - The Awakening is a turn-based RPG inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's horror fiction stories. Combining boardgame-like mechanics with roguelike gameplay, the game offers dozens of hours of unique playtime with randomized content and frequent updates. 

Your mission is to unravel the mysteries behind the world threatening Ancient Ones. Travel through mini horror stories and search for clues and mystical artifacts to find a way to banish the Ancient One from the world before its awakening.  

Features

  • An everchanging experience with randomized content and hundreds of encounters 
  • 15+ playable investigators 
  • 3 Ancient Ones with their own custom content and mechanics 
  • No loading screens! 
  • Tons of content updates
  • PC, Mac and Linux releases

Worldmap

One of the main aspects in the Mythos The Awakening is map gameplay around the World. Player works as mastermind behind individual investigators who travel around unraveling mysteries,following clues and fighting against Eldricht beings. Investigators are persons with different backgrounds,agendas and proficients, usually men-and women of science are best suitable to handle cosmic energies so called “spells” while a private investigator and former boxing champion take cares of fighting against abominations. All of them have one goal to stop awakening of the great old ones but not everybody are contributing with most chivalrous agenda.  

 

Colorful group of investigators ready to unravel mysteries in Arkham


Locations and cities

Locations shown on the map play important role in the game play. Named major cities and locations works as places to investigators to gain equipments,weapons and even spells which will help them on quests. There are even certain locations with pubs where the player can hire new investigators to change or replace deceased or mad investigators.


The Great Old Ones are not just watching, they are actually fighting against investigators, though not having physical form (at least in early game) they can still spawn gates and monsters to locations. Ravaging monsters and cults on cities will decreases locations sanity and when inhabitants in the location fall to total madness, whole city is lost and investigators can’t get any equipment or heal themselves in hospitals.

While dealing with these tasks around the world, the player has to manage each investigator’s sanity, health, gear and money, as well as each major city’s sanity level and the global sanity level. If player fails too many of these tasks and the global sanity level goes to zero, then the ancient one awakens and starts to annihilate the world city by city. After every turn there are numerous things that can happen, these can be good or bad for the player. For example spawning new monsters or even police forces dealing with some of monsters.


tough situation, help London or get rid of that Deep One before it cause harm in Istanbul?

Choose time to fight or run


Day and night cycle have also important aspect in the game. Some monster will be stronger in the night time and without source of light, investigators accuracy in combat will suffer greatly. Also it is always scarier to travel in darkness.


Combat in the game is card based, weapons, items, skills and spells act as your cards which you collect throughout the game. Each investigator has their own skill set so cards handle differently depending on which investigator is using them. For example spell-casters aren’t great at handling firearms and the weak minded might be driven mad if they try to cast spells or they can even backfire.


The encounters, except for the monsters are text based multi choice tasks, where every choice can lead to different outcome depending on the investigator handling the encounter. Your choice can lead to another encounter in some other location or you might gain an item, regain health, suffer sanity loss or even meet your untimely death.


Monster behavior


There are many monster and creatures in H.P.Lovecraft’s stories and tales. Many unspeakable horrors lurk in the shadows. We plan to implement most of the known eldritch monsters to our game amongst the Great Old Ones.

Players also encounters normal human beings like cultists and possessed people who may first seem weak, but they can also cast spells and use firearms to protect their gods.

Every monster has different behaviors depending on their roles. Player should plan their moves and tactics carefully to get around certain monsters. Luckily there are skills, spells and items to help, and sometimes even destiny may be on the player’s side.

Wanderers

Wanderers are passive monsters who moves around the map, these monsters will travel randomly around the world without any specific target.

Gate guards

Monsters with this behavior are protecting locations with a gate to another dimension. Usually investigators need to get rid of the gate guard before they can proceed to close the gate.

Ravagers

Ravagers seek locations where they will cause mayhem and destruction. This causes a drop in the location’s sanity, which will make the investigator's life much harder.

Evaders

Evading monsters will try to evade locations where investigators are, their purpose is to irritate and sidetrack the investigators. They also may cause mayhem when entering major locations.

Hunters

Hunters will actively search for investigators and try to kill them or drive them insane. These monster are usually most dangerous because of their aggressiveness.  

Trackers

Tracking monster follows the investigators around the world and try to block their routes.

Need to get on ship? Yep, good luck with that Nightgaunt blocking your way to a port city. 


Current Status

The game has been in development over 10 months and is currently in pre-alpha stage. Most of the features and the content creating tools are ready and the game is playable. 

The final game is aimed to be released late 2015. We also aim to support Steam Workshop so the community can bring their own horror stories into the game.


Who we are ? 

We are Blackland Games Ltd. From Finland, Kouvola. Blackland Games is formed by 5 experienced game developers with backgrounds with multiple released titles  such as Trine, Alan Wake (PC-version)  and many more. So don't worry we can deliver what we promise.
Mythos is not first title of Blackland Games. We have successfully shipped mobile game Planetary Guard: Defender which is available for all mobile devices. In the meantime you are waiting the Mythos to be arrived you are very welcome to enjoy our previous title ( Free 2 Download ). 


Goals

Why 80 000, you ask ?  Rather big you say ? Here is why.

80 000€ covers all the work which are described image above. Which are approximately 40% of the whole project.

The game itself is in pre-alpha phase where almost every feature is done. But we need more time to make those features extremely good. Also the game needs more content on stories, items, events and characters. So we need the funding to secure our rest of development and launch. 
With your help we will secure our development and launch, also we will be able to add proper music and sound effect talent to work, and possibility to hire help with content creation and maybe even eat once in a while.  With that funding we can guarantee a finished game and best experience what Blackland Games can offer. 
 Full launch is estimated late 2015.  



Why Crowdfunding

We have pitched the game to dozens of game publishers and gotten great feedback and business proposals but we feel the final game would benefit more from the freedom we can get with crowdfunding. Not only we have a total creative freedom, our hands won't be tied when it comes to business side of things (pricing etc.).

By choosing this road, we have taken a huge risk in terms of money, time and exposure we'll get with the game by doing everything by ourselves so we hope everyone will support us and join the ride.

Risks & Challenges

While we are a bunch of game industry professionals trying to make a living with the games we'd love to play (and make) and we're determined to finish the game regardless the ending result of this campaign, there are few things that might endanger finishing the product (but not its release).

Production wise we are confident there won't be any surprises but before the game is released, we'll have to go through many long and challenging steps where all the factors and variables unfortunately aren't in our hands.


Rewards ? 

Where is all the cool stuff ? No T-Shirts ? Well no, we believe that game itself is best reward and best way to give contribution for the game. And we are not going to promise too much because we are small team and we have to concentrate on the game and deliver you a really good product. Instead of we would spend our time making T-Shirt and shipping those to you, Right ?  
Everyone who contributes to our IndieGoGo and chooses reward which includes Steam key, will receive the full game and early access to our beta version of course. 



Thanks!

Whether you supported this campaign financially or not, you can still contribute by spreading the word. We thank you for your interest and hope you'll get to enjoy your time with Mythos - The Awakening in few months.

story:
Short summary

Hello, I am AtisR, this is my first - and hopefully not the last - indigogo game project, the Sexy Gaia's Little Protector!
I already have experience in game development, but till now I have implemented only the idea of my company' s customers. 
Now I am asking for your help to create my own dream about Gaia and her Protectors' World.

What do We Need & What do You Get?

In my estimation this project needs 3 months worktime and 2500 dollars for my living expenses.

What do you get for your money?

You will get Gaia and her Protectors' interesting story in a touch-controlled (or cursor-controlled) action game, for Windows (PC)  and Android (mobile) platforms.

  • 4 manageable and developeable characters:
                   

    Given by the missions, based on XP, developable 4 active and 4 passive propeties. Every property could be developed till 9.th level. The characters could select two active properties any time with using Spell Points during the fight:

  • 20+ levels:

Levels with varied design. Enemies with many different properties. Missions changing by levels:

At the end of all levels there are main enemies!

How do I get this game?

Every perk will get a link, where he/she download any version of the game. The list of the extra sponsorship methods are on the right side of this page.

As I have chosen the oportunity of Fixed Funding, if the campaign doesn't reach its goal, then the perks will get theirs money back, and everybody lives on his/her life.

Anything else?

I just want to thank you very much for your donating, sharing or helping my campaign in any other way!

If my goal is succeed, then the status of my project will be seen on this facebook page:

https://www.facebook.com/sexy.gaia.little.protectors

story:
Play The Demo - Download The Demo


Majesty 3D was Born in a Coffee Shop

We are Joshua King and Rex Hansen. Collectively we are Majesty3D. What is Majesty3D? NOTHING YET! But we are making something from nothing. Fueled by coffee and childhoods full of video games, we are building something from nothing: A full scale puzzle oriented adventure game exploding with brain teasers, plot intrigue, and witty nonsense. Okay who am I kidding… our adulthoods are full of video games too.

We need YOU to make Majesty3D go from nothing to something. Don’t get me wrong, our brain child Castaway Kirk is coming into existence one way or another. But we need help to significantly expedite that process. Indie game studios are popping up everywhere and anywhere in this technological golden age we’ve accidentally been born into. To get an edge, you need cutting edge resources: Licensing, software, outsourced artists, third party add-ons for the afore-mentioned software (because nobody’s an expert at everything), and most of all LOTS AND LOTS OF TIME.

We are but humble artists, and truly living the dream. Joshua King, the lead level designer and programmer, is living at his mother’s house (neither in the basement, nor for free) and washing dishes for minimum wage to stay afloat. Rex Hansen, the Lead 2D and 3D artist, is a security guard full time slightly above minimum wage. Countless hours of “free time” have already been spent proving that we have the motivation and talent to make this happen. We now ask that you join our dream and bask in the glow of the fruition of our labors, knowing with pride that it became reality because of your support and a shared love of the medium. In return, we have no intention of stopping after Castaway Kirk. Our game ideas have us booked for years on out. One generous boost, and you can watch the dominoes fall.


What is Castaway Kirk

Castaway Kirk is an idea that was originally meant to be a quickly put together resume piece. Unexpectedly though, once work began on the project, we quickly realized that we had far too many ideas and material for something easily thrown together. More importantly we felt that we couldn’t bring ourselves to produce “thrown together” sub-par work, and the idea morphed into something greater.

Castaway Kirk is the story of Kirk, a loner adventurer, as he finds himself stranded on a mysterious island where strange goings on are afoot.  The game is our modern day homage to the classic point and click adventure designed with an in-depth immersive story. We’ve combined great story telling and puzzle progression with first person controls and perspective. We’ve also added our own touch by introducing multi-use tools to the puzzle equation as well. 


Where the Money Goes

Here’s our budget! Down and dirty style…

$1500… Unity Pro (Supports PC/Mac/Linux Standalone)

$1500… Unity Android Package (Covers licensing and cross platform support)

$2000… For bringing in other talent (such as composers and translators.)

$1000… 3rd party assets, including but not limited to: Play Maker, NGUI, RFPS, Control Freak, Quick Ropes, and Steam Greenlight registration fee

$8000… Production time and perks. More than anything this will be buying us the ability to work full-time on the game. We estimate that with full funding, Castaway Kirk will be available to you, wrapped in a neat pink bow and a sparkly box (figuratively of course), in less than a year from the end date of our campaign.


What Sets Us Apart

Let’s be honest: Its difficult to find high quality games in the ocean of indie content and unregulated standards. Digital distribution platforms have revolutionized the video game industry, yes, and we send them all of their deserving praise. In fact we fully intend to partake in the Steam Greenlight Project at our earliest convenience. Now if you sense a “but” coming, it’s because there is. BUT… a whole lot of sifting through half-finished “Early Access” games has become necessary. So, you probably want some proof that we’re not just talking your ear off, right?

The proof is in the demo. The last year of prototyping has come to fruition in a free fully playable (and immediately available to you) standalone download. You can download it now from everybody’s favorite and most reputable indie developer support network: Indiedb.com.

Majesty3D’s motto is “Integrity first.” Under no circumstances will we compromise our vision. Furthermore, under no circumstances will you ever see a sub-par product with our studio’s name on it, let alone an unfinished one. Slowly but surely, we aim to contribute to that fleeting pool of gems, and make the ocean surrounding that oasis seem a little less daunting.


What Lies Before Us

Allow an indulgence, if you will, in an extended "Alice in Wonderland" analogy. Imagine yourself going down the rabbit hole. You come to an opening at the end of the rabbit hole. There are now a dozen more rabbit hole entrances into which you are free to dive. But which one do you choose? You can’t choose all of them... can you? Maybe you can just go down one, see what’s in it real quick, use it to your advantage, and then come back up and go down a different one? Make a day of it? WRONG!

Welcome to game design. Every different type of developer’s hat each of us tries to wear represents a new challenge and a new rabbit hole: Genre’s, game engines, 2D and 3D image manipulation (software options, modeling, rigging, animation, rendering, texturing), audio editing, video editing, web development, marketing, digital distribution integration, launching/installation software, testing capability, business management, etc. Game developers require the confidence to say “I can totally learn a new game engine. No problem!” but the wisdom and humility to say “I need help. I’m not very good at this particular task, but that’s okay.”

Multitudes of affronting brick walls have repeatedly smacked us in the face with their scratchy cat-tongue-like and inexplicably primate shaped appendages, adding insult to injury with a swaggering attitude that just won’t stop. In response to this we said “No sir, I don’t like that.”  Josh didn’t know how to code in C# a year ago. Now he does. Rex couldn’t texture a model to save his life. Just take a look at the Adventure bag in the image gallery. You want one now don’t you? That’s what we thought. So what’s our plan for the pitfalls ahead? Bull-headed stubbornness and grace under pressure haven’t failed us yet, so we’re just gonna stick with that.


Other Ways You Can Help

Monetary donations are fantastic, but we completely understand those in a situation where they can’t donate. So, there are a few ways that you can further our project without having to open your wallet. Obviously sharing the campaign and telling others about it is the simplest and most straightforward way to help.

Beyond just general social media traffic the number one place we request you check out is our Indie Database page. That’s the main site we use for all our news and game related traffic. IndieDB.com ranks games by popularity, and the higher your ranking, the more attention your game can get. While page views are a big part of that, it’s only one facet of what they track. Downloads, comments, and “Watchers” contribute a great deal to the game’s rank. So, if you love our game, and just indie games in general, head over there and set up a profile. Then head to our game page and click the “Track this game” link in the sidebar. Shortly after the end of this crowd funding campaign, maybe even before, we’ll be launching or Steam Greenlight campaign. For those of you who don’t know about Steam Greenlight: it is a way for indie games to get distribution on Steam, which is Valve Software's extremely popular digital distribution platform. Similar to IndieDB's ranking system, it is powered by votes. With enough votes from users, Valve will greenlight the game and instantly put us underway for global distribution. A lot of games use this method to be sold as “Early Access” affording them additional funds for development. Majesty 3D, however, will not be doing so. As prviously mentioned we don't believe in releasing an unfinished product. Although patches are often necessary, to be expected, and easily applied via Steam, our first release will be the full finished version of Castaway Kirk.
story_txt:
Play The Demo - Download The Demo
Majesty 3D was Born in a Coffee ShopWe are Joshua King and Rex Hansen. Collectively we are Majesty3D. What is Majesty3D? NOTHING YET! But we are making something from nothing. Fueled by coffee and childhoods full of video games, we are building something from nothing: A full scale puzzle oriented adventure game exploding with brain teasers, plot intrigue, and witty nonsense. Okay who am I kidding… our adulthoods are full of video games too.We need YOU to make Majesty3D go from nothing to something. Don’t get me wrong, our brain child Castaway Kirk is coming into existence one way or another. But we need help to significantly expedite that process. Indie game studios are popping up everywhere and anywhere in this technological golden age we’ve accidentally been born into. To get an edge, you need cutting edge resources: Licensing, software, outsourced artists, third party add-ons for the afore-mentioned software (because nobody’s an expert at everything), and most of all LOTS AND LOTS OF TIME.We are but humble artists, and truly living the dream. Joshua King, the lead level designer and programmer, is living at his mother’s house (neither in the basement, nor for free) and washing dishes for minimum wage to stay afloat. Rex Hansen, the Lead 2D and 3D artist, is a security guard full time slightly above minimum wage. Countless hours of “free time” have already been spent proving that we have the motivation and talent to make this happen. We now ask that you join our dream and bask in the glow of the fruition of our labors, knowing with pride that it became reality because of your support and a shared love of the medium. In return, we have no intention of stopping after Castaway Kirk. Our game ideas have us booked for years on out. One generous boost, and you can watch the dominoes fall.What is Castaway KirkCastaway Kirk is an idea that was originally meant to be a quickly put together resume piece. Unexpectedly though, once work began on the project, we quickly realized that we had far too many ideas and material for something easily thrown together. More importantly we felt that we couldn’t bring ourselves to produce “thrown together” sub-par work, and the idea morphed into something greater.Castaway Kirk is the story of Kirk, a loner adventurer, as he finds himself stranded on a mysterious island where strange goings on are afoot.  The game is our modern day homage to the classic point and click adventure designed with an in-depth immersive story. We’ve combined great story telling and puzzle progression with first person controls and perspective. We’ve also added our own touch by introducing multi-use tools to the puzzle equation as well. Where the Money GoesHere’s our budget! Down and dirty style…$1500… Unity Pro (Supports PC/Mac/Linux Standalone)$1500… Unity Android Package (Covers licensing and cross platform support)$2000… For bringing in other talent (such as composers and translators.)$1000… 3rd party assets, including but not limited to: Play Maker, NGUI, RFPS, Control Freak, Quick Ropes, and Steam Greenlight registration fee$8000… Production time and perks. More than anything this will be buying us the ability to work full-time on the game.
