story:
La version française, est plus bas! Merci


"Story of Heroes" is a 2D action game, with phases of shoot'em up, designed to adapt several major criteria:

-fun and entertainement for the players (it's always exciting to chain attacks, it causes a sense of mastery and power!)

-various and rhythmic game sequences,

-different angles of action views: the threat comes from all sides, the feeling of danger is omnipresent

-technical and aggressive gameplay for the player who leads fights with a fearsome power

- A Hero, with a very wide range of shots combined with awesome combination opportunities, sometimes brutal, sometimes humiliating (see an enemy in sweat in front of a demonstration of power, it is a supreme delight!)

-a varied bestiary of enemies and Boss , with different special moves to avoid the monotony of fighting,

-a high level of difficulty (but adjustable for beginners!) basis, and two others ("Too hard" and "Climax"), available from the beginning,

-a scenario that develops the identity of the characters, and shows the power of the Hero as soon as he appears, causing terror and helplessness of the Forces of Evil.

The game is developed for PC and Mac. Ideally, the title would also come out on home consoles (PS3, X Box 360, WiiU, PS4, Xbox One), but this port means a higher cost (100 000 Euros).

The design of the game is like  Manga / Anime and is  inspired by great works such as Dragon Ball, St Seiya, Yuyu Hakusho, Naruto or One Piece.

Why choose this graphic universe? Because it allows  a free and easily malleable universe, without the limits of realism. A big opportunity for artists' creativity!

This will be found in the variety of scenery, the character design, the gameplay and the possibility to have more dynamic animations.

However, "Story of Heroes" is not a "fanservice "!

A whole universe is developed, to give life to this unique gameplay, which offers a different approach to combat.

The scenario also is not left out, since it is not only a story of Demon, who wants to destroy the universe, and a Hero who helps to save the poor scared girl ! No, it's more than that.

Finally, although the game world is clearly colored, it will expect a touch of violence! (since we are talking about from the beginning, a game that is threatening, brutal, powerful and nervous!). But without being violent or gore.


You take control of the Fearsome and Powerful Kaizen, which will ask you to pass through 16 main levels to accomplish its mission. Remark, is determined and demanding, and hope the players eliminate ALL enemies without exception, and to put terror on these miserable! Players will need to make big scores to be equal Kaizen.

The warrior can attack the body, use weapon, and energy attacks ("KI"). His power is huge, and since birth, he learned all kinds of techniques:

-Simple Attack,

-Super Attack,

-Combo,

-Super Combo,

-Hyper Combo,

-Double Combo,

-Divine Combo,

-Divine Attack,

-Finish Attack,

-Defense,

-Dodge,

-Back / Front Flip,

-Counter,

-Counter Attack,

-Teleportation,

-Defense Combo

-Energy Shield, and more!

And during the phases of Shoot em up, it is also comfortable, with many attacks based on the fireballs, but also attacks of the body, and weapon's duels!

Yes, it has become the perfect fighter, knowing neither fear nor pity. Nobody can stop even a Game Over!

The enemies and Boss, are as much determined to do battle! Especially after their terrible beatings received in the past, but also to the terrible humiliation that comes from their inflict Kaizen (that is, you understand why!).

They are also redoutable, and have devastating attacks and defenses:

-Simple Attack

-Super Attack

-Combo,

-Super Combo

-Duo Combo

-Dark Attack

-Defense,

-Dodge,

-back / Front Flip

-Counter,

-Counter Attack

-Teleportation, and more!

In addition, they attack in groups, and attack using scenari. For example, one of them is a kamikaze that exploses on Kaïzen, who is immediately surprised by another hidden enemy, springing from the ground!

Another example, they attack in pairs, but feint by disappear to make way for a third enemy, this attacking by surprise.

Finally, they can emerge from everywhere: the backdrop, foreground, air or soil, everything is allowed...

Totally epic fights to maintain your entertain at the upmost!

And yes! If Kaizen fights fiercely and without mercy, using her formidable fighting skills, the Terror gauge will get filled , and the enemies will begin to doubt, will hesitate to attack, and will escape in terror!

Be careful if you let them escape, Kaizen will not be very happy, and you will make him lose points! And most importantly, the Supreme correction will not be completed!


For the first time in a game, you have the perfect warrior ever in your hands, do not miss out on this power by being  small players!

It must be a pad 8 buttons and 2 3Dstick! For this type of game, the pad is essential for comfort and speed of action.

Moving / combinations Hero is with the D-Pad (Left Stick or 3D). Button for attacks and defenses.

3D stick Right, will enable you to target during shoot'em up sequences. But during  the  sequences of actions,  it will make you lock your next enemy, or you will be able to teleport.

Whether through the Gamedesign, Level design, charcaters design, script, music or animation, everything is meant to provide a puzzling adventure (in a good way). Indeed, playing "Story of Heroes", you will be constantly surprised.

Indeed, the variety will not be found only on alternating phases of action / shooter game, but everywhere, and make the course of the adventure and the evolution of the protagonists, even more surprising.

The goal is to provide a confusing game in concept, with a story developed, a gameplay making sense of the power of the characters, through rich fighting, attacks scenarios varied and complex. And other surprises too! And in a complete game (not DLC).

The Universe .... In these places, there are Supreme Beings who are waging a battle for milleniums. They are not immortal, but thanks to their "Souls Power", they can live for several thousand years. But the end of their fight is to come very soon  ..

"The prayer of desperation, and the birth of a Hero"

"I'm Ezia the High Priestess of the Universe, I implore you, Great Creator, to help us .... The Forces of Evil are increasingly present, and the Demon Lord Rendel spreads the chaos. The Forces of Good is no longer numerous enough to protect us, please, help us .... "

These are the words, heard by Kaïzen .... And since that day, he confronts the demons everywhere in the universe. For centuries, his power made his numerous enemies surrender, giving new hope for the forces of good, who saw in his person  the providential Hero.

This situation triggered the wrath of the dreaded Demon Lord Rendel. His army, led by horrible Commander Jinra was ordered to eliminate this so-called hero . Despite incessant enemy waves, the Hero remained inexhaustible. Faced with such a demonstration of power, the Demons could only be defeated. And Victory was to prevail ...

"The rumor that changed the victory!! Legendary Weapon appears !!"

A legend says, that there is a weapon that would give its possessor the Ultimate Power, the Great Creator. It can destroy all lives.

Soon, the legend spread across the universe, until Demons. The High Priestess Ezia, was afraid that such a weapon exists, because if it could fall into the hands of the Lord Rendel, it would be the end of time. She sent her Soldiers to find this weapon and  destroy it definitively.

The Lord Rendel sent Jinra in search of this weapon, which could help him defeat his archenemy, that has  become too powerful ....The Lord Rendel, sent Jinra to look for the legendary weapon, the only way to destroy his archenemy, who has succeeded to be better than he was ...

Centuries later, the Commander finally found the legendary weapon, and brought it to his lord. He was astonished because he always thought  that  t this weapon was only a legend ... But no, it wasn't... it was there,  in his hands.

The High Priestess Ezia was informed, and did not know what to do. She could not send her troops to a certain defeat. She did not understand either the absence of heroes to prevent this ...Alas, it was too late, and the Lord Rendel used the weapon ... the end of life seemed inevitable...

"Amazing !!!! What did you do Hero !!!!"

"Why .... why did you do such a thing, Hero .... I gave you my trust and you betrayed me ...."

These are the words uttered Ezia the High Priestess of the Universe ....

"Miserable Bastard .... ...." .... was the only words of the Lord Rendel, who came to understand the deception! A humiliation too ....

But so what did Kaizen do ? Why did he betray the High Priestess Ezia? And therefore why was the Lord of Demons so humiliated when it  seemed that he  has the weapon to defeat the Hero?

Discover who Kaizen truly is and how the Dark Forces gave him total victory ....

Rendel, Lord of Demons, has one ambition: he wants to govern the universe and impose his clan to the detriment of humanity. The first step is to eliminate the Priestess, who is hiding throughout the galaxy. But since the advent of Kaizen, and since his severe defeats, he swears to destroy this Universe to erase all traces of this humiliation.

Ezia the High Priestess is the guardian of the whole Universe. She protects humans, she has all the knowledge. She lives in a hidden kingdom, in the center of the universe, but no human or demon does not know her name or where she is located. She fights for millennia, the army of Rendel. Coupled with this sudden appearance of a hero, victory seems certain. But she was surprised when the hero began "this act" ...

Kaizen is the greatest warrior and nothing can stop it. This is a intelligent fighter, complete and ruthless. His name is unknown to all, even the Priestess Ezia. He defeated the Demons, but does not want to stop there, and more desire: permanently erase the Dark Forces. For this, he committed "an act" which angry the Priestess, and horrified Rendel ....

Like many independent studios, Rykeï Studios, is a group of enthusiasts who have been working for more than 10 years in the video game world. With our experiences, we are able to realize our project. We have all the skills and the adequate team to complete the project in its entirety!

However, the reality of the video game industry is cruel: this game will never be financed by a major studio, or given a grant. In such situation, Marketing is what will enable or not this project to be created. .

That's why we want to deal with the real decision makers: the players. Only you will make it possible for this project to be continued or not. .

The overall design of the game is estimated at 72 000 Euros. 2D animations, represent 50% of the amount requested. The reason for that amount is that the enemy bestiary (and Boss) is well supplied and full of varieties, to avoid clashes routine. Same thing for Hero. And especially for fluid dynamics and traditional animation.

In addition, proposing  nice graphics and complete gameplay is good, but it is also important to have voices for the characters. The ideal would be to have a Japanese dubbing (and subtitled in different languages, as good fansubs!), Given the universe of the game.

As in Rykeï Studios, we do not accept to put a price on a mediocre game, the continuity of the project will be made only if the amount requested is reached.

Also note that if Fortunately, the campaign goes beyond all expectations, there will be additional content, to make the experience even more perfect! (note, not DLC, but integrated directly into the game!).

And if it goes beyond, but really to infinity (like 100 000 euros), the home consoles will receive the game!

Thanks for your help!




                                   

Version Française:


"Story of Heroes" est un jeu d'action 2D, avec des phases de shoot'em up, conçu pour remplir plusieurs critères importants :

- l'amusement et la joie des joueurs (c'est toujours excitant d'enchainer des combos, cela provoque un sentiment de maîtrise et de puissance !)

- des séquences de jeu variées et rythmées

- différents angles de vues d'action :la menace vient de tous les cotés, la sensation du danger est omniprésente

- un gameplay technique et agressif pour le joueur qui dirige des combats d'une puissance effroyable

- un Héros, dotant d'un très vaste choix de coups, aux possibilités d'enchainements impressionnantes, brutales, parfois même humiliantes (voir un ennemi en sueur, devant une démonstration de puissance, c'est une délectation suprême !)

- des bestiaires d'ennemis et de Boss variés, avec un large panel d'attaques, pour le plaisir du challenge

- un niveau de difficulté élevé de base (mais réglable, pour les ceintures blanches !), et deux autres plus hardcore ("Too hard" et "Climax"), disponibles dés le début

- un scénario qui développe l'identité des personnages, et qui montre la puissance du Héros dés son apparition, devant entraîner la terreur et l'impuissance des Forces du Mal.

Le jeu est développé pour sortir sur PC et Mac. Idéalement, le titre sortirait également sur consoles de salon (PS3, X Box 360, WiiU, PS4, XBox One), mais ce portage a un coût plus important (100 000 Euros).

Le design du jeu est de type Manga/Anime s'inspirant des grandes œuvres comme Dragon Ball, St Seiya, Yuyu Hakusho, Naruto ou One Piece.

Pourquoi opter pour cet univers graphique? Car cela permet d'avoir un univers bien plus libre et facilement malléable, sans avoir les limites du réalisme. Une aubaine pour la créativité des artistes !

Cela se ressentira à travers la variété des décors, du design des personnages, et du gameplay et donne la possibilité d'avoir des animations plus dynamiques.

Cependant, "Story of Heroes" n'est pas un "fan service" !

Tout un univers est développé, pour donner vie à ce gameplay unique, qui propose une approche de combat différente.

Le scénario également, n'est pas en reste, puisque ce n'est pas seulement une histoire de Démon qui veut détruire l'Univers, et un Héros qui vient en aide pour sauver la pauvre jeune fille apeurée ! Non, c'est plus que ça!

Enfin, bien que l'univers du jeu soit clairement coloré, il faudra s'attendre à une touche de violence ! (puisque on parle depuis le début, d'un jeu qui soit menaçant, brutal, nerveux et puissant !). Mais sans toutefois être gore.

Vous dirigez le Redoutable et Puissant Kaïzen, qui vous demandera de traverser 16 grands niveaux pour accomplir sa mission. Attention, il est déterminé et exigeant, et espère que les joueurs seront prêts à éliminer tous les ennemis sans exception, et à instaurer la terreur sur ces misérables ! Les joueurs devront faire de gros scores pour être à la hauteur de Kaïzen.

Le guerrier peut exécuter des attaques au corps, à l'arme blanche, et lancer des attaques énergétiques ("KI"). Son pouvoir n'a pas d'égal, et depuis sa naissance, il a appris toutes sortes de techniques :

- Simple Attack,

- Super Attack,

- Combo,

- Super Combo,

- Hyper Combo,

- Double Combo,

- Divin Combo,

- Divin Attack,

- Finish Attack,

- Defense,

- Dodge,

- Back/Front Flip,

- Counter,

- Counter Attack,

- Teleportation,

- Defense Combo,

- Energy Shield, et bien d'autres!

Pendant les phases de Shoot'em em up, il est aussi à l'aise, avec de nombreuses attaques basées sur les boules de feu, mais également des coups aux corps à corps et des duels à l'arme !

Oui, il est devenu le parfait combattant, ne connaissant ni la peur, ni la pitié. Personne ne peut l'arrêter, pas même un Game Over !

Les ennemis et Boss, sont tout autant déterminés à en découdre ! Surtout après leurs terribles raclées reçues dans le passé, mais aussi pour la terrible humiliation que vient de leur infliger Kaïzen (c'est à vous de comprendre pourquoi !).

Ils sont également redoutables, et disposent d'attaques et de défenses dévastatrices:

- Simple Attack,

- Super Attack,

- Combo,

- Super Combo,

- Duo Combo,

- Dark Attack,

- Defense,

- Dodge,

- Back/Front Flip,

- Counter,

- Counter Attack,

- Teleportation, ect ...

De plus, ils attaquent en groupe, et ont des scénarii d'attaques. Par exemple, l'un d'eux fait le kamikaze en explosant sur Kaïzen, immédiatement surpris par un autre ennemi caché jaillissant du sol !

Autre exemple, ils attaquent à deux, mais feintent en se retirant pour laisser place à un 3ème ennemi ripostant par surprise.

Enfin, ils sont prêts à surgir de partout : du fond de décor, du premier plan, des airs ou du sol : tout est permis...

Des combats totalement épiques, à maintenir sans relâche !

Et oui ! Si Kaïzen se bat avec acharnement et sans pitié, en utilisant ses redoutables techniques de combat, la jauge de Terreur se remplira, et les ennemis commenceront à douter, hésiteront à attaquer, et se sauveront avec terreur !

Attention, si vous les laisser s'enfuir, Kaïzen ne sera pas très satisfait, et vous lui ferez perdre des points ! Enfin et surtout, la correction suprême, ne sera pas totale !


Pour la première fois dans un jeu, vous avez le guerrier parfait entre les mains, ne passez pas à coté de cette puissance en faisant "les petits joueurs!"

Pour un tel type de jeu, le pad est indispensable pour le confort et la rapidité des actions, ainsi que 8 boutons et deux 3D Sticks.

Les déplacements / combos du Héros se font avec le D-Pad (ou 3D Stick Gauche). Les boutons servent aux attaques et défenses.

Le 3D stick Droit sert de visée pour les séquences de shoot'em up. Mais également pendant les séquences actions, par exemple pour locker un prochain ennemi, ou se téléporter. 

Que cela soit au travers du Gamedesign, Level design, Charcater design, scénario, musiques ou animations, tout est fait en sorte pour proposer une aventure déroutante (dans le bon sens). En effet, en jouant à "Story of Heroes", vous serez constamment surpris.

En effet, la variété ne s'arrête pas à l'alternance des phases de jeu en action/shoot, mais aussi sur tous les points, et rendra le déroulement de l'aventure et l'évolution des protagonistes, encore plus surprenante.

L'objectif est de proposer un jeu déroutant dans son concept, avec une histoire développée, un gameplay faisant ressentir toute la puissance des personnages, à travers des combats riches, des scénarii d'attaques variés et complexes. Également d'autres surprises ! Le tout dans un jeu complet (pas de DLC).

L'Univers....En ces lieux, il existe des Etres Suprêmes qui se livrent une bataille depuis des millénaires. Ils ne sont pas immortels, mais grâce à leurs "Ames de Puissance", ils peuvent vivre pendant plusieurs millénaires. Mais la fin de leur combat, était proche..

"La prière du désespoir, la naissance d'un Héros"

"Je suis Ezia la Grande Prêtresse de l'Univers, je vous implore, Grand Créateur, de nous venir en aide ...Les Forces du Mal sont de plus en plus présentes, et le Seigneur Démon Rendel sème le chaos. Les Forces du Bien ne sont plus assez nombreuses pour nous protéger, par pitié, aidez-nous ..."

Ce sont les paroles qu'entendit Kaïzen... Depuis ce jour, il affronte les Démons, partout dans l'Univers. Depuis des siècles, sa puissance tressaille ses nombreux ennemis, redonnant l'espoir aux forces du bien, qui voient en cet être, le Héros providentiel.

Ce qui déclencha les foudres du redoutable Seigneur Démon Rendel. Toute son armée, dirigée par l'horrible Commandant Jinra, avait pour ordre de prendre en cible ce soit disant Héros, pour l'éliminer. Malgré des vagues ennemis incessantes, le Héros resta inépuisable. Devant une telle démonstration de puissance, les Démons ne pouvaient être que vaincus. La victoire semblait donc acquise...

"La rumeur qui fit basculer la victoire : l'apparition de l'Arme Légendaire !!!"

La légende raconte qu'il existerait une arme qui doterait son possesseur de la Puissance Ultime, celle du Grand Créateur. Ce pouvoir anéantirait toute trace de vie.

Très vite la légende se répandit au-travers de l'univers, jusqu'au Démons.

La Grande Prêtresse Ezia redoutait qu'une telle arme existe, car si elle parvenait à tomber entre les mains du Seigneur Rendel, ce serait la fin des temps. Elle envoya ses Soldats trouver cette arme afin de la détruire définitivement.

Le Seigneur Rendel envoya Jinra à la recherche de l'Arme légendaire, seul moyen d'anéantir son ennemi suprême l'ayant désormais surpassé...

Des siècles plus tard, le Commandant trouva enfin l'Arme Légendaire, qu'il rapporta à son seigneur. Ce dernier était stupéfait, pensant que cette arme n'était qu'une légende...Pourtant non, il la tenait bien entre ses mains.

La Grande Prêtresse Ezia fut informée, et ne savait plus quoi faire. Elle ne pouvait envoyer ses troupes vers une défaite certaine. Elle ne comprenait pas non plus l'absence du héros pour empêcher cela...

Hélas, il fut trop tard, et le Seigneur Rendel utilisa l'arme... la fin de la vie semblait inéluctable...

"Incroyable... Qu'as-tu fait, héros !?!"

"Pourquoi...Pourquoi as-tu fait une chose pareille... Je t'ai donné toute ma confiance, tu m'as trompée..."

Ce sont les paroles que prononça Ezia la Grande Prêtresse de l'Univers...

"Enfoiré...Misérable..."  furent les seuls mots du Seigneur Rendel, qui venait de comprendre la supercherie ! Une humiliation de trop...

Mais qu'a donc fait Kaizen ? Pourquoi a t'il trompé la confiance de la Grande Prêtresse Ezia ? Et pourquoi le Seigneur des Démons sombra dans l'humiliation, alors qu'il semblait posséder l'Arme pour vaincre le Héros ?

Découvrez, qui est véritablement Kaïzen, et comment les Forces du Mal lui ont offert la victoire totale...

Rendel, le Seigneur des Démons, ne jure que par une ambition : gouverner l'Univers et imposer sa race au détriment de l'humanité. La première étape consiste à éliminer la Prêtresse, qui se cache dans toute la galaxie. Mais depuis l'apparition de Kaïzen, et depuis ses sévères corrections reçues, il ne jure de détruire cet Univers que pour effacer toute trace de cette humiliation.

La Grande Prêtresse Ezia est la gardienne de tout l'Univers. Elle protège les humains, elle a toutes les connaissances. Elle vit dans un Royaume caché, au centre de l'Univers, mais aucun humain ou Démon ne connait ni son nom ni sa localisation. Elle affronte depuis des millénaires l'armée de Rendel. Couplée à cette apparition fortuite d'un héros, la victoire semble acquise. Mais qu'elle ne fut pas sa surprise, lorsque ce héros entreprit "cet acte"...

Kaïzen est le plus grand de tous les guerriers et rien ne peut l'arrêter. C'est un combattant intelligent, complet et impitoyable. Son nom est inconnu de tous, même de la Prêtresse Ezia. Il a vaincu les Démons mais ne souhaite pas s'en arrêter là. Il désire plus pour que les Forces du Mal soient totalement et définitivement annihilées. C'est pour cela qu'il commit "un acte", mettant en rage la Prêtresse, tout en horrifiant Rendel...

Comme beaucoup de studios indépendants, Rykeï Studios est un regroupement de passionnés, qui travaillent depuis plus de 10 ans dans le monde du jeu vidéo. Forts de nos expériences, nous sommes en mesure de concrétiser notre projet. Nous avons toutes les compétences et l'équipe, pour mener à bien le projet dans sa globalité !

Cependant, la réalité de l'industrie du jeu vidéo est cruelle : un tel jeu ne serra jamais financé par un grand studio, ou par une subvention. Le marketing est seul décisionnaire dans ces situations-là.

C'est pour cela que nous nous adressons aux véritables décideurs, les joueurs. Vous seuls prendrez la décision de la continuité du projet ou non.

La conception globale du jeu est estimée à 72 000 Euros. Les animations 2D représentent 50% de la somme demandée. Car le bestiaire ennemis (et Boss) est très fourni et différent, pour éviter la routine des affrontements. Idem, pour le Héros. Et surtout, pour avoir des animations traditionnelles fluides et dynamiques.

De plus, avoir de beaux graphismes et un gameplay complet, c'est bien, mais il est important d'avoir également des voix pour les personnages. L'idéale serait d'avoir un doublage Japonais (et sous titré en différentes langues, comme de bons fansubs !), compte tenu de l'univers du jeu.

Comme chez Rykeï Studios, nous n'acceptons pas de mettre un prix sur un jeu médiocre, la continuité du projet ne se fera que si la somme demandée est atteinte.

Sachez également que si par bonheur, la campagne va au delà de toute attente, il y aura du contenu supplémentaire, pour rendre l'expérience encore plus parfaite! (attention, pas en DLC, mais intégré directement dans le jeu !).

Et si cela va au delà, mais vraiment vers l'infini (genre 100 000 Euros), les consoles de salon pourront accueillir le jeu !

Merci pour votre aide!

with phases of shoot'em up, designed to adapt several major criteria:
-fun and entertainement for the players (it's
always exciting to chain attacks, it causes a sense of mastery and power!)
-various and rhythmic game sequences, 
-different angles of
action views: the threat comes from all sides, the feeling of danger is omnipresent
-technical
and aggressive gameplay for the player who leads fights with a fearsome power
- A Hero, with a very wide range of shots
combined with awesome combination opportunities, sometimes brutal, sometimes
humiliating (see an enemy in sweat in
front of a demonstration of power, it is a supreme delight!)-a varied bestiary of enemies and Boss , with
different special moves to avoid the
monotony of fighting,
-a high level of difficulty (but adjustable for
beginners!) basis, and two others ("Too hard" and
"Climax"), available from the beginning,
-a scenario that develops the identity of the
characters, and shows the power of the Hero as soon as he appears, causing
terror and helplessness of the Forces of Evil.The game is developed for PC and Mac. Ideally,
the title would also come out on home consoles (PS3, X Box 360, WiiU, PS4, Xbox
One), but this port means a higher cost (100 000 Euros).The design of the game is like  Manga / Anime and is  inspired by great works such as Dragon Ball,
St Seiya, Yuyu Hakusho, Naruto or One Piece.
Why choose this graphic universe? Because it allows  a free and easily malleable universe, without
the limits of realism. A big opportunity for artists' creativity!
This will be found in the variety of scenery,
the character design, the gameplay and the possibility to have more dynamic
animations.
However, "Story of Heroes" is not a "fanservice "!
A whole universe is developed, to give life to this unique gameplay,
which offers a different approach to
combat.
The scenario also is not left out, since it is
not only a story of Demon, who wants to destroy the universe, and a Hero who
helps to save the poor scared girl ! No, it's more than that.

Finally, although the
game world is clearly colored, it will expect a touch of violence! (since we
are talking about from the beginning, a game that is threatening, brutal,
powerful and nervous!). But without being violent or gore.

put terror on these miserable! Players will need to make big scores to be equal
Kaizen.

For

Whether through the Gamedesign, Level design,

The
Universe .... In these places, there are Supreme Beings who are waging a battle
for milleniums. They are not immortal, but thanks to their "Souls
Power", they can live for several thousand years. But the end of their
fight is to come very soon  ..
"The
prayer of desperation, and the birth of a Hero"
"I'm
Ezia the High Priestess of the Universe, I implore you, Great Creator, to help
us .... The Forces of Evil are increasingly present, and the Demon Lord Rendel
spreads the chaos. The Forces of Good is no longer numerous enough to protect
us, please, help us .... "
These are the words, heard by Kaïzen .... And
since that day, he confronts the demons everywhere in the universe. For
centuries, his power made his numerous enemies surrender, giving new hope for
the forces of good, who saw in his person 
the providential Hero.
This situation triggered the wrath of the
dreaded Demon Lord Rendel. His army, led by horrible Commander Jinra was
ordered to eliminate this so-called hero . Despite incessant enemy waves, the
Hero remained inexhaustible. Faced with such a demonstration of power, the
Demons could only be defeated. And Victory was to prevail ...
"The
rumor that changed the victory!! Legendary Weapon appears !!"
A
legend says, that there is a weapon that would give its possessor the Ultimate Power, the Great Creator. It can destroy all lives.
Soon, the
legend spread across the universe, until Demons. The High Priestess Ezia, was afraid that such a weapon exists,
because if it could fall into the hands of the Lord Rendel, it would be the end of time. She sent her Soldiers to find this weapon and  destroy
it definitively.
The Lord Rendel sent Jinra in search of this weapon, which could help him defeat his
archenemy, that has  become too powerful
....The Lord Rendel, sent Jinra to look for the legendary weapon, the only way
to destroy his archenemy, who has succeeded to be better than he was ...
Centuries later, the Commander finally found the legendary weapon, and
brought it to his lord. He was astonished because he always thought  that  t
this weapon was only a legend ... But no, it wasn't... it was there,  in his hands.
The High Priestess Ezia was informed, and did
not know what to do. She could not send her troops to a certain defeat. She did not understand either the absence of heroes
to prevent this ...Alas, it was too late, and the Lord Rendel used the weapon ... the end of life
seemed inevitable...
"Amazing
!!!! What did you do Hero !!!!"
"Why
.... why did you do such a thing, Hero .... I gave you my trust and you
betrayed me ...."
These are the words uttered Ezia the High
Priestess of the Universe ....
"Miserable
Bastard .... ...." .... was the only words
of the Lord Rendel, who came to understand the
deception! A humiliation too ....
But so what did Kaizen do ? Why did he betray
the High Priestess Ezia? And therefore why was the Lord of Demons so humiliated
when it  seemed that he  has the weapon to defeat the Hero?
Discover
who Kaizen truly is and how the Dark Forces gave him total victory ....

Rendel, Lord of Demons, has one ambition: he wants to govern the universe and
impose his clan to the detriment of humanity. The first step is to eliminate
the Priestess, who is hiding throughout the galaxy. But since the advent of
Kaizen, and since his severe defeats, he swears to destroy this Universe to
erase all traces of this humiliation.

Ezia
the High Priestess is the guardian of the
whole Universe. She protects humans, she has all the knowledge. She lives in a
hidden kingdom, in the center of the universe, but no human or demon does not
know her name or where she is located. She fights for millennia, the army of
Rendel. Coupled with this sudden appearance of a hero, victory seems certain.
But she was surprised when the hero began "this act" ...

Kaizen is the greatest warrior and nothing can stop it. This is a intelligent
fighter, complete and ruthless. His name is unknown to all, even the Priestess
Ezia. He defeated the Demons, but does not want to stop there, and more desire:
permanently erase the Dark Forces. For this, he committed "an act" which angry the Priestess,
and horrified Rendel ....

.

                                   Version Française:




"Story of Heroes" est un jeu d'action 2D, avec
des phases de shoot'em up, conçu pour remplir plusieurs critères importants : 
- l'amusement et la joie des joueurs (c'est toujours
excitant d'enchainer des combos, cela provoque un sentiment de maîtrise et de puissance !)
- des séquences de jeu variées et rythmées
- différents angles de vues d'action :la menace vient de tous les cotés, la sensation du danger est omniprésente
- un gameplay technique
et agressif pour le joueur qui
dirige des combats d'une puissance effroyable
- un Héros, dotant d'un très vaste choix de coups, aux possibilités d'enchainements
impressionnantes, brutales, parfois même humiliantes (voir un ennemi en sueur,
devant une démonstration de puissance, c'est une délectation suprême !)

- des bestiaires d'ennemis et de Boss variés, avec un large panel d'attaques, pour le
plaisir du challenge
- un niveau de difficulté élevé de base (mais réglable,
pour les ceintures blanches !), et deux autres plus hardcore ("Too
hard" et "Climax"), disponibles dés le début
- un scénario qui développe l'identité des personnages,
et qui montre la puissance du Héros dés son apparition, devant entraîner la
terreur et l'impuissance des Forces du Mal.


Le
jeu est développé pour sortir sur PC et Mac. Idéalement, le titre sortirait
également sur consoles de salon (PS3, X Box 360, WiiU, PS4, XBox One), mais ce
portage a un coût plus important (100 000 Euros).

Le design du jeu est de type Manga/Anime s'inspirant des
grandes œuvres comme Dragon Ball, St Seiya, Yuyu Hakusho, Naruto ou One Piece. 
Pourquoi opter pour cet univers graphique?
Car cela permet d'avoir un univers bien
plus libre et facilement malléable, sans avoir les limites du réalisme. Une
aubaine pour la créativité des artistes !
Cela se ressentira à travers la variété des décors, du design des
personnages, et du gameplay et donne
la possibilité d'avoir des animations plus dynamiques.
Cependant, "Story of Heroes" n'est pas un "fan service" !

Tout
un univers est développé, pour donner
vie à ce gameplay unique, qui propose une approche de combat différente.
Le
scénario également, n'est pas en reste, puisque ce n'est pas seulement une
histoire de Démon qui veut détruire l'Univers, et un Héros qui vient en aide
pour sauver la pauvre jeune fille apeurée ! Non, c'est plus que ça!
Enfin, bien que l'univers du jeu soit clairement
coloré, il faudra s'attendre à une touche de violence ! (puisque on parle
depuis le début, d'un jeu qui soit menaçant, brutal, nerveux et puissant !).
Mais sans toutefois être gore.

Vous dirigez le Redoutable
et Puissant Kaïzen, qui vous
demandera de traverser 16 grands niveaux
pour accomplir sa mission. Attention, il est déterminé et exigeant, et espère que les joueurs seront prêts à
éliminer tous les ennemis sans
exception, et à instaurer la terreur
sur ces misérables ! Les joueurs devront faire de gros scores pour être à la
hauteur de Kaïzen.


Le guerrier peut exécuter des attaques au
corps, à l'arme blanche, et lancer des attaques énergétiques ("KI").
Son pouvoir n'a pas d'égal, et depuis sa naissance, il a appris toutes sortes
de techniques :
- Simple Attack, 
- Super Attack, 
- Combo, 
- Super Combo, 
- Hyper Combo, 
- Double Combo, 
- Divin Combo, 
- Divin Attack, 
- Finish Attack, 
- Defense, 
- Dodge, 
- Back/Front Flip, 
- Counter, 
- Counter Attack, 
- Teleportation, 
- Defense Combo, 
- Energy Shield, et bien d'autres!
Pendant les phases de Shoot'em em up, il est aussi à l'aise, avec de nombreuses attaques
basées sur les boules de feu, mais également des coups aux corps à corps et des
duels à l'arme !

Oui, il est devenu le parfait combattant, ne connaissant
ni la peur, ni la pitié. Personne ne
peut l'arrêter, pas même un Game Over !




Les ennemis et Boss, sont tout autant déterminés à en
découdre ! Surtout après leurs terribles
raclées reçues dans le passé, mais aussi pour la terrible humiliation que vient de leur infliger Kaïzen (c'est à
vous de comprendre pourquoi !).
Ils sont également redoutables, et disposent d'attaques
et de défenses dévastatrices:
- Simple Attack,
- Super Attack, 
- Combo, 
- Super Combo, 
- Duo Combo, 
- Dark Attack, 
- Defense, 
- Dodge, 
- Back/Front Flip, 
- Counter, 
- Counter Attack, 
- Teleportation, ect
...
De plus, ils
attaquent en groupe, et ont des scénarii
d'attaques. Par exemple, l'un d'eux fait le kamikaze en explosant sur
Kaïzen, immédiatement surpris par un autre ennemi caché jaillissant du sol !
Autre exemple, ils attaquent à deux, mais feintent en se
retirant pour laisser place à un 3ème ennemi ripostant par surprise.
Enfin, ils sont prêts à surgir de partout : du fond de décor, du premier plan, des airs
ou du sol : tout est permis...
Des combats totalement épiques, à maintenir sans
relâche !


Et oui ! Si Kaïzen se bat avec acharnement et sans pitié,
en utilisant ses redoutables techniques de combat, la jauge de Terreur se remplira, et les ennemis commenceront à douter,
hésiteront à attaquer, et se sauveront avec terreur !
Attention, si vous les laisser s'enfuir, Kaïzen ne sera pas très satisfait, et
vous lui ferez perdre des points ! Enfin
et surtout, la correction suprême,
ne sera pas totale !

déclencha les foudres du redoutable Seigneur
Démon Rendel. Toute son armée, dirigée par l'horrible Commandant Jinra, avait pour ordre de prendre en cible ce soit
disant Héros, pour l'éliminer. Malgré
des vagues ennemis incessantes, le Héros resta inépuisable. Devant une telle démonstration
de puissance, les Démons ne pouvaient être que vaincus. La victoire
semblait donc acquise...
"La rumeur qui fit basculer la
victoire : l'apparition de l'Arme Légendaire !!!"
La légende raconte qu'il existerait une
arme qui doterait son possesseur de la Puissance
Ultime, celle du Grand Créateur. Ce pouvoir anéantirait toute trace de vie.
Très vite la légende se répandit au-travers de
l'univers, jusqu'au Démons. 
La Grande Prêtresse Ezia redoutait
qu'une telle arme existe, car si elle parvenait à tomber entre les mains du
Seigneur Rendel, ce serait la fin des
temps. Elle envoya ses Soldats trouver
cette arme afin de la détruire
définitivement.
Le Seigneur
Rendel envoya Jinra à la recherche
de l'Arme légendaire, seul moyen d'anéantir son ennemi suprême l'ayant désormais
surpassé...
Des siècles
plus tard, le Commandant trouva enfin l'Arme
Légendaire, qu'il rapporta à son seigneur. Ce dernier était stupéfait,
pensant que cette arme n'était qu'une légende...Pourtant non, il la tenait bien
entre ses mains.
La Grande
Prêtresse Ezia fut informée, et ne savait plus quoi faire. Elle ne pouvait envoyer
ses troupes vers une défaite certaine.
Elle ne comprenait pas non plus l'absence du héros pour empêcher cela...
Hélas, il fut
trop tard, et le Seigneur Rendel utilisa
l'arme... la fin de la vie semblait inéluctable...
"Incroyable... Qu'as-tu fait, héros
!?!"
"Pourquoi...Pourquoi as-tu fait une chose
pareille... Je t'ai donné toute ma confiance, tu m'as trompée..."

Ce sont les
paroles que prononça Ezia la Grande
Prêtresse de l'Univers...
"Enfoiré...Misérable..."  furent les seuls mots du Seigneur Rendel,
qui venait de comprendre la supercherie !
Une humiliation de trop...
Mais qu'a donc
fait Kaizen ? Pourquoi a t'il trompé la confiance de la Grande Prêtresse Ezia ?
Et pourquoi le Seigneur des Démons sombra dans l'humiliation, alors qu'il
semblait posséder l'Arme pour vaincre le Héros ?
Découvrez, qui est véritablement Kaïzen, et comment les
Forces du Mal lui ont offert la victoire totale...


Rendel, le Seigneur des Démons, ne jure que par une
ambition : gouverner l'Univers et imposer sa race au détriment de l'humanité. La
première étape consiste à éliminer la Prêtresse, qui se cache dans toute la
galaxie. Mais depuis l'apparition de Kaïzen, et depuis ses sévères corrections
reçues, il ne jure de détruire cet Univers que pour effacer toute trace de cette
humiliation.


La Grande Prêtresse Ezia est la gardienne de tout
l'Univers. Elle protège les humains, elle a toutes les connaissances. Elle vit
dans un Royaume caché, au centre de l'Univers, mais aucun humain ou Démon ne
connait ni son nom ni sa localisation. Elle affronte depuis des millénaires l'armée de Rendel. Couplée
à cette apparition fortuite d'un héros, la victoire semble acquise. Mais
qu'elle ne fut pas sa surprise, lorsque ce héros entreprit "cet acte"...

Kaïzen est le plus grand de tous les guerriers et
rien ne peut l'arrêter. C'est un combattant intelligent, complet et
impitoyable. Son nom est inconnu de tous, même de la Prêtresse Ezia. Il a
vaincu les Démons mais ne souhaite pas s'en arrêter là. Il désire plus pour que
les Forces du Mal soient totalement et définitivement annihilées. C'est pour
cela qu'il commit "un acte",
mettant en rage la Prêtresse, tout en horrifiant Rendel...


Comme
beaucoup de studios indépendants, Rykeï
Studios est un regroupement de passionnés, qui travaillent depuis plus de
10 ans dans le monde du jeu vidéo. Forts de nos expériences, nous sommes en
mesure de concrétiser notre projet. Nous avons toutes les compétences et
l'équipe, pour mener à bien le projet dans sa globalité !
Cependant,
la réalité de l'industrie du jeu vidéo est cruelle : un tel jeu ne serra jamais
financé par un grand studio, ou par une subvention. Le marketing est seul
décisionnaire dans ces situations-là.
C'est
pour cela que nous nous adressons aux véritables décideurs, les joueurs. Vous seuls prendrez la
décision de la continuité du projet ou non.
La
conception globale du jeu est estimée à 72 000 Euros. Les animations 2D
représentent 50% de la somme demandée. Car le bestiaire ennemis (et Boss) est
très fourni et différent, pour éviter la routine des affrontements. Idem, pour
le Héros. Et surtout, pour avoir des animations traditionnelles fluides et
dynamiques.
De
plus, avoir de beaux graphismes et un gameplay complet, c'est bien, mais il est
important d'avoir également des voix pour les personnages. L'idéale serait
d'avoir un doublage Japonais (et sous titré en différentes langues, comme de
bons fansubs !), compte tenu de l'univers du jeu.
Comme
chez Rykeï Studios, nous n'acceptons pas
de mettre un prix sur un jeu médiocre, la continuité du projet ne se fera que
si la somme demandée est atteinte. 
Sachez
également que si par bonheur, la campagne va au delà de toute attente, il y aura du contenu supplémentaire,
pour rendre l'expérience encore plus parfaite! (attention, pas en DLC, mais intégré directement dans le jeu !).
Et
si cela va au delà, mais vraiment vers l'infini (genre 100 000 Euros), les
consoles de salon pourront accueillir le jeu ! 
Merci
pour votre aide!

story: In addition to the rewards we will be handing out to the winners of the Glory and Excellence brackets, we would also like to show our appreciation for the best mentors of the tournament who went above and beyond to help the participants of Glory out. Any little bit of help would mean a lot to us organizers as well as the recipients of the rewards! :)
story_txt: In addition to the rewards we will be handing out to the winners of the Glory and Excellence brackets, we would also like to show our appreciation for the best mentors of the tournament who went above and beyond to help the participants of Glory out. Any little bit of help would mean a lot to us organizers as well as the recipients of the rewards! :)

story:
We share your passion for skateboarding, and that's why we know how you feel when you land that trick you've been trying for months.

We want to give you the opportunity to share your achievements with all your friends, those who are riding with you, and those who aren't. 

We've developed a device that comprises the latest in motion sensing technology and Bluetooth that allows our mobile Apps to identify which trick has been performed, and how well. That gives skaters the possibility to show their improvements, their goals and even play the famous S.K.A.T.E. game with people around the world without the need of being in the same geographical spot!

Sk8trakr identifies every time you perform a trick while you are riding, each trick is automatically recognized by the app and it gives you the name and a score based on how well you performed it. Since the detection is made in real time, you can check all that info right away!

With Sk8trakr you can save all your progress. Now you can check where and when you landed that sick trick that gave you lots of points. Now you can keep track of your improvement over time and check if those training sessions are working for you.

Sk8trakr is a gaming platform that lets you challenge other skaters and see who performs the best tricks or even play the famous game of S.K.A.T.E. in real time, just let Sk8trakr decide who is the best skater! There are a lot of game modes: 1 vs. 1, multiplayer, real time or deferred and several games: S.K.A.T.E., Best Trick, Own The Spot, Time Challange and others. There is also a global ranking of skaters.

The trick detection is performed via an electronic device (Trakr) that measures acceleration, rotation and magnetic field on three directions. The information gathered by the sensors is then transmitted to the mobile phone via Bluetooth to be processed. The mobile phone interprets the information and, using complex algorithms, detects the landed trick and scores it. 

The Trakr is attached between the trucks and the board  as if it was a regular pad. This location guarantees the integrity of the device in case you like hitting rails or boxes while you ride, and easy access, through a USB cable, to the rechargeable battery.

The team is composed by four engineers, all action sports fans with the necessary experience to build Sk8trakr. We have already worked with all the technology needed for this product. Our amazing partners, Wolox and GoodPeople are actively supporting the development of this product.

We have a working prototype of the tracking device (Trakr) and we are already manufacturing version 2, which will be just one step away from the pre-production version of Trakr. This upcoming version will allow us to test Trakr on tough conditions and perform the necessary tuning to design the production-ready version. We are also working close with an industrial designer to develop the manufacturable case.

Regarding the software, we have a working version of the detection algorithm and we are training our classification algorithms. We have assembled a team of professional skaters provided by GoodPeople to train the algorithm with new data. We were able to detect tricks with our first version of Trakr. We are now completing our data set so we can improve its performance.

Finally we have a first version of the UI of the iOS version of the mobile app. We are also working with Wolox’s Android team on the UI of the Android version.

Shipping outside the U.S. or Argentina is not included. Cost may vary between USD10 to USD15.

All the funders that apply for pre-production Trakr will be part of our test group. This means that every time we develop a new feature you will be the first one to test.

We've already spent more than U$D10.000 of our own money and we will continue doing so because we believe this project can bring the entire skateboarding community together. But we can't do it all by ourselves,  that's why we need you!

All of your money will go directly to the development and the go-to-production process, keep in mind that you're not just applying to the pre-order items, you are also helping Sk8trakr be available for everyone. We will use the money to design a production candidate for the case, pay for the production of 1000 testing devices, certificate the pre-production devices among other things.

We have a long way ahead, but we also have the motivation to get it done. With your help we will achieve our funding goal and make Sk8trakr a reality!

Risks and challenges

Since this is a hardware device, we have to coordinate the supply chain of different manufacturers to get all the pieces in time to produce the Trakrs. 

This generates many points of failure that we have to sort in order to successfully produce the Trakrs. Although we've worked with many of these providers and have experience designing electronic devices, delays and problems may arise.

Regarding software the challenge is to develop a very effective classification algorithm.  But this is just a matter of time and a good data set. We have already worked with machine learning algorithms, so we know what we are dealing with.

That being said, we are confident that we can overcome all those risks and we are deeply motivated by the challenge that developing this project represents.

story:
Press

Rock, Paper, Shotgun | Destructoid | PlayStation Lifestyle

Links

Website | Facebook | Twitter

Once a decade, the greatest huntsmen in the universe gather to compete in a legendary tournament known as the Blacksea Odyssey. Armed with only a spear and a harpoon, hunters must battle against creatures of colossal size and unimaginable terror. Using wit and skill, the huntsmen must identify the weaknesses of their foes in order to exploit them or die trying. Steeped in blood, ancient treasures, runic technologies, and a madness that wills them to enter deeper into the black abyss, these huntsman compete for a chance to claim the ultimate glory of facing a creature of such magnanimous size and insatiable ferocity that its wingspan has been said to stretch across galaxies while it’s breath consumes black holes; the Titan of the Stars! But does such a great huntsman exist….

The four great huntsman traverse through a crowd of cheering fans as they head to the space-docks to embark on their journey.

Blacksea Odyssey is a 2D top-down shoot ’em up with RPG and rogue-like elements. It carries with it a blend between old school arcade shooters, newer RPGs, rogue-likes, and a modernized design with a heavy emphasis on replayability.

A vast sort of cumulative imagination has inspired us to create a dark and beautiful experience with lush otherworldly spacescapes, dangerous behemoths to rend, and a twitch-based stream of rapturous delight. With Blacksea Odyssey we wanted to create something truly original. While inspired by many of our favorite games, we believe our vision of Blacksea Odyssey separates itself from games of similar genres while still staying true to it’s core; a fast-paced space shooter. Imagine if you will Shadow of the Colossus’s massively scaled bosses, Geometry Wars extremely crisp and fluid control scheme, Path of Exile's deep RPG-like rune system, and Binding of Isaac's insane replayability. While many games have influenced the design of Blacksea Odyssey, these games have had the heaviest impact.

  • Eviscerate your opponents with an onslaught of weapon loadouts and item customizations. Discover new weapon and ship runes to demolish your enemies with. Pick from an assortment of huntsmen each with their own unique characteristics to become the next great challenger in the Blacksea Odyssey.
  • Choose from a variety of spacescapes to explore. Each with their own unique set of creatures to hunt, mysteries to discover, and ancient runes to unearth. From character dialogues and the environment to enemy spawns and loot drops, everything in the game is procedurally generated and is affected by your choices. Travel deeper into the abyss at your own peril; the Blacksea is not for the feint of heart.
  • Prepare yourself for a steep difficulty curve. While picking up the game is fluid and easy in it’s earlier stages, the later parts require a mastery of mechanics both inside and out. Enemies become ferocious and unyielding, and bosses continue to adapt and grow until eventually becoming seemingly insurmountable. Intelligent strategy and fast reflexes will be required to overcome these colossal creatures.

 CORE MECHANICS

Spear - The spear serves as your primary weapon and damage dealer. Four rune slots are engraved into every spear’s hilt. There, depending on the runes you have discovered, you can modify your spear to behave drastically different. Would you like to be an aggressive damage dealer with an emphasis on short quick bursts of fire? Or a sniper with magical enchantments focused on utility and long range combat?

Harpoon - The harpoon is your secondary weapon and prime source of utility. Use it to eviscerate enemy creatures by ripping them apart piece by piece as you damage parts of it’s body. Also use it to latch onto enemies as they give you a ride all the while you slow them down with your harpoon. The longer you charge your harpoon, the more damage it deals and the faster it travels.

Evasive Maneuvering - A rechargeable high-octane thruster offers extreme mobility. Depending on how the thruster is used it can behave differently, if timed correctly the thrusters offer a short, medium, or long boost great for out-maneuvering enemies in combat or evading them all together. The thrusters can be enhanced by various ship runes scattered throughout the galaxy. Your thrusters are pivotal to the game's core gameplay. While the spear is undoubtedly your sword, think of the thrusters as your shield.

Consumables - You’ll come across a large variety of advanced weaponry, runic enchantments, and ancient items throughout your travels; hi-powered bombs, sentry guns, berserker potions, force fields and Thor’s Wrath - a fury of lightning bolts - just to name a few.

Runes - In the deepest parts of the galaxy, mythical enchantments from a time of ages past can be discovered scattered throughout the Blacksea. Huntsman use these enchantments to modify their weapons and ship. Mix and match various rune combinations to create the ultimate weapon. We currently have over 40 runes in the game and plan on having over 100. We expect a total of over a million different rune combinations to be possible by the game's completion.

Character Reveals

Each character has their own unique personality, dialogue, backstory, as well as spear and ship stats.

Enemy Reveals

Check out some enemies from our various biomes.

Boss Reveals

The game is midway through production in an early alpha phase. We’ve completed all of the game’s framework as well as all of the game's core mechanics. We’ve finished many of the items that we want in the game as well as several biomes, bosses, and enemies. We've also had a decent amount of public play-testing and so far, we've gotten tons of positive feedback and excitement for the game!

The biggest task remaining is content generation; we have many enemies, items, bosses, biomes, and sound effects that still need to be designed, developed and implemented.

We believe the game’s alpha demo is in a fairly polished state and we feel that it accurately represents our vision for the game. So give it a try!

Access to the Game

We plan to release on WIN/MAC/LINUX (DRM-Free and Steam). We also plan to pursue the consoles PS4/Xbox One.

Team Blacksea Odyssey at OrlandoiX. Left to right: Percy Legendre IV, Sean Wellington Pinnock, and Peter Milko.

Percy Legendre IV

Producer

While Percy’s title is producer, the truth is he is the jack of all trades on the team. Whenever a gap needs to be filled, Percy is there to fill it. Whether it’s art, programming, or business. Percy has been there to help the team through it all. In the past, Percy worked on numerous projects as a producer and lead developer.

Sean Wellington Pinnock 

Lead Programmer

Sean does most of the gameplay coding including physics, artificial intelligence, save/load data, etc. Sean has developed loads of cool 2D and 3D games in his free time. From mobile, to PC, to VR ports, Sean has done it all.

Peter Milko - petermilko.com

Lead Artist/Animator

Peter is the creative visionary on the team, bringing all of his creative energy to life through his artistic impression in the game. He’s been itching at the opportunity to put his artistic talent to the test and now he has one. Peter also owns and manages the clothing line PanicPOP for which he designs and creates art.

Eric Hamel - erichamel.net

Sound Designer  

Eric is the supremely talented sound designer who has created all of the wonderful sound effects for our game up to date. Eric formerly worked for EA as a SFX artist and is now chasing the indie dream. He is also co-founder of the Boston-based indie game studio Worthing & Moncrieff.

Earl Divinagracia - soundcloud.com

Musician

Earl is the hidden gem on our team whom has been composing all of the wonderful music in our game up to date. We we’re fortunate enough to work on past projects with him and he never ceases to surprise us and surpass our expectations with his talent!

The Game 

All copies of the game will be sent out upon release. Windows, Linux, and Mac version will release first; expect them in Spring 2016. Consoles will release soon after. All PC copies will include either a DRM-free version of the game or Steam key. Everyone in the $10 tier will get a PC version of game upon release. $15 and above will give you the option to choose a Xbox One or PlayStation 4 version of the game.

Art Book

This illustrious beauty will contain all of the sprites, illustrations, and concepts, as well as specific details of the characters and galaxy. It will also reveal in finer detail some of the specific concepts behind design ideas as well as the realm in which these huntsman reside. Expect a lot of never revealed designs in here, as well as enemies, levels, and other biomes that never made it into the game. All for you to meander with in a fabulous display.

Boss Battle Instruction Booklet

 Remember the glory days of gaming when an instruction booklet meant something more meaningful? Well we want to bring it back with this epic boss battle instruction booklet. We promise it will be sent out before anyone has figured out the secrets to defeating these monstrosities. And now with this tool in hand you’ll be one of the first!

Old Man Pirate Skin

Receive a Kickstarter-only alternative skin for the main playable character to plunder the seven Blackseas with! Arrrrrrrr! Comes equipped with an anchor for a harpoon, gold teeth, a pirate themed space ship, and a pet parrot that follows the Old Man around.

Original Soundtrack  

The wonderfully talented Earl Divinagracia will be composing over 20 tracks for the game. Experience the fast-paced, fun filled adventure of Blacksea Odyssey from wherever you might travel. Warning: hunting in public is not advised!

Limited Edition Poster  

An 18x24 legendary quality print of a huntsman doing battle in the Blacksea against a ferocious monster will be yours to do with as you please. Each one will be hand signed by our team members and numbered.

Design a species of Asterfish (enemy)

Ever want to bring your craziest fantasies to life? More specifically, your Blacksea fantasies? Maybe you wanted to blend a horse, with a shark, and a rocket launcher? Well now you can! And we’re perfectly okay with that combination too! Work with us to design the look, behavior, and name of three similar enemy creatures and we’ll give them a home in the Blacksea universe!

Design an Elderfish (boss)

Put your design skills to the test as we work with you to design your very own Elderfish boss that will be in the game. We'll help you bring your vision to life no matter how crazy it is, the more creative the more interested we are in it. Together we'll design how it appears visually, it’s behavior patterns, and how the player can kill it.

Design a Kingfish (super boss)

Have you ever dreamed of pummeling players to death with your borderline cruel or over the top design ideas? Ever imagine making an enemy that was ten times larger than the screenand shot fifteen laser beams at the same time, all the while being protected by a nearly impenetrable carapace? Well now we can help you bring your vision to life. Together we'll create one of the most epic and challenging experiences in gaming history. Whether it’s a massive crab with flaming claws or a unicorn with rainbows for hoofs, if you design it we’ll build it.

Huntsmen T-Shirt

Our lead artist Peter Milko will be making a design for a t-shirt once the Kickstarter is over. We'll create a poll with a few design ideas (feel free to add some of your own in the comments below) and work together to create the most strapping T-Shirt the Blacksea has ever seen. The shirt will be available in small, medium, large or extra large. It will also be available for purchase sometime after the Kickstarter as well.
story_txt:
Press

Rock, Paper, Shotgun | Destructoid | PlayStation Lifestyle
Links
Website | Facebook | Twitter

Prepare yourself for a steep difficulty curve. While picking up the game is fluid and easy in it’s earlier stages, the later parts require a mastery of mechanics both inside and out. Enemies become ferocious and unyielding, and bosses continue to adapt and grow until eventually becoming seemingly insurmountable. Intelligent strategy and fast reflexes will be required to overcome these colossal creatures.




 CORE MECHANICS


Spear - The spear serves as your primary weapon and damage dealer. Four rune slots are engraved into every spear’s hilt. There, depending on the runes you have discovered, you can modify your spear to behave drastically different. Would you like to be an aggressive damage dealer with an emphasis on short quick bursts of fire? Or a sniper with magical enchantments focused on utility and long range combat?


Harpoon - The harpoon is your secondary weapon and prime source of utility. Use it to eviscerate enemy creatures by ripping them apart piece by piece as you damage parts of it’s body. Also use it to latch onto enemies as they give you a ride all the while you slow them down with your harpoon. The longer you charge your harpoon, the more damage it deals and the faster it travels.


Evasive Maneuvering - A rechargeable high-octane thruster offers extreme mobility. Depending on how the thruster is used it can behave differently, if timed correctly the thrusters offer a short, medium, or long boost great for out-maneuvering enemies in combat or evading them all together. The thrusters can be enhanced by various ship runes scattered throughout the galaxy. Your thrusters are pivotal to the game's core gameplay. While the spear is undoubtedly your sword, think of the thrusters as your shield.


Consumables - You’ll come across a large variety of advanced weaponry, runic enchantments, and ancient items throughout your travels; hi-powered bombs, sentry guns, berserker potions, force fields and Thor’s Wrath - a fury of lightning bolts - just to name a few.


Runes - In the deepest parts of the galaxy, mythical enchantments from a time of ages past can be discovered scattered throughout the Blacksea. Huntsman use these enchantments to modify their weapons and ship. Mix and match various rune combinations to create the ultimate weapon. We currently have over 40 runes in the game and plan on having over 100. We expect a total of over a million different rune combinations to be possible by the game's completion.




Character Reveals
Each character has their own unique personality, dialogue, backstory, as well as spear and ship stats.


Enemy Reveals
Check out some enemies from our various biomes.






Boss Reveals









The game is midway through production in an early alpha phase. We’ve completed all of the game’s framework as well as all of the game's core mechanics. We’ve finished many of the items that we want in the game as well as several biomes, bosses, and enemies. We've also had a decent amount of public play-testing and so far, we've gotten tons of positive feedback and excitement for the game!


The biggest task remaining is content generation; we have many enemies, items, bosses, biomes, and sound effects that still need to be designed, developed and implemented.
We believe the game’s alpha demo is in a fairly polished state and we feel that it accurately represents our vision for the game. So give it a try!



Access to the Game
We plan to release on WIN/MAC/LINUX (DRM-Free and Steam). We also plan to pursue the consoles PS4/Xbox One.




















Team Blacksea Odyssey at OrlandoiX. Left to right: Percy Legendre IV, Sean Wellington Pinnock, and Peter Milko.
Percy Legendre IV


Producer
While Percy’s title is producer, the truth is he is the jack of all trades on the team. Whenever a gap needs to be filled, Percy is there to fill it. Whether it’s art, programming, or business. Percy has been there to help the team through it all. In the past, Percy worked on numerous projects as a producer and lead developer.
Sean Wellington Pinnock 


Lead Programmer
Sean does most of the gameplay coding including physics, artificial intelligence, save/load data, etc. Sean has developed loads of cool 2D and 3D games in his free time. From mobile, to PC, to VR ports, Sean has done it all.

Peter Milko - petermilko.com



Lead Artist/Animator
Peter is the creative visionary on the team, bringing all of his creative energy to life through his artistic impression in the game. He’s been itching at the opportunity to put his artistic talent to the test and now he has one. Peter also owns and manages the clothing line PanicPOP for which he designs and creates art.

Eric Hamel - erichamel.net



Sound Designer  
Eric is the supremely talented sound designer who has created all of the wonderful sound effects for our game up to date. Eric formerly worked for EA as a SFX artist and is now chasing the indie dream. He is also co-founder of the Boston-based indie game studio Worthing & Moncrieff.
Earl Divinagracia - soundcloud.com



Musician
Earl is the hidden gem on our team whom has been composing all of the wonderful music in our game up to date. We we’re fortunate enough to work on past projects with him and he never ceases to surprise us and surpass our expectations with his talent!


The Game 


All copies of the game will be sent out upon release. Windows, Linux, and Mac version will release first; expect them in Spring 2016. Consoles will release soon after. All PC copies will include either a DRM-free version of the game or Steam key. Everyone in the $10 tier will get a PC version of game upon release. $15 and above will give you the option to choose a Xbox One or PlayStation 4 version of the game.
Art Book


This illustrious beauty will contain all of the sprites, illustrations, and concepts, as well as specific details of the characters and galaxy. It will also reveal in finer detail some of the specific concepts behind design ideas as well as the realm in which these huntsman reside. Expect a lot of never revealed designs in here, as well as enemies, levels, and other biomes that never made it into the game. All for you to meander with in a fabulous display.
Boss Battle Instruction Booklet


 Remember the glory days of gaming when an instruction booklet meant something more meaningful? Well we want to bring it back with this epic boss battle instruction booklet. We promise it will be sent out before anyone has figured out the secrets to defeating these monstrosities. And now with this tool in hand you’ll be one of the first!
Old Man Pirate Skin


Receive a Kickstarter-only alternative skin for the main playable character to plunder the seven Blackseas with! Arrrrrrrr! Comes equipped with an anchor for a harpoon, gold teeth, a pirate themed space ship, and a pet parrot that follows the Old Man around.
Original Soundtrack  


The wonderfully talented Earl Divinagracia will be composing over 20 tracks for the game. Experience the fast-paced, fun filled adventure of Blacksea Odyssey from wherever you might travel. Warning: hunting in public is not advised!
Limited Edition Poster  


An 18x24 legendary quality print of a huntsman doing battle in the Blacksea against a ferocious monster will be yours to do with as you please. Each one will be hand signed by our team members and numbered.
Design a species of Asterfish (enemy)


Ever want to bring your craziest fantasies to life? More specifically, your Blacksea fantasies? Maybe you wanted to blend a horse, with a shark, and a rocket launcher? Well now you can! And we’re perfectly okay with that combination too! Work with us to design the look, behavior, and name of three similar enemy creatures and we’ll give them a home in the Blacksea universe!
Design an Elderfish (boss)


Put your design skills to the test as we work with you to design your very own Elderfish boss that will be in the game. We'll help you bring your vision to life no matter how crazy it is, the more creative the more interested we are in it. Together we'll design how it appears visually, it’s behavior patterns, and how the player can kill it.
Design a Kingfish (super boss)


Have you ever dreamed of pummeling players to death with your borderline cruel or over the top design ideas? Ever imagine making an enemy that was ten times larger than the screenand shot fifteen laser beams at the same time, all the while being protected by a nearly impenetrable carapace? Well now we can help you bring your vision to life. Together we'll create one of the most epic and challenging experiences in gaming history. Whether it’s a massive crab with flaming claws or a unicorn with rainbows for hoofs, if you design it we’ll build it.

Huntsmen T-Shirt


Our lead artist Peter Milko will be making a design for a t-shirt once the Kickstarter is over. We'll create a poll with a few design ideas (feel free to add some of your own in the comments below) and work together to create the most strapping T-Shirt the Blacksea has ever seen. The shirt will be available in small, medium, large or extra large. It will also be available for purchase sometime after the Kickstarter as well.

story:
Short Summary

It's an MMORPG game I will release it 30 August. Game development is completed but needs a Unity3D license to publish, because the game using Unity3D Pro features.

I'm Eren Aydın, I'm Forest Engineer but I like to make games so working on game development sector for 3 years. Currently placed in Metutech-ATOM in Ankara/Turkey. Developing Sehrin Ordusu.

I made this game alone. Programmed all and bough the models and sounds.
Working on it about 4 months and everyday with hard work.
Now I'm at the end.

I searched for a Unity3D license but everyone told me the same thing (can't use our license key more than two computers) Then I checked it, and I saw it's true.

So I need money to get a Unity3D Pro license. I'm also looking for job now. But my target is releasing the game before September. Our players will consist of the majority of the students I guess, so I must open it before the schools opened :)

The game is in only Turkish but If I get the license from here by you, I will release it with two languages in 30 August.

Some features

PvP:
Just for fun. Available only on some maps.

Polymorph (transforming to a monster)
Other monsters won't attack you, will see you as a friend.

A big world to explore, searching treasure chests on the map, mining, blacksmith, tailoring, animal taming, horse riding, war on the horse.

I mean it's a classic MMORPG but one-man-made.

Check out other gameplay videos from my youtube channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/bshgame

And the site:
http://www.sehrinordusu.com

-----------------------------------------------------------

I desire you donate or share this game all we can enjoy.

Regards,
Eren Aydın
