story:
GAME BLOX is the next generation of video game controller which allows you to use 1 controller for 4 consoles and play your own music!

Game Blox is the new hybrid controller which allows you to play on up to 4 consoles using the same controller; you can use it on up to all of the following: Playstation 4 Console; the Xbox One Console; Xbox 360 Console and the Playstation 3 Console. Another amazing feature of Game Blox is that you can listen to music while you game with built in speakers.

 With all the technological advancements within the industry, shouldn't the costs be going down? We can make Gaming cheaper! 



This unique hybrid controller allows you to swap the central pod so that you can use one controller on an Xbox One; Playstation 4; Xbox 360 and Playstation 3. This will save money and space! This is a controller designed by gamers for gamers!


Please take a look at the gallery for the whole section of pictures for Game Blox!


The Unique controller speakers:


The unique in-controller speakers allow you to instantly stream music to your games controller from a Bluetooth (TM) enabled device, allowing you to now enjoy music while you play your favourite games!  

How does it work?


The industry changing "Central Hub" feature of the new Game Blox controller works by having the components for the games controller of each type of console, this therefore allows you, the gamer to swap and change the central pod of the controller as often as you like meaning you can play on up to four different consoles without having to buy and store 4 different controllers. The battery at the back of the controller is rechargeable and therefore you won't need to change the batteries! The best thing about Game Blox is that as more games consoles come out, we can produce more central hubs for those new consoles so that you can continue enjoying both old and new consoles! You will also be able to attach a keyboard as usual to the controller! So far we have the final prototype made, this enables us to speak to manufacturers straight after the project is funded and the pledges are received. 


Perks:


 At the end of the funding period all of our backers will receive a form confirming that we have the right reward for you. You will need to tell us where you want your reward to be shipped. If you have purchased a controller which you may choose the colour of, you will also need to fill this in on the form sent to you via email at the end of the funding period. Once we receive these forms we will reply with your unique Game Blox Fan Club Membership details. Finally be ready to receive your perks!


Below is a short summary within a table of all the perks offered by us!



Four colour options are already set and match a personality of gamer: Arctic White; Cherry Red, Deep Blue and the standard Jet Black. If you back any of the colour options, we'll email you a form after the project closes so you can choose which colour option you would like for every controller you purchase:


Jet Black:


The smart Jet Black controller is our standard colour and the colour for the first backers of the "early bird" option.  The Jet Black controller is for the conventional gamer:



Ice White:


The sharp Ice White controller is for the chilled out gamer:



 Cherry Red:


The Cherry Red controller is for the bold and daring gamer who is prepared to take risks:




Deep Blue:


The Deep Blue controller is for the calm and laid back gamer:



Limited Edition Controllers:


We offer a range of Limited Edition controllers such as:


Gold Coloured Controller:


There are 1000 Limited Gold Coloured controllers which come with a signed letter of authenticity showing the product number (between 1 and 1,000 in which it was produced.) Gold is for the gamer who stands out:



Colour Choice:


There are 100 Limited, very special gifts; in which you will receive: 1 personalised Game Blox controller with any colour of controller shell you want in a choice of 142 shell colours as listed below! You will also receive 2 central hubs for both an Xbox one Console and a Playstation 4 console. This is for the unique gamer.

The Ultimate Controller:


There are 100 Limited Edition controllers which are very special which has the outer casing, buttons, D - pad and sticks made from aluminium. Your controller will have both an Xbox One transmitter and Playstation 4 transmitter with a built in speaker. Your limited edition controller will come with a signed letter of authenticity with a product number as well. The Ultimate controller is for the Ultimate gamer. (Note: On the final reward  you can get your Ultimate controller engraved!) 


The Prototype:


The Game Blox Controller you see images below are only preliminary prototypes. Therefore, the final version with different textures and finishes will look different because the colour scheme is that of a colour choice controller rather than a standard coloured controller. 


Each controller will have these approximate measurements;

Length (longest side, handle to handle): 15cm

Width: 11cm

Height: 5cm


Game Blox fan club:


With every pledge you will receive your unique Game Blox  Fan Club Membership this is where after the funding period is ending we will give you updates on everything that you need to know; for example more accurate expected shipping times and any new Cool stuff which we've achieved during the process of making your rewards!


How we will spend your pledges:


Detailed below is how we are going to spend your pledges:


  • You will see Game Blox appear on TV due to our adverts;
  • We will set up a support line for anyone who needs to speak to us if they experience any issues;
  • We will ship internationally with some of the cheapest rates around;
  • We will save you money on buying new controllers, you can now just buy a new transmitter and swap them at your leisure when a new console comes out;
  • We will have our controllers manufactured and they will be sold and based online;
  • We intend to be number one for customer support, putting our customers first is the key to our business;
  • We will have to have the controller safety tested by the necessary examination bodies;
  • We will then finalise our designs for the PCB (Printed Circuit Board) this will then be placed into the start of the mass production process once we are 100% satisfied that we have made something amazing!

Production Plan:


The Main Game Blox Controllers (Jet Black, Ice White, Cherry Red, Deep Blue, Gold coloured and Colour Choice) will be made of plastic in three sections (Top panel, bottom panel and a panel to join both top and bottom panels together and house such items as the headphone jack.) The analog sticks will be made with a rubber casing in order to allow for a firm grip to stop your fingers from slipping off mid-game.


How designs may differ from the prototype:


  • The design for the Game Blox is certainly not the final design this is only the Mark 1 prototype and we will be making such changes as the plastic we used is called PLA however this will differ when this goes into full scale production. 
  • The labeling on the controller will be physically printed on rather than engraved.
  • We hope to add items like rumble triggers and rubber grips on the back of the controller which may become stretch goals once the project is fully funded.
  • We endeavor to make the triggers softer in order to allow you to play your favourite games seamlessly.

Shipping:


For all perks under and including £170 shipping will be charged at £15 per perk however if you would like to purchase more than on perk we would be happy to arrange this for you and the perks will be shipped as one package, therefore there will only be one shipping cost of £15. Perks costing more than and including £500 pounds shipping will be free! (Individual Custom charges may apply.)


Our Logo:


Our logo for Game Blox is based on a slick chrome background and an arrow in the middle demonstrating our product and how we like you to swap and change your controller to suit you!

Show the world, through your pledges, that you love Game Blox.


Show the world you're ready for the greatest evolution of Video Games Controllers by BACKING GAME BLOX. Enlist others, Like and Share our Facebook page! The more we raise, the more we can achieve and the bigger Game Blox becomes. 


Contact:


If you need to contact Game Blox for anything please use the contact email address which is best suited to what you need to ask us below:


General Enquiries:  


gameblox.enquiries@gmail.com


Press:


gameblox.press@gmail.com


Perks:


gameblox.rewards@gmail.com


Risks and challenges


Some of the challenges we could face while creating our controllers are those of any project; getting locations for manufacture, shipping delays etc. We have plans for any hurdles that may appear and in turn we aim to counteract any problems with efficiency and ease due to our partners with expertise from former businesses.

At Game Blox we ensure that we are 100% behind our project and you as the backers are always our first priority from start to finish of the process.

story:
It all began when we sat down to play on our usual game night. The game was great but having played it so many times got us kind of bored. How many times could we play the same game without anything to refresh the gameplay and keep things interesting?

So out of curiosity we built a simple, yet awesome system that spiced up our old games.We then discovered that the old games that we were so used to can really become more awesome with many more options, surprises and tactics!

We tried the new method on another game and another and another…. And discovered that to every game that we added the new addition to actually becomes a new game with different game play and new tactics in an awesome way.

After testing this game add-on for quite some time and after much effort we are now ready to share it with the world.

We are proud to present to you the game add-on that can be added to any game in the world and make it more awesome – Meta Awesome Cards

Meta Awesome Cards is a game add-on that can be added to any existing game and add new options to your games. Meta Awesome Cards includes various new rule cards and many activities that can be integrated into your favorite games.

The rules are so simple! Pick up a Meta Awesome card before your “real” turn and follow the instructions. Some cards will give you “Awesome Points” which you can later use in order to activate “Really Awesome Cards” that have a stronger affect on the game play and will completely turn things around.

Now you are a Meta Awesome Cards expert!

Each deck comes with 100 cards.

There are three different types of cards in this game. Each type has a unique design their back. The Instant Action Cards, Delayed Action Cards and Really Awesome Cards. 

Instant Action Cards:

Instant Action Cards are cards that are instantly activated once they are picked up.

For example:

Delayed Action Cards:

The Delayed Action Cards are marked by an eye design on the cards back. These cards are meant for your eyes only and will be revealed to the other players only when activated. After activation follow the instructions on the card and reveal only what is says to the other players.

For example: 

Really Awesome Cards:

The third kind of cards  (marked by a colorful games design on the cards back) are Really Awesome Cards. You can use the Awesome Points you collected from the other two kinds of cards to activate them and create an advantage in the game you're playing.

For example:

 

Meta Awesome Cards also includes a few more types of cards that are bound to make your games even more exciting!

We need $15,000 to print our first batch of Meta Awesome Cards and in order to cover our expenses for packaging and storage. 

Any funding beyond the initial goal will help us add more cards that will be sent to all our Funders.

How?  With great expansion packs!  If we get to the Second Goal of $19,000 we will add the expansion pack of 20 cards, which are specifically made for card oriented games, to all the decks (yes, even for the Funders who helped us get the first amount).  If we get to the Third Goal of $23,000 we will add a pack of 20 cards which are specifically made for board games. Any additional funds will help us spread the game throughout the world and give everyone the opportunity to play their old games again in a more awesome way!

We have completed the design, packaging, and development and have distributors lined up.  All we need is your help.

Spread the word!

How? Easy! Share this project with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and anywhere you'd like.

Thank you all, and let the games... BEGIN!

 

Other than our ultimate gratitude for your help, we are offering various gifts to our Funders. These include more game add-ons, t-shirts and even specialized cards. We've got some awesome stuff for you!

Just take a look at the side bar to see all the awesome rewards we have for you.

Thank you for helping us! You are truly Awesome!!
story_txt:
It all began when we sat down to play on our usual game night. The game was great but having played it so many times got us kind of bored. How many times could we play the same game without anything to refresh the gameplay and keep things interesting?
So out of curiosity we built a simple, yet awesome system that spiced up our old games.We then discovered that the old games that we were so used to can really become more awesome with many more options, surprises and tactics!

We tried the new method on another game and another and another…. And discovered that to every game that we added the new addition to actually becomes a new game with different game play and new tactics in an awesome way.
After testing this game add-on for quite some time and after much effort we are now ready to share it with the world.
We are proud to present to you the game add-on that can be added to any game in the world and make it more awesome – Meta Awesome Cards


Meta Awesome Cards is a game add-on that can be added to any existing game and add new options to your games. Meta Awesome Cards includes various new rule cards and many activities that can be integrated into your favorite games.
The rules are so simple! Pick up a Meta Awesome card before your “real” turn and follow the instructions. Some cards will give you “Awesome Points” which you can later use in order to activate “Really Awesome Cards” that have a stronger affect on the game play and will completely turn things around.
Now you are a Meta Awesome Cards expert!

Each deck comes with 100 cards.

There are three different types of cards in this game. Each type has a unique design their back. The Instant Action Cards, Delayed Action Cards and Really Awesome Cards. 
Instant Action Cards:
Instant Action Cards are cards that are instantly activated once they are picked up.
For example:

Delayed Action Cards:
The Delayed Action Cards are marked by an eye design on the cards back. These cards are meant for your eyes only and will be revealed to the other players only when activated. After activation follow the instructions on the card and reveal only what is says to the other players.
For example: 

Really Awesome Cards:
The third kind of cards  (marked by a colorful games design on the cards back) are Really Awesome Cards. You can use the Awesome Points you collected from the other two kinds of cards to activate them and create an advantage in the game you're playing.
For example:

 
Meta Awesome Cards also includes a few more types of cards that are bound to make your games even more exciting!

We need $15,000 to print our first batch of Meta Awesome Cards and in order to cover our expenses for packaging and storage. 
Any funding beyond the initial goal will help us add more cards that will be sent to all our Funders.
How?  With great expansion packs!  If we get to the Second Goal of $19,000 we will add the expansion pack of 20 cards, which are specifically made for card oriented games, to all the decks (yes, even for the Funders who helped us get the first amount).  If we get to the Third Goal of $23,000 we will add a pack of 20 cards which are specifically made for board games. Any additional funds will help us spread the game throughout the world and give everyone the opportunity to play their old games again in a more awesome way!
We have completed the design, packaging, and development and have distributors lined up.  All we need is your help.
Spread the word! 
How? Easy! Share this project with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and anywhere you'd like. 
Thank you all, and let the games... BEGIN!
 
Other than our ultimate gratitude for your help, we are offering various gifts to our Funders. These include more game add-ons, t-shirts and even specialized cards. We've got some awesome stuff for you!
Just take a look at the side bar to see all the awesome rewards we have for you.
Thank you for helping us! You are truly Awesome!!

story:
Hello! Thanks for checking out our project.

Have you ever had the feeling that your gaming dice look a little bit like candy?
The dice booths at every convention look just like an M&M's store! Well, as we're both gamers and candy-makers, we want to make this dream reality. We've had some experience making candy, and now we want to combine our love for games and dice with our love of chocolate. So, we talked to Q WORKSHOP about using some of their beautiful designs and now, here we are: announcing the FIRST EVER CANDY ORNAMENTED RPG DICE!

 

 

The main goal of this project is to make a whole range of edible dice. We're starting with three unusual flavors:

- dark chocolate with a touch of almond and marzipan,

- delicate milk chocolate

- creamy white chocolate with a touch of lemon

Each flavor is available in three Q WORKSHOP designs: Elvish, Steampunk
and Tech dice.

The dice are hand-made and meticulously finished. We’ve tasted many possibilities and chosen three best for you!

Each dice set contains 1xD4, 1xD6, 1xD8, 1xD10, 1xD12, 1xD20 and 1xD%.

Dice sizes: D4 – X18 mm | Y16,5 mm; D6 – X 16 mm; D8 – X 17 mm | Y23 mm;
D10 – X21,3 mm | Y21 mm; D12 – X21,2 mm | Y17,8 mm;
D20 – X19 mm | Y22,5 mm | Z11,5 mm

Below, you can see every combination of design and flavor which you can choose within your perk.

 

 

 

We've also prepared one more special treat for you.
"My Precious" - giant, translucent candy in form of a diamond, painted with gold, edible paint and with your own custom engraving. There are only ten of them available so don't miss your chance!

 

 

This isn't all! Keep checking the perks section - we'll be unlocking some new possibilities.

Also, if we surpass our initial goal, we’ll be able to go crazy with new flavors and materials - we're looking forward to do it with you guys!

This is what we want to do! Please please help us make it happen :)

 

 

 

 

The dice will be shipped from Poland. We know that the packaging for such a fragile product is extremely important, so we're paying utmost attention to it!

The chocolate dice will be packed in a sturdy box equipped with effective insulation and packed with cold packs to keep them in the best temperature.

Please, bear in mind that the necessity of securing the packages influences the shipping costs. We wish they could be lower but preventing our precious chocolates from damages is most important.

 

 

Oh, there are so many possible uses! Here's some that we've thought of:

- you can use them as normal dice during the game: if they roll well, you can eat them out of joy, and if they don't, you can eat them as revenge! Just make sure
no one else touches them ;)

- you can use them as practical joke - in so many ways possible!

- they will make a wonderful gift for your fellow gamer, girlfriend/boyfriend, or your Grandma who has always wanted to know what that "gaming" hobby of yours
is all about,

- and, last but not least, for your own guilty pleasure!

 

 

 

Review the list of perks on the right-side of the campaign page. When you see
a particular perk that you're interested in, click on it. This will have selected
the perk for you to continue with the contribution check out process. 

Please note that if you select the "Back It" button, but don't add a perk
to the transaction, you will only be donating funds in the amount you enter.
If you intend to claim a perk, please be sure you choose the perk to go along
with the transaction, before you complete your payment. 

If you like, you can choose more than one perk and make few separate contributions.

After the campaign is over, we will send you the survey and ask you to specify
which flavor and which design you’d like to get.

 

 

 

We are a small Polish company from Poznań. A couple of years ago we started making healthy sweets - the project was called Słodka Cytrynka (Polish for "Sweet Lemon"). Our goal was to manufacture exceptional and healthy sweets,
and to make them as technologically advanced as possible. We were able to develop a really broad range of products, always prioritizing the use of natural ingredients, healthy sugars and unusual flavors. And now we want to do this with you:
- check out Candylize!

Today, Candylize is a group of people passionate about making candy and eager
to use the most advanced production technologies. We are definitely
an “out of the box” thinkers, always looking for fresh ideas and new challenges. We’ve been testing the most innovative candy manufacturing technologies
for years - and we believe that only sky is the limit! This project is very exciting
for us, as this is the first time that we’re trying to make ornamented and precise chocolate RPG dice. We hope that you can join us in this adventure!

Q WORKSHOP, the company that has created the designs on the dice, is one
of the leading world manufacturers of ornamented RPG dice. Its distinctive designs and top-notch quality make them a point of reference when it comes to dice!
Learn more about Q WORKSHOP here.

Well, first we thought just about making edible RPG dice with the best quality.
It seemed a logical step, especially after Q WORKSHOP had let us use their designs. And then, after we've looked closer at the crowdfunding possibilities, we realized that this is a great way to spread the word to more people! :)

The money we want to gather thanks to the campaign will help us get better machines and maybe hire some extra people. More precisely, we want to buy some more advanced machines to make our sweet dice even more extraordinary.
Also, if all goes well, we could buy a sorting machine for our candy - and be able to realize more orders more quickly. Isn't that exciting?

 

 

 

 

Our production facility is small, but it is fully compatible with all the health norms. Please mind however that the candy might contain some allergens like soja or nuts. If you are allergic to these ingredients, please do not order the dice for yourself. Here’s the full list of ingredients:

 

 

So, we think there's nothing left to add except... Let's Candylize our game! :D

story:
A short description of the game

The Imhotep Labyrinth is a game specially developed for the blind but at the same time can be played with persons who have normal vision; thereby providing a level of interaction between the two groups in a strategic game, that would not normally be possible.

4 Blind people are able to play this game – but so can 4 people with normal vision; and naturally a mixed group can also play the game together as well.

There is only one version of this game and it is suitable to be played by everyone – including the blind.

The game can be played in varying stages of difficulty by varied age groups – from a small child of Kindergarten age to the experienced strategic player who is also interested in chess or rummy/cooncan.

Photoshop-drawing of the board with 64 game stones, 4 pawns, the die and 36 cards.

The Creator

The Imhotep Labyrinth was created by Johannes W. Schröder, who over the years had created a number of different board games. The idea for this game originated from when Johannes was working for an organisation dealing with the transportation of handicapped people in Hamburg, Germany. One of the patients, a young blind woman said that the games he had created so far were not challenging enough for her. Johannes rose to the challenge posed, which eventually led to the creation and development of The Imhotep Labyrinth. We hope that this incident will now be beneficial to all blind and vision-impaired people all over the world.

Why was the game developed?

Today, virtually all board games are developed for people who have normal vision. Games for the blind are normally games that have been developed for people that have vision, but have later been adapted so that blind people may also play them.

The Imhotep Labyrinth is a game that from the outset was developed for the blind but with the aim of also allowing people with normal vision to participate. In effect, the game can be played by everybody. There was no necessity to adapt an already existing game.

The result is an extraordinary game that the WBU (World Blind Union) considers to be very helpful and supportive in their efforts to integrate the blind into normal everyday society. At the same time, we hope that due to the natural interaction that occurs during the course of a game, barriers between the blind and those that can see will be removed; and that attention is drawn to the challenges that the blind have to face every day, due to their lack of vision.

Interview with Arnt Holte, President World Blind Union about the game

Description of the game

The Imhotep Labyrinth is a board game produced in high quality ABS plastic materials. It consists of a playing field with depressions for 64 game stones, 4 game figures (pawns) that are able to stand on the game stones, a specially designed die and 36 playing cards. Furthermore, the rules of the game are printed in Braille as well as normal print.

A short description of how the game is played

The Imhotep Labyrinth is a strategic board game for 2-4 players. It can be played in 3 versions with varying degrees of difficulty. In the easiest version, it takes about 10 minutes to comprehend the rules and the following game lasts approximately 20-30 minutes. Once players have had some practice, then the most difficult version of the game can be played in approximately 45-60 minutes.


The guys behind this project

Johannes W. Schröder, of course is the most valued member of this launch. He has joined up with his long-term business partner Jan Jorgensen for this project as their individual competencies supplement each other very well and it was a natural choice for Johannes to get Jan on board.

They both enjoy helping people who do not generally receive a great deal of attention from the public eye or media outlets. Changing this focus is one of the driving forces behind the work with this launch.

Johannes and Jan build on each other’s strengths. They both have a heart for helping people in need. This is second nature to them, both as individuals and as business partners.

What are the Indiegogo funds to be used for?

If we reach our goal, we will be able to pay for the manufacture of the first edition of the game. We already have our manufacturers lined up and ready to go! Our manufacturers are very experienced and have launched numerous board games prior to this. We just need to raise the funds and say go! This first edition will turn one of our long-loved projects into something that our friends, families, and backers can enjoy.

Here is our budget in real terms

Shipping

We have contacted several shipping companies to get the best quotes. We ship from Europe. The prices are as follows:

Denmark: $ 9.-
Germany: $ 9.-
European Union: $ 14.-
USA: $ 25.-
Canada: $ 25.-
Rest of the World (when in doubt, send request for individual shipping): $ 25.-

Please be aware that for countries outside the EU or USA, import taxes or customs duties may apply depending on your local regulations. Please familiarize yourself with customs handling in your country in order not to be surprised by any customs fees.

Estimated time of shipment from our warehouse is December 2015.

For all game retail store owners

We understand that demand for The Imhotep Labyrinth in game stores will be very high as and when the game first gets into the hands of our backers. If you would like to reserve the right to purchase copies at a special retail rate, please send us a direct message that includes your store website, email, and how many copies you would like us to reserve for you. Several weeks before we ship games to our backers, we will confirm that you still want the games reserved for you, take payment, and ship them to you soon after we have shipped the games to backers.

Risks and challanges

We guarantee the timely completion of this project. We will do everything in our power to ensure on-time delivery, and we will reach out concerning any unforeseen circumstances. Currently our manufacturers are lined up and just waiting for the green light once we are funded. Please never hesitate to contact us directly with comments, concerns, suggestions, or jokes.

story:
Texas Hold'em can be a game of wild swings of passion, with both crushing losing streaks and exuberant runs of winning hands. The key thing that separates the big-money winners from the losers isn't passion, it's precision. Sadly for most of us, precision has always demanded serious mental discipline and rigorous practice beyond the reach of nearly all casual players.

The online poker market is estimated to exceed $5B USD in 2015 and during our research we found that many poker tracking sites estimate that few people play properly. In fact, even based on the most generous estimate for correct play, at least two thirds of all the players are not playing correctly. This lack of precision costs these players money and makes them targets for the professional players who seek to capitalize on their mistakes.

Although luck determines the hand you are dealt, the top players have spent years developing the mental skills needed to calculate the odds of improving that hand. So, as the song says, they know when to hold'em and know when to fold 'em. While such mental prowess is required for live play, online play provides a completely different situation.

Online Texas Hold'em poker is a lot of fun to play and like most card games the odds of winning are pretty good if played correctly. Similarly, it can be a frustrating venture if played "by gut feeling" and a potential money sucking vacuum if played with even one "pro" at the table. Many people who wouldn't dream of setting foot in an live poker room are more than willing to play online in anonymity where your mistakes are hidden and free of embarrassment. The pro players scout the online tables looking for this kind of easy prey and use their knowledge of the game to intimidate players into folding a good hand or to goad them into betting on a hand where there's no reasonable chance of winning. 

We don't think that the game deserves to be dominated by a bunch of elitist players with computer-like math skills and so we're developing an alternative to level the playing field.

There are a number of websites out that that offer Texas Hold'em poker odds and we've look at lots and lots of them. As we see it there are two main problems with using these sites.

First, nearly all these sites are setup to deliver the theoretical odds and not the practical odds. These web calculators are simply not comprehensive enough to include all of the variables that occur during actual play that are critical to making the right decisions.

To calculate the practical odds, one must perform multiple calculations to determine the real odds of improving a hand based on the actual table conditions. Plus, these calculations need to be done four different times during every hand. Then, on every call/raise/fold choice another set of odds calculations called pot odds is needed to determine the correct betting strategy. Trying to perform all those different calculations during a live game, each of which can have multiple sets of odds, is just not practical using websites.

To make practical use of odds information during online play both the data entry and the many, many calculations need to be completed in mere seconds. Most web calculators only work out one problem at a time, requiring multiple uses to get a more complete set of odds. This leads to the second major problem of using websites to try and do these calculations ... speed.

Online poker games give a player very limited time to act before a player's hand is automatically forfeited. While a live poker game might do only 30-60 hands per hour, online sites push for 100-120 hands per hour or higher. This is because the site makes money from every hand played -- so faster play equals more money for them. Since they make their money regardless of who wins, the site operators have no real interest in helping people play correctly but a vested interest in making people play quickly.

To solve the two key problems above, getting the correct odds and getting them quickly enough to have time to act on the information, we need to build a very special smartphone application.

The overall project goal is to develop an application for a wide range of smartphone platforms including nearly all iPhone, iPad, and Android phone and tablet implementations, with the potential to include Windows Phone in future. That means acquiring a fairly extensive range of equipment for development and QA plus a major number crunching server that chews on the data and spits out what we need. To keep initial costs under control we've decided that the first development should focus on Apple IOS, allowing us to trim a substantial amount off the starting budget requirements.

A project of this complexity should have a $150k-180k price tag, and at the normal rates for six months of development the wage costs alone should easily exceed the entire project goal amount that we've set. However, we bribed our team with liberal promises of pizza and diet-cola to get the wage cost down to less than a quarter of what it should be. 

In truth, there would be no wages in this project at all if any of us could have actually afforded to work just for pizza, that's how much we believe in this product. Sadly, we can't pay rent and mortgages with pepperoni and the development demands on this project are so high that the team is going to have to forego any side-jobs, so we need to pay for the dev time.That project staff took a large voluntary wage cut is a huge help and demonstrates just how strongly the staff believes in the success of this project. 

In general, development hardware represents the largest portion of the budget, representing over a third of total expenses. Development wages and expenses, which includes the development software licenses and subscriptions, are the next highest budget item. Legal fees rounds out the top three expense categories. The overall breakdown for the complete core development project is summarized in the pie chart below.

We're really hoping that after the lawyers are done with the "necessities" we will have enough left to make good on the pizza we promised the development team.

To reward contributors we are offering some very special perks at a variety of different levels that should satisfy any budget. We're hoping that the aggressive value we're putting in the perks helps get us all the way to the funding goal.

Many of these perks come with included usage credits, which requires a little explanation. The operating model for the app is to charge one usage credit per hand played; however, since the rate hasn't been decided we want to make sure that our contributors receive full value and have therefore made the usage credits a dollar value and not a set number. The actual usage credits received with the perk will be calculated based on the per-hand charge in effect at product launch. For example, if the rate were a half cent per hand at launch, then you would receive 200 hands of play per dollar of usage credit.

When we go to Phase II the perks will not be as valuable as the ones on this initial launch, so this is your chance to snag a really, really juicy perk. There are also several perks that are limited edition or contain exclusive rewards. These will be offered only during this campaign and will not be available elsewhere when this campaign is finished. Standard shipping, where required, is included to any North American destination; international destinations requiring special shipping or special customs handling might require a small shipping fee, it depends on the perk.

Ace High
$5

 Ever wanted to see your name in lights, well here's your chance! You'll receive recognition on our website and social media pages as a founding supporter of the project, plus you'll receive a free copy of the app with usage credits with a minimum value of $20. That's a 4x return on your contribution -- proof that sometimes in poker even an Ace-high hand can win!

Pair
$10

 Sometimes a pair is all it takes to be a winner, so you'll receive recognition on our website and social media pages as a founding supporter of the project. Additionally, you'll receive a free copy of the app loaded up with usage credits with a minimum value of $50. That's a 5x return on your contribution!

Two Pair
$25

 Two is better than one, so this perk not only includes recognition on our website and social media pages as a founding supporter, but also comes with up to two free copies of the app and a pool of usage credits valued at $250. You can split the pool between the copies any way you want, or you can choose to load all $250 of credits on one copy.

Trips
$100

 Three's not a crowd when it comes to perks. First, you'll receive recognition on our website and social media pages as a founding supporter. Next, you also receive up to three copies of the app with a shared pool of usage credits with a minimum value of $1,200 to divide as you see fit between the copies. Finally, we'll also throw in a set of three custom can coolers to hold your frosty beverage of choice during those long play sessions.

Pictures of the coolers will be posted once the artwork has been completed so you'll be able to see exactly what your getting and we think you'll be more than pleased.

Straight
$250

 Keeping things in order earns you some excellent perks. First, in addition to the standard recognition on our website and social media pages, you will receive premium recognition right in the app. Plus you get up to five copies of the app with a shared pool of usage credits valued at $5,000 to divide as you see fit between the copies. Don't feel like sharing? No problem, load your copies with any mix of credits you see fit from $0 to the full $5000.

You'll also receive our EXCLUSIVE custom Hold'em Master Premium Cotton Ring-Spun Fleece Hoodie (available in sizes Small through 2X) to show off your status as a premium supporter. This special Premium Supporter Hoodie is being produced only for perk rewards on this campaign, so when the perks are gone so are the hoodies. We'll be posting pictures for all to see once the artwork has been completed but rest assured you won't be disappointed.

Flush
$500

 You prefer things to match and we get that. First, in addition to the standard recognition on our website and social media pages, you will receive premium recognition right in the app. You'll match that with up to five free copies of the app with a shared pool of five years of unlimited play usage credits to divide as you see fit between the copies. If you were to play only four hours per week, this usage credit adds up to over $5,000; however, because it's unlimited play the potential value of this perk is staggering.


Unlimited play credit is available EXCLUSIVELY though these perks and will not be offered to the general public at launch. So, if you are a dedicated poker player (or know someone who is) than this is your chance to score $10,000, $50,000, or even $100,000+ in value from one simple contribution.

Full House
$1,000

 A potent hand with a potent perk. Naturally, premium recognition right in the app is included as a starter. Next, three free copies of the app to distribute as you see fit, each copy with unlimited usage credits matched with two bonus copies of the app, each with two years of unlimited usage credits.


If you play for only four hours a week, over the first two years this usage credit is worth at least $2,000. The three copies of the app continue, however, to accumulate value every year for the life of the app. With even minimal play this perk could be worth $10,000 or more in no time at all.

To top things off we'll give you three custom coffee mugs and two custom can coolers (or the other way around, your choice) to handle your hot or cold beverage of choice while you enjoy your unlimited play

The following perks are exclusive, quantity limited rewards. When these perks have sold out they will not be offered again on this or any future Hold'em Master campaign.

Four-of-a-Kind
$5,000
Limited to only FOUR available
Includes multi-year donation to your favourite registered charity

We like to think that great things come in fours.

  • Premier recognition for you, plus a plug for your favourite registered charity included in-app, on our webpage, and on our social media pages.
  • Four app copies to share, or keep some and donate the rest to a charity auction
  • Each copy comes with unlimited usage credit for the life of the app so any copies you donate to charity won't have to worry about hidden costs
  • For the first four years after launch, one fourth of one percent (0.25%) royalty on the net profits per year paid to you, with a matching amount donated to your selected registered charity. 

If you played only four hours per week, the usage credit alone is valued at almost $4,000 in the first four years.

Straight Flush
$10,000
Limited to only FOUR available
Includes ROYALTY PAYMENTS

Getting a straight flush is all about being in-the-money, so you receive a royalty of 5% of the operating profits for the lifetime of the app to a maximum of $100,000. We'll also throw in all of the non-monetary benefits included on any lower perk.

The application benefits and the royalty payment in this perk results in at least a ten-fold return on investment (1000%).

Royal Flush
$25,000
Exclusive only ONE available
Includes ROYALTY PAYMENTS

Hitting the Royal Flush means a big payout and when it comes to perks this one is no exception. Your contribution earns you a 15% royalty of the operating profits for the lifetime of the app to a maximum of $500,000.

We'll fly you to Ontario where you'll be our guest for the 2-day launch event. You'll have a chance to meet-n-greet the development team during a special cocktail and dinner and be recognized in person at the event as a truly special contributor.

The royalty in this perk represents a staggering twenty-fold return (2000%) but we're still going to throw in all of the non-monetary rewards included in all of the lower perks.

Tournament Champion
$100,000
Singular Ultra Exclusive Opportunity!!!

There can be only one -- one very exclusive perk for one very special long term partner. Contributing at this level automatically makes you a winner in our books, but this is your opportunity to join the exclusive club of those who've made a million on poker!

Your investment in this project earns you a royalty of 20% of the operating profits for the life of the app with no maximum cap. Given the expected lifespan of the application and the conservative projections on in-app sales revenues, we're estimating a least a minimum 40x return on investment! That means a return of $2,000,000 without the bother of sitting in a sweaty, smelly poker tournament room for a week.

You're invited to our mid-project status meeting that will occur approximately 90-days into development. If you decide to take advantage of that invite, we'll fly you to Ontario where you'll be our guest for the day and have the opportunity to participate in the team discussions, and we'll cap off the day with a post-meeting dinner at one of the fabulous local restaurants.

When it's time for the launch, we'll fly you to Ontario to be our special guest for the 2-day launch event. You'll be receiving premier contributor recognition during the keynote speech at the launch ceremony and be the guest of honor at a special cocktail and dinner event on the evening of the first day. Then, just so you'll have some nice souvenirs, we'll also throw in all of the non-monetary rewards included in all of the lower perk levels.

We picked the fixed funding method so that we could be assured of having the resources for completing the first phase of development on the IOS version. Also, because the perks contain free usage credits for the application, delivery on those valuable credits requires a completed product so we need to be sure we can deliver. This also protects you, the contributor, in that your contribution is fully refunded if the project doesn't reach goal and launch.

We've already started working on the algorithms and user interface designs, since that work is largely time and effort on our part and the costs are low enough that we're able to cover these out-of-pocket.

We'll be posting images and videos over the next 60 days as the campaign continues so that all our contributors, current and prospective, can get a better feel for the application and the development process. We'll also be posting previews of the perk items as soon as the graphics are finished.

Once the application hits production release the planned revenue stream will make maintenance, updates, and continued development for new devices largely self-sustaining. However, we need your help to get to over the first hurdle to get working and get to that that launch stage as quickly as possible so we can move on to adding Android support and then the Phase II premium online analysis components.

If you are like us, fans of Texas Hold'em who believe that online poker should be a level playing field and not the sole domain of elite players, then this is the project for you, and your relatives, and your friends, heck anyone you can think of -- please spread the word! As we say in the videos, Why just play, when you can play to win!"
story_txt:
Texas Hold'em can be a game of
wild swings of passion, with both crushing losing streaks
and exuberant runs of winning hands. The key thing that
separates the big-money winners from the losers isn't
passion, it's precision. Sadly for most of us, precision
has always demanded serious mental discipline and
rigorous practice beyond the reach of nearly all
casual players.
The online poker market is estimated
to exceed $5B USD in 2015 and during our research we
found that many poker tracking sites estimate that few people
play properly. In fact, even based on the most generous estimate for
correct play, at least two thirds of all the players are not playing correctly. This lack of precision costs these
players money and makes them targets for the professional
players who seek to capitalize on their
mistakes.


Although luck determines the
hand you are dealt, the top players have spent years
developing the mental skills needed to calculate the odds of
improving that hand. So, as the song says, they know when to
hold'em and know when to fold 'em. While such mental prowess
is required for live play, online play provides a completely
different situation.
Online Texas Hold'em poker
is a lot of fun to play and like most card games the odds
of winning are pretty good if played correctly.
Similarly, it can be a frustrating venture if played "by gut
feeling" and a potential money sucking vacuum if played with
even one "pro" at the table. Many people who wouldn't
dream of setting foot in an live poker room are more than
willing to play online in anonymity where your mistakes are
hidden and free of embarrassment. The pro players 
scout the online tables looking for this kind of easy prey and use 
their knowledge of the game to intimidate players into folding 
a good hand or to goad them into betting on a hand where there's no reasonable chance of winning. 
We don't think
that the game deserves to be dominated by a bunch of elitist
players with computer-like math skills and so we're
developing an alternative to level the playing
field.


There are a number
of websites out that that offer Texas Hold'em poker odds and
we've look at lots and lots of them. As we see it there are
two main problems with using these sites.
First, nearly all these sites 
are setup to deliver the theoretical odds
and not the practical odds. These web calculators are simply not comprehensive enough to
include all of the variables that occur during actual play 
that are critical to making the right decisions.
To calculate the practical
odds, one must perform multiple calculations to determine the
real odds of improving a hand based on the
actual table conditions. Plus, these
calculations need to be done four different times during every hand. Then, on every call/raise/fold choice another set of odds calculations called pot odds is needed to
determine the correct betting strategy. Trying to perform
all those different calculations during a live game, each of which can have
multiple sets of odds, is just not practical using websites.

To make practical use of odds information during
online play both the data entry and the many, many
calculations need to be completed in mere seconds. Most web
calculators only work out one problem at a time, requiring
multiple uses to get a more complete set of odds. This leads to the second major
problem of using websites to try and do these calculations
... speed.
Online poker games give a player very limited time to act before a player's hand is
automatically forfeited. While a live poker game might
do only 30-60 hands per hour, online sites push for 100-120
hands per hour or higher. This is because the site makes money from
every hand played -- so faster play equals
more money for them. Since they make their money regardless
of who wins, the site operators have no real
interest in helping people play correctly but a vested
interest in making people play
quickly.
To solve the two key problems above, getting
the correct odds and getting them quickly enough to have
time to act on the information, we need to build a very
special smartphone application.


The overall project goal is to develop an
application for a wide range of smartphone platforms
including nearly all iPhone, iPad, and Android phone and tablet implementations, with the
potential to include Windows Phone in future. That means
acquiring a fairly extensive range of equipment for
development and QA plus a major number crunching server that
chews on the data and spits out what we need. To keep initial costs under control we've decided that
the first development should focus on Apple IOS, allowing us to trim a substantial amount off the starting budget
requirements.
A project of this complexity should have a $150k-180k price tag, and at the normal rates for six
months of development the wage costs alone should easily exceed the entire project goal amount that we've set. However, we bribed
our team with liberal promises of pizza and diet-cola to get
the wage cost down to less than a quarter of what it
should be. 
In truth, there would be no wages in this project at all if any

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The Game

Fortuna Sphera is Latin: fortuna meaning fate or fortune, and sphera meaning sphere or orb. Which translates to Sphere of Fate.

Fortuna Sphera was created to be a simple yet unlimited tabletop/LARP style role playing game for players of any age. Since most standard tabletop RPG’s are complex and grand in scope, they do not lend well to young children. So we thought: What if there were a game that we can play with our children that taps into their imaginations and still has the basic function of a role playing game? A game that lets a player be what or whoever they want to be instead of being locked into a given genre? A game not weighed down (literally) with rule books and sheets of information to keep track of?

Fortuna Sphera is that game.

(these are some of the early versions)

The sphere itself is based on an idea that you likely already know. We use it in a new way, making a game that is very easy to play. Inside the orb is a 20 sided dice that floats in a dark fluid. When a player needs to determine the result of a task or action they need only give their orb a shake turn it over and read the result.

One or four results will appear: Success, Failure, Grand Success, or Grand Failure. A Grand result is akin to a Critical.

   


The intended use for Fortuna Sphera, is that it can easily be added into any story line or universe imaginable. That way parents can easily engage their children in a game using their favorite cartoon or movie as the backdrop. At the same time more advanced role players can play in a world being generated on the fly. But what role playing game doesn’t have its own story?

Meet the Carrolls’:


A normal British family. That is, until they found their Fortuna Sphera and things changed dramatically. The Collector has come looking for them and he won’t stop until he has gathered all of the Fortuna Sphera for himself.

The story so far can be read here.


A sphere is roughly the size of a baseball, making it easy to hold for hands of almost any age. It requires no batteries, so it can be used anywhere you might want to have a game. They will be offered in a variety of designs and colors so you can find the one that fits you or your character. Since the game can easily be played with the orb alone, they become perfect props for a LARP.

The rules fit on one side of a business card, which also doubles as the "character sheet" for pickup and dropout games or large games with many players who may not know each other.

(character sheet side of the business card)


The Campaign

Our primary goal of $25,000 usd, is the bare minimum we need to make Fortuna Sphera a reality. This Covers equipment, materials, and training for making the first batch of orbs. To us, this campaign is not just about Fortuna Sphera it’s for Conflict Games as a whole. Should this goal be met, stretch goals will include multi language support for the game, much needed hardware and software upgrades, and more. When you support this campaign you are supporting the future of Conflict Games.

To keep things interesting we will offer a number of campaign exclusive designs. The first 1000 spheres will have an exclusive design. Should they all be claimed, the next design will run for 2000. The third and beyond will have a run of 3000. No matter how well this campaign does supporters will always get an exclusive design but the earlier you jump in, the more limited the design will be. The current design will be added as an update as well as a peek at the next design in line. We will do our utmost to keep the running design as current as possible, but please be understanding if we cannot update immediately.

Current Design:


The family pack, (also a campaign exclusive), are designed after the set of spheres the Carroll family uses. Their designs will only be available during this campaign, and will be limited in number to the amount of supporters that select the Genus perk.


At the moment we are only able to ship to the United States. When we find a shipping method with reasonable pricing we will expand to more areas. Apologies for any inconvenience.


The Challenge

We are a small company, in fact there are only the two of us. Currently we operate out of our small home offices. Upon the success of this campaign we will have our work cut out for us. Setting up a place to work and procuring the equipment we will need is only the start. After that comes producing Fortuna Sphera.

We will receive orbs from the manufacturer as a solid color with no designs on them. The patterns and designs will be added by us directly. While we have most of the bugs worked out of the process in small scale, our method for applying the process in great numbers will require streamlining as we progress. This means it might take a while to to produce them.


The Company

Conflict Games was founded on June 26, 2015 in a small town in Western Montana.  It is our goal to provide quality original games of all kinds. We have a number of projects in various stages of development, from tabletop and board games, to mobile apps and video games.

We are currently only a staff of two. We are a small company, but we have some great ideas. A few of which we hope to launch in the next year or two.  If you would like to keep current with us we post all important news on the website, and Facebook.

Our news page is here.


The Staff

Andrew Nickerson – Founder/Writer – Andrew is a longtime fan of games of all kinds. From playing the Robotech RPG as a kid to playing Fallout 4 as a much older kid. He started designing pen and paper RPG’s from scratch at the age of 12 to play with his friends, and he never stopped.


Eden Vermilion – Artist – Eden has been an artist as long as she can remember and a gamer from a very young age. Often these two passions would intertwine as she loved to draw characters from the games she played. This led her to pursue a career drawing characters of her own. Eden is also an avid lover of cosplay, anime conventions, and fried rice.


The Schedule

This is a first for us so though we will do everything in our power to keep this schedule, there may be delays. If there are we will update this page as well as our own news pages. Of course we will also update if everything is going to plan to keep you in the loop.

June - The campaign ends.
July - We begin ordering equipment and materials.
August - Production begins.
October - Begin shipping Fortuna Sphera to campaign supporters.
December - Fortuna Sphera available through the Conflict Games store.


We Need Your Help

Any role playing game is meant to be played by a group. What better way to get a group together than by helping us spread word about Fortuna Sphera and this campaign. It's the best way to show your support, and we appreciate the help.

story:
Two years ago, our team came up with the idea to combine an arcade cabinet with a Nintendo Switch, to provide a full arcade experience to the Nintendo Switch players all over the world. We kept trying to find the best solutions to improve the joystick, until we finally made the Switch Fighter. All we wanted was to make it a real product and share it with all the gamers like us. We are so thankful to all the gamers and media who have supported our idea with enthusiasm. 

      However, as the funding project approaches the deadline, unfortunately we can foresee that we won’t be able to reach the 40% of our campaign goal. For this reason, we are sorry to announce that we have decided to CANCEL THE SWITCH FIGHTER PROJECT. 
All backers will be refunded by indiegogo (within 7 days). We apologize for the inconvenience caused, and for making all backers disappointed.

      We have contacted many manufacturers, trying our very best to find different ways to help Switch Fighter come alive with our funding. However, the result wouldn’t be what we expected it to be, and as happiness of all our backers is a must in this adventure, we have decided to give up… for now. Although the funding campaign was not successful, our team will continue the Switch Fighter project. So please, keep following us on our website for all the updates!

https://www.switch-fighter.com/

https://www.facebook.com/switchfighter2/

https://twitter.com/Switchfighter2

https://www.instagram.com/switchfighter/

We really appreciated all the support, comments and ideas from you during the funding period.

Thank you!

すべての資金提供者様

      2年前、私たちのチームはアーケードキャビネットとニンテンドースイッチを組み合わせて、世界中のニンテンドースイッチプレーヤーに完全なアーケードエクスペリエンスを提供するというアイデアを持っていました。私たちは最高の解決策を見つけようとし続け、ジョイスティックの改良を続け、最後にスイッチファイターを作ります。私たちはそれを製品にしてすべてのゲーマーと共有したいと思っています。私たちのアイデアが好きなゲーマーとメディアに感謝します。

      ただし、資金調達プロジェクトは期限に近づいており、キャンペーンの目標の40％に到達できないと予測できます。そのため、スイッチファイタープロジェクトをキャンセルすることを決定いたしましたことをお詫び申し上げます。すべてのバッカーはindiegogoによって返金されます（約7日間必要）。ご不便をおかけして申し訳ございませんが、すべての支援者を失望させます。

      私たちは多くのメーカーに連絡を取り、資金でそれを実現するためにさまざまな方法を試みました。私たちの製品を受け取ったすべてのバッカーが幸せであることを願っていますが、その結果、私たちは予算内で満足できる製品を作ることができません。資金提供は成功していませんが、私たちのチームはスイッチ戦闘機プロジェクトを継続します。いつかSwitch Fighterが実際の製品になることを願っています。あなたは私たちのウェブサイトからアップデートをチェックすることができます：

https://www.switch-fighter.com/

https://www.facebook.com/switchfighter2/

https://twitter.com/Switchfighter2

https://www.instagram.com/switchfighter/

資金提供期間中の皆様からのすべてのサポート、コメント、アイデアに本当に感謝しています。

ありがとうございました

 

 

 

 

 

Control your street fighter in Switch Fighter.

Switch Fighter is a portable arcade cabinet accessory for your Switch.
It includes a joystick and buttons, just like on a retro game controller,

allowing it to be used as an arcade-style controller.

 

We love playing classic game content on Switch.
It’s an amazing machine for experiencing the thrill of classic games.
Nintendo Switch is re-releasing classic titles, with new ones coming out each week,
like those from Capcom, Namco, and SNK. These include FTGs (Fighting Games) for which an arcade joystick is needed. If you are an arcade game lover, you need a joystick to properly play classics like Street Fighter or King of Fighters.

It’s still possible to play retro games with a TV and Joy-Con, but how cool would it be to slide your Switch into an arcade cabinet and play FTGs or other retro games?

Switch Fighter makes retro gaming possible. Simply slide your Switch into the Switch Fighter, then connect your Switch with Bluetooth to the TV for output and charging.

 

To provide a full arcade experience, we are using sanwa joystick and buttons(main 6 buttons) which is use on real arcade cabinet in arcade game center.

 

 

With publishers like SNK and Capcom re-releasing classic titles for the Switch the number of games available to play in joystick mode will only grow.
And not just classic games — modern releases like Samurai Shodown 2019, Pokken Tournament DX, eg.. are supported too. So light and portable, yet you will feel like you have a real arcade console at your fingertips.

 


Thought switch network system, multiplayer with switch fighter is available.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Switch Fighter is a Switch  Arcade joystick it’s perfectly work for all of the game in Switch.
Not only classic retro games, Switch fighter will turn out to be such a huge success that those developers will patch in a reverse orientation option…

story:
Big Coins for Big Bois

I don't know about y'all, but I've had a blast playing Classic with our guild. Fun times, fun people. I want to have a real life memento of this shit. An Official Real Life Guild Coin™. It'd be pretty baller, and we pretty baller.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to make this happen. Depending on how much money we raise, we'll have a few options of what we're getting.

If this actually gets funded, the design of the coin will be put to a vote in our Discord. It might be as simple as a 1" 1-color coin with raised areas or a 3" fully colored, numbered shit, depending on funds.

We're probably going to order at least 100 coins to lower the cost per piece and be sure that everyone gets one. Probably a minimum of 300$ with shipping and everything factored in, but Indiegogo requires 500$ minimum for funding.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There's not many challenges I can see if it gets funded.

If your coin gets lost in the mail, we should be able to send you another one, since we'll be buying them in bulk.

Don't want ya boi Conmo to know your address cause he might show up with a bottle of plastic vodka? Get a PO box or some shit

 

 

Stretch Goals

So this shit ain't happening for real, but if we somehow get way more money than expected then we'll have another vote on what to do with it. Official Guild Member Certificates™? Donate it to a park or something to get it named after the guild? There's a park in Scotland you can donate to and officially own a 1'x1' plot of land, technically making us all Lords and Ladies. Name a star? Idk, we'll vote if shit gets insane funding.

story:
Show the Ultimate world that mixed has commercial viability by raising $2700 to add a mixed game to NGN's broadcast schedule for ECC.

A successfully funded campaign will feature a FREE stream of the Polar Bears vs Mischief or Wild Card vs AMP depending on which Reward backers choose.

How it works

This is an all-or-nothing campaign. Back at any tier you wish. Choose a reward and if this campaign is fully funded we will feature a free broadcast of the game with the most votes.

Why $2,700

NGN productions are not cheap. $2700 represents the costs for our 8 person crew to cover the game at an overtime rate + covers the additional processing fees of the Indiegogo campaign. (NGN committed at the beginning of the season to covering 20 men's games and 20 women's games, so we cannot replace a currently schedule game.)

story:
When you got up this morning, you probably didn’t have this on your to-do list:

  • Discover long-lost city
  • Defeat rat-man leader
  • Wipe out mutated army
  • Destroy a nightmare legend

But if this sounds like the adventure for you then delve into the Lost City of the Dwarves, the first book in a new choose-your-own-adventure book series.

UPDATE: To help build interest in my campaign I have written a free, downloadable mini-adventure for people to try out. Head on over to my site for your copy.

Path of Legends is a new choose-your-own-adventure series with a refined OSRIC-compatible adventure system that has a minimal learning time but covers the most used aspects of old school gaming. In no time you’ll be hunting for enchanted items, battling goblins, rat-men and other creatures, enhancing your combat with a variety of potions and solving puzzles with deadly traps. Best of all, the character that you create, level up and spend time building in this adventure can be used continually in all of the Path of Legends books as you travel the path to becoming a living legend.

Why a new choose-your-own-adventure series after all this time, you ask? I feel that the older ones were lacking in the delivery and quality of a true adventure the way that traditional gamers expect, and none had successfully used a simple yet satisfying OSRIC system. This series will deliver that. It is also apparent that many budding gamers miss out on the chance to run through a good adventure since good Game Masters are hard to find in many communities. This series fills that need by covering every detail along the way so that the reader can focus on enjoying the story that they are taking part in.

Included in the book is a detailed Codex with character sheets, various word puzzles, and an illustrated guide of the treasures you can find. And since every Path of Legends book comes with a full set of custom-made polyhedron dice, all you need to supply is a your adventurer’s spirit and a pencil.

Despite the obvious gaming attributes of this project, I was inspired to write a story that was both enjoyable and suitable for all ages to read, from the juvenile to the adult reading level, that wasn't completely dependent on the  combat system. Reading is an adventure in itself, and the younger the reader, the bigger the adventure can be! In fact, it will be possible to enjoy the entire Path of Legends book series without any dice at all. The reader can still play the part of the hero, solving puzzles and making decisions, all the while going on the pretense that the hero will be victorious no matter what the odds. Isn't that what a good book is all about for many readers? This isn't a collection of random events being sold as a story, like the older books of this style, but a full-fledged novel that the reader interacts with. That being said, in acknowledgement of the many young readers who often find themselves left out of a good adventure for financial reasons, I would like to see as many of my books as possible be donated to your local libraries. See Perk #1 to help make this possible.

So whether you long for the good ol' days of sword-swinging with minimal complications, or you've been dying to try it but can't find anyone to play with, this is the solo adventure for you. In fact, you could even run the adventure with 2 characters and read through it together, as long as you each have a book and decide who's going to be the lead hero. Just be ready to share the treasure.

Printed in Trade Paperback format on 60 lb. bond paper and 200 pages thick, this is no wimpy book. Plus it's loaded with illustrations by Travis Hanson, creator of the acclaimed web-comic the Bean. From story to artwork, this is a quality production. Inside the book is:

  • the first half of an awesome adventure
  • 38 original b&w illustrations
  • character sheets
  • word puzzles with coded answers that tell you where to get bonus items for your character
  • illustrated magic items catalogue
  • the complete rules for Dwarven Battle Dice, a spin-off d6 dice game
  • plus you get the set of polyhedron dice (see below)

 

 

 

Forged by the Dice Smiths at Q workshop, this set of midnight blue polyhedron dice with glow in the dark runes is a must have for any collector. Not only are they custom made for the Lost City of the Dwarves books, they put all othe dice to shame.

 

This PDF file has the entire Codex in it, plus the nine introductory pages where the basic rules are. It's pretty much a mini playe's guide that you can print off to have by your side instead of flipping through the book, and for you to print off character sheets and the word puzzles for those who don't like to write in your books.

 

Good gaming shirts are hard to come by, but I've designed a garment with Travis' artwork that will make you the envy of all who roll dice. Proudly display that you helped to break new ground in the gaming novel industry with these shirts that are available in guy AND gal styles. Note the chick armour on the back of the ladie's shirt. I'll collect your sizes once the campaing has finished.

Last is a full-colour presentation folder with the cover artwork for you to carry around your gaming sheets in. Nothing is better than having a limited-edition accessory like this in front of you on the table or on your desk and knowing that nobody else can get one because after this campaign is over they will not be printed again. I`ve duplicated this perk on the campaign, one for guys and one for gals, but the folder is the same. I`m just going to do it that way to keep track of pink & grey shirts.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here's a look at the bookmark that will come with each book. I've designed it to be a quick-access guide for some of the information that will be looked up most often during the adventure. One side lists all of the potions that you can find and the bonuses that they give your character when used. The other side of the bookmark has a chart listing character statistic bonuses and there's another chart for using Dwarven Grenades.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Unlockables?

Yes, there is one, HUGE unlockable if this campaign is very successful: Dwarven Battle Dice.

This is a complete, separate game played with special six-sided dice. Already included in the book's Codex are the complete rules for Dwarven Battle Dice, a spin-off, collectable dice game that you can play with others who have also ventured into the Lost City. They will be expensive to make becuase of all the different kinds, but if we reach the $45,000.00 mark then everybody gets dice with their book. You will not have to pay any more money, but we need enough people to contribute to this campaign to get it to that magic number.

It isn't that big a number, really. Only 600 devoted gamers need to contribute to the largest perks and we're there! I've seen more people at a really bad comic convention, and that's just in one city. This is out there for the entire world of gamers! If it happens, each book will come with a different bunch of random Dwarven Battle Dice (1 bunch = 10 dice), then it's up to you to battle other gamers who have ventured into the Lost City of the Dwarves and grow your collection. So tell everyone you know about this, because it wouldn't be much fun if you were the only one around with this wicked new dice game. There should even be dice booster-packs available for you dice mongers. Plus, with each new book in the series, more new dice will be added to the game, and you can only get them here.

Want to see more? Then head on over to the official web site, the Pen & Forge, to read the full introduction to this book and to get a better idea of what the Path of Legends and Dwarven Battle Dice are all about.
story_txt:
When you got up this morning, you probably didn’t have this on your to-do list:

Discover long-lost city
Defeat rat-man leader
Wipe out mutated army
Destroy a nightmare legend
But if this sounds like the adventure for you then delve into the Lost City of the Dwarves, the first book in a new choose-your-own-adventure book series.

UPDATE: To help build interest in my campaign I have written a free, downloadable mini-adventure for people to try out. Head on over to my site for your copy.
Path of Legends is a new choose-your-own-adventure series with a refined OSRIC-compatible adventure system that has a minimal learning time but covers the most used aspects of old school gaming. In no time you’ll be hunting for enchanted items, battling goblins, rat-men and other creatures, enhancing your combat with a variety of potions and solving puzzles with deadly traps. Best of all, the character that you create, level up and spend time building in this adventure can be used continually in all of the Path of Legends books as you travel the path to becoming a living legend.
Why a new choose-your-own-adventure series after all this time, you ask? I feel that the older ones were lacking in the delivery and quality of a true adventure the way that traditional gamers expect, and none had successfully used a simple yet satisfying OSRIC system. This series will deliver that. It is also apparent that many budding gamers miss out on the chance to run through a good adventure since good Game Masters are hard to find in many communities. This series fills that need by covering every detail along the way so that the reader can focus on enjoying the story that they are taking part in.
Included in the book is a detailed Codex with character sheets, various word puzzles, and an illustrated guide of the treasures you can find. And since every Path of Legends book comes with a full set of custom-made polyhedron dice, all you need to supply is a your adventurer’s spirit and a pencil.
Despite the obvious gaming attributes of this project, I was inspired to write a story that was both enjoyable and suitable for all ages to read, from the juvenile to the adult reading level, that wasn't completely dependent on the  combat system. Reading is an adventure in itself, and the younger the reader, the bigger the adventure can be! In fact, it will be possible to enjoy the entire Path of Legends book series without any dice at all. The reader can still play the part of the hero, solving puzzles and making decisions, all the while going on the pretense that the hero will be victorious no matter what the odds. Isn't that what a good book is all about for many readers? This isn't a collection of random events being sold as a story, like the older books of this style, but a full-fledged novel that the reader interacts with. That being said, in acknowledgement of the many young readers who often find themselves left out of a good adventure for financial reasons, I would like to see as many of my books as possible be donated to your local libraries. See Perk #1 to help make this possible.
So whether you long for the good ol' days of sword-swinging with minimal complications, or you've been dying to try it but can't find anyone to play with, this is the solo adventure for you. Just be ready to share the treasure.

story:
Why i want a tank.

Ever since i was very young, ive had a dream.
a dream to own a tank, and after much wasted time at school looking at tanks, i have decided on my dream tank. The Alvis FV107 Scimitar CVR(T)!
I have chosen this specific tank, because it is small, cheap to run, looks bad-ass, and FAST.
But there is one problem. i don't have the $100,000 needed for the tank, transportation, licenses, and everything else. so i turn to you my friends, you people that give money to people with dreams. and i dream of a tank.

What will i do with this tank?

This tank will be used to participate in multiple events, to go off roading, and letting kids have a fun time, because every young boy wants to be an army man, right?

The Impact

The impact of me having a tank will be:
i will be very happy.
i will have a tank.
i will be awesome in a tank.
i will bully the bullies in my tank.
kids will have fun riding my tank.
you will feel awesome that you helped me get a tank.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell some people about this project, the more money i can raise, the better the tank!
